original: Padmagupta (alias Parimala):
analyzed: padmagupta alias parimala
nava sāhasa aṅka carita

original: prathamaḥ sargaḥ
analyzed: prathamaḥ sargaḥ

original: avyāt sa vo yasya nisargavakraḥ spṛśaty adhijyasmaracāpalīlām /
analyzed: avyāt sa vaḥ yasya nisarga vakraḥ spṛśati adhijya smara cāpa līlām

original: jaṭāpinaddhoragarājaratna- marīcilīḍhobhayakoṭir induḥ // PNc_1.1 //
analyzed: jaṭā pinaddha uraga rāja ratna marīci līḍha ubhaya koṭiḥ induḥ

original: jaṭāhiratnadyutipāṭalo 'vyāt sa vaḥ śaśī śaṅkaramauliratnam /
analyzed: jaṭā ahi ratna dyuti pāṭalaḥ sa vaḥ śaśī śaṅkara mauli ratnam

original: śrutāv aśokāṅkurakautukena yaṃ kartum icchaty acalendrakanyā // PNc_1.2 //
analyzed: śrutau aśoka aṅkura kautukena yam kartum icchati acala indra kanyā

original: kumbhasthalī rakṣatu vo vikīrṇa- sindūrareṇur dviradānanasya /
analyzed: kumbhasthalī rakṣatu vaḥ vikīrṇa sindūra reṇuḥ dvirada ānanasya

original: praśāntaye vighnatamaśchaṭānāṃ niṣṭhyūtabālātapapallaveva // PNc_1.3 //
analyzed: praśāntaye vighna tamaḥ chaṭānām niṣṭhyūta bāla ātapa pallavā iva

original: cakṣus tad unmeṣi sadā mukhe vaḥ sārasvataṃ śāśvatam āvir astu /
analyzed: cakṣuḥ tat unmeṣi sadā mukhe vaḥ sārasvatam śāśvatam āvis astu

original: paśyanti yenāvahitāḥ kavīndrās triviṣṭapābhyantaravarti vastu // PNc_1.4 //
analyzed: paśyanti yena avahitāḥ kavi indrāḥ triviṣṭapa abhyantara varti vastu

original: prācīnakavivarṇanam
analyzed: prācīna kavi varṇanam

original: tattvaspṛśas te kavayaḥ purāṇāḥ śrībhartṛmeṇṭhapramukhā jayanti /
analyzed: tattva spṛśaḥ te kavayaḥ purāṇāḥ śrī bhartṛmeṇṭha pramukhāḥ jayanti

original: nistṛṃśadhārāsadṛśena yeṣāṃ vaidarbhamārgeṇa giraḥ pravṛttāḥ // PNc_1.5 //
analyzed: nistṛṃśa dhārā sadṛśena yeṣām vaidarbha mārgeṇa giraḥ pravṛttāḥ

original: pūrṇendubimbād api sundarāṇi teṣām adūre purato yaśāṃsi /
analyzed: pūrṇa indu bimbāt api sundarāṇi teṣām adūre puratas yaśāṃsi

original: ye bhartṛmeṇṭhādikavīndrasūkti- vyaktopadiṣṭena pathā prayānti // PNc_1.6 //
analyzed: ye bhartṛ meṇṭha ādi kavi indra sūkti vyakta upadiṣṭena pathā prayānti

original: sarasvatīkalpalataikakandaṃ vandāmahe vākpatirājadevam /
yasya prasādād vayam apy ananya- kavīndracīrṇe pathi sañcarāmaḥ // PNc_1.7 //
analyzed: yasya prasādāt vayam api ananya kavi indra cīrṇe pathi sañcarāmaḥ

original: divaṃ yiyāsur mama vāci mudrām adatta yāṃ vākpatirājadevaḥ /
analyzed: divam yiyāsuḥ mama vāci mudrām adatta yām vākpati rājadevaḥ

original: tasyānujanmā kavibāndhavasya bhinatti tāṃ saṃprati sindhurājaḥ // PNc_1.8 //
analyzed: tasya anujanmā kavi bāndhavasya bhinatti tām saṃprati sindhurājaḥ

original: kaveḥ śālīnatādi
analyzed: kaveḥ śālīna tā ādi

original: naite kavīndrāḥ kati kāvyabandhe tad eṣa rājñā kim ahaṃ niyuktaḥ /
analyzed: na ete kavi indrāḥ kati kāvya bandhe tat eṣa rājñā kim aham niyuktaḥ

original: kiṃ vālukāparvatake dhareyam āropyate satsu kulācaleṣu // PNc_1.9 //
analyzed: kim vālukā parvatake dharā iyam āropyate satsu kula acaleṣu

original: aho mahatsāhasam etad eva yad varṇaṇīyo navasāhasāṅkaḥ /
analyzed: aho mahat sāhasam etat eva yat varṇaṇīyaḥ nava sāhasa aṅkaḥ

original: dūre paricchedakathā hi satyam etadguṇānām udadher apāṃ ca // PNc_1.10 //
analyzed: dūre pariccheda kathā hi satyam etad guṇānām udadheḥ apām ca

original: bhaktyāthavāsyaiva mama prabandhe sūkṣmo 'yam unmīlati śaktileśaḥ /
analyzed: bhaktyā athavā asya eva mama prabandhe sūkṣmaḥ yam unmīlati śakti leśaḥ

original: ullaṅghito yat kapinā payodhiḥ sevānubhavaḥ sa raghūdvahasya // PNc_1.11 //
analyzed: ullaṅghitaḥ yat kapinā payodhiḥ sevā anubhavaḥ sa raghūdvahasya

original: samatsare cetasi durjanānāṃ na jātucit sūktiguṇo guṇāya /
analyzed: sa matsare cetasi durjanānām na jātucit su ukti guṇaḥ guṇāya

original: nisargakṛṣṇendravadhūkapole nirarthakaḥ kuṅkumapattrabhaṅgaḥ // PNc_1.12 //
kim anyad asyāś caritair nṛpasya muktāvadātaiḥ kṛtamaṇḍanāyāḥ /
analyzed: kim anyat asyāḥ caritaiḥ nṛpasya muktā avadātaiḥ kṛta maṇḍanāyāḥ

original: madīyasūkter mukulībhavantu svabhāvaśuddhāni satāṃ manāṃsi // PNc_1.13 //
analyzed: madīya sūkteḥ mukulībhavantu svabhāva śuddhāni satām manāṃsi

original: namo 'stu sāhityarasāya tasmai niṣiktam antaḥ pṛṣatāpi yasya /
analyzed: namaḥ stu sāhitya rasāya tasmai niṣiktam antar pṛṣatā api yasya

original: suvarṇatāṃ vaktram upaiti sadhor durvarṇatāṃ yāti ca durjanasya // PNc_1.14 //
analyzed: suvarṇa tām vaktram upaiti sadhoḥ durvarṇa tām yāti ca durjanasya

original: śrīsāhasāṅkojjvalakīrtigarbhā mamāthavā kaṃ na haranti vācaḥ /
analyzed: śrī sāhasa aṅka ujjvala kīrti garbhāḥ mama athavā kam na haranti vācaḥ

original: kasyātra lobhāya na śuktayas tā muktā hi yāsām udare sphuranti // PNc_1.15 //
analyzed: kasya atra lobhāya na śuktayaḥ tāḥ muktāḥ hi yāsām udare sphuranti

original: pratijñā
analyzed: pratijñā

original: etāny avantīśvarapārijāta- jātāni tārāpatipāṇḍurāṇi /
analyzed: etāni avantīśvara pārijāta jātāni tārāpati pāṇḍurāṇi

original: sampraty ahaṃ paśyata/
analyzed: samprati aham paśyata

original: digvadhūnāṃ yaśaḥprasūnāny avataṃsayāmi // PNc_1.16 //
analyzed: digvadhūnām yaśaḥ prasūnāni avataṃsayāmi

original: atha ujjayinīvarṇanam
analyzed: atha ujjayinī varṇanam

original: asti kṣitaūjjayinīti nāmnā purī vihāyasy amarāvatīva /
analyzed: asti kṣitau ujjayinī iti nāmnā purī vihāyasi amarāvatī iva

original: babandha yasyāṃ padam indrakalpaḥ śrīvikramāditya iti kṣitīśaḥ // PNc_1.17 //
analyzed: babandha yasyām padam indra kalpaḥ śrīvikramādityaḥ iti kṣitīśaḥ

original: āmañjuguñjatkalahaṃsapaṅkti- vikasvarāmbhojarajaḥpiśaṅgā /
analyzed: āmañju guñjat kalahaṃsa paṅkti vikasvara ambhoja rajaḥ piśaṅgā

original: ābhāti yasyāḥ parikhā nitambe saśabdajambūnadamekhaleva // PNc_1.18 //
analyzed: ābhāti yasyāḥ parikhā nitambe sa śabda jambūnada mekhalā iva

original: prākāravapracchalataḥ śarīram āvartya līlāśayanaṃ murāreḥ /
analyzed: prākāra vapra chalataḥ śarīram āvartya līlā śayanam murāreḥ

original: yatrāntarasthāyinidhānarakṣāṃ vidhātum unmagna ivoragendraḥ // PNc_1.19 //
analyzed: yatra antara sthāyi nidhāna rakṣām vidhātum unmagnaḥ iva uraga indraḥ

original: pade pade sāndrasudhojjvalāni gṛhāṇi yā nākasadāṃ bibharti /
analyzed: pade pade sāndra sudhā ujjvalāni gṛhāṇi yā nākasadām bibharti

original: abhyudgatānīva phaṇīndralokam āpūrya tadbhūmibhṛtāṃ yaśāṃsi // PNc_1.20 //
analyzed: abhyudgatāni iva phaṇi indra lokam āpūrya tad bhūmibhṛtām yaśāṃsi

original: himacchaṭāhāribhir aṃśujālaiḥ prālambimuktāphalajālakāni /
analyzed: hima chaṭā hāribhiḥ aṃśu jālaiḥ prālambi muktāphala jālakāni

original: vilāsinīvibhramamandirāṇi yasyāṃ hasantīva parasparasya // PNc_1.21 //
analyzed: vilāsinī vibhrama mandirāṇi yasyām hasanti iva parasparasya

original: gṛhāṇi yasyāṃ savarāṅganāni varāṅganā rūpapuraskṛtāṅgyaḥ /
analyzed: gṛhāṇi yasyām sa vara aṅganāni vara aṅganāḥ rūpa puraskṛta aṅgyaḥ

original: rūpaṃ samunmīlitasadvilāsam astraṃ vilāsāḥ kusumāyudhasya // PNc_1.22 //
analyzed: rūpam samunmīlita sat vilāsam astram vilāsāḥ kusumāyudhasya

original: CF. Kāvyaprakāśa 10.131a
analyzed: kāvyaprakāśa

original: yatrānanair eṇādṛśām abhikhyāṃ sitāśmavātāyanapaṅktir eti /
analyzed: yatra ānanaiḥ eṇā dṛśām abhikhyām sita aśma vātāyana paṅktiḥ eti

original: ambhoruhair ujjvalahemakḷptair ākāśagaṅgājalaveṇikeva // PNc_1.23 //
analyzed: ambhoruhaiḥ ujjvala hema kḷptaiḥ ākāśagaṅgā jala veṇikā iva

original: vidhūyamānāḥ pavanena yasyāṃ nīlāśmaveśmāruṇavaijayantyaḥ /
analyzed: vidhūyamānāḥ pavanena yasyām nīla aśma veśma aruṇa vaijayantyaḥ

original: bhinnāñjanaśyāmaghanodgatānāṃ taḍillatānāṃ dyutim āvahanti // PNc_1.24 //
analyzed: bhinnāñjana śyāma ghana udgatānām taḍit latānām dyutim āvahanti

original: udeti kāntāmaṇimekhalānāṃ gṛhe gṛhe yatra muhur ninādaḥ /
analyzed: udeti kāntā maṇi mekhalānām gṛhe gṛhe yatra muhur ninādaḥ

original: āyāti yo 'naṅgajayadvipasya madāvatārotsavaḍiṇḍimatvam // PNc_1.25 //
analyzed: āyāti yaḥ naṅga jaya dvipasya madāvatāra utsava ḍiṇḍima tvam

original: mukhendubhiḥ pauravilāsinīnāṃ kapolakāntyā kṛtasaṃvibhāgaḥ /
analyzed: mukha indubhiḥ paura vilāsinīnām kapola kāntyā kṛta saṃvibhāgaḥ

original: na yāti kārśyaṃ bahule 'pi yatra vātāyanāsannataraḥ śaśāṅkaḥ // PNc_1.26 //
analyzed: na yāti kārśyam bahule yatra vātāyana āsannataraḥ śaśāṅkaḥ

original: na pakṣapātena vadāmi satyam uṣassu yasyāṃ bhavanāṅganebhyaḥ /
analyzed: na pakṣapātena vadāmi satyam uṣassu yasyām bhavana aṅganebhyaḥ

original: sammarjanībhiḥ parataḥ kriyante visūtritaikāvalimauktikāni // PNc_1.27 //
analyzed: sammarjanībhiḥ paratas kriyante visūtrita eka āvali mauktikāni

original: yasyām asaṅkṣiptadṛśāṃ stanāṅke kastūrikāpattralatā cakāsti /
analyzed: yasyām asaṅkṣipta dṛśām stana aṅke kastūrikā pattra latā cakāsti

original: śarāsanābhyāsavidhau samāpte mukteva godhā makaradhvajena // PNc_1.28 //
analyzed: śarāsana abhyāsa vidhau samāpte muktā iva godhā makaradhvajena

original: vilāsinīsadmalasatpatākā- paṭāñcale kāñcanakiṅkiṇīnām /
analyzed: vilāsinī sadma lasat patākā paṭa añcale kāñcana kiṅkiṇīnām

original: nirantarair yā raṇitair ajasram ājñām ivodghoṣayati smarasya // PNc_1.29 //
analyzed: nirantaraiḥ yā raṇitaiḥ ajasram ājñām iva udghoṣayati smarasya

original: pratikṣaṇaṃ yā galitāṃśukānām anaṅgalīlākalahotsaveṣu /
analyzed: pratikṣaṇam yā galita aṃśukānām anaṅga līlā kalaha utsaveṣu

original: analpakṛṣṇāgurudhūmabhaṅgyā vāmabhruvām arpayatīva vāsaḥ // PNc_1.30 //
analyzed: analpa kṛṣṇa aguru dhūma bhaṅgyā vāma bhruvām arpayati iva vāsaḥ

original: yatrāṣṭamīcandram upeyivāṃsam ālambya saudheṣv asamagrakāntim /
analyzed: yatra aṣṭamī candram upeyivāṃsam ālambya saudheṣu asamagra kāntim

original: keśāhṛtaiḥ ketakagarbhabarhair āpūrayanty ardham arālakeśyaḥ // PNc_1.31 //
analyzed: keśa āhṛtaiḥ ketaka garbha barhaiḥ āpūrayanti ardham arāla keśyaḥ

original: līlākaṭākṣe madirekṣaṇānāṃ sammohanāstrasphuritaṃ niveśya /
analyzed: līlā kaṭākṣe madirā īkṣaṇānām sammohana astra sphuritam niveśya

original: ratyā saha kṛīḍati puṣpadhanvā yasyām aśokadrumavīthikāsu // PNc_1.32 //
analyzed: ratyā saha kṛīḍati puṣpadhanvā yasyām aśoka druma vīthikāsu

original: jāne jaganmohanakautukena vidhāya kūjāmiṣam anyapuṣṭaiḥ /
analyzed: jāne jagat mohana kautukena vidhāya kūja āmiṣam anya puṣṭaiḥ

original: aharniśaṃ cūtavaneṣu yasyām adhīyate mānmatham astravedam // PNc_1.33 //
analyzed: aharniśam cūta vaneṣu yasyām adhīyate mānmatham astra vedam

original: dikcakrasaṃcārimarīcidaṇḍa= cchalena cāmīkaratoraṇānām /
analyzed: diś cakra saṃcāri marīci daṇḍa chalena cāmīkara toraṇānām

original: avaimi dikpālapurīr vijitya yā hemavetragrahaṇe niyuṅkte // PNc_1.34 //
analyzed: avaimi dikpāla purīḥ vijitya yā hema vetra grahaṇe niyuṅkte

original: ullāsiṣu svarṇagavākṣapaṅkter yā raśmidaṇḍeṣu vighūrṇamānaiḥ /
analyzed: ullāsiṣu svarṇa gavākṣa paṅkteḥ yāḥ raśmi daṇḍeṣu vighūrṇamānaiḥ

original: bhāty agravedisphaṭikāṃśujālair dodhūyamānojjvalacāmareva // PNc_1.35 //
analyzed: bhāti agra vedi sphaṭika aṃśu jālaiḥ dodhūyamāna ujjvala cāmarā iva

original: yasyāṃ gṛhaprāṅganapadmarāga- raśmicchaṭāpāṭalam antarikṣam /
analyzed: yasyām gṛha prāṅgana padmarāga raśmi chaṭā pāṭalam antarikṣam

original: āliṅgitaṃ kiṃśukaśoṇabhāsā sandhyātapeneva sadā vibhāti // PNc_1.36 //
analyzed: āliṅgitam kiṃśuka śoṇa bhāsā sandhyā ātapena iva sadā vibhāti

original: avāpya yasyāṃ gṛhadīrghikāccha- vaiḍūryasopānamayūkhasakhyam /
analyzed: avāpya yasyām gṛha dīrghikā accha vaiḍūrya sopāna mayūkha sakhyam

original: hārītaśaṅkāṃ kalahaṃsaśāvā vāmabhruvāṃ pratyaham arpayanti // PNc_1.37 //
analyzed: hārīta śaṅkām kalahaṃsa śāvāḥ vāma bhruvām pratyaham arpayanti

original: nikāmam acchaiḥ pramadākapolair yatrendubimbākṛtibhiḥ kriyante /
analyzed: nikāmam acchaiḥ pramadā kapolaiḥ yatrā indu bimba ākṛtibhiḥ kriyante

original: svavaktrasaundaryavilokaneṣu vilāsino darpaṇanirvyapekṣāḥ // PNc_1.38 //
analyzed: sva vaktra saundarya vilokaneṣu vilāsinaḥ darpaṇa nirvyapekṣāḥ

original: parāṅmukhīnām api ratnabhittau prasādavat tadvadanaṃ vilokya /
analyzed: parāṅmukhīnām api ratna bhittau prasādavat tad vadanam vilokya

original: yasyāṃ yuvāno hariṇekṣaṇānām alīkakopaṃ sahasā vidanti // PNc_1.39 //
analyzed: yasyām yuvānaḥ hariṇa īkṣaṇānām alīka kopam sahasā vidanti

original: kurvanti yasyāṃ kusumeṣukeli- śramonmiṣatsvedalavās taruṇyaḥ /
analyzed: kurvanti yasyām kusumeṣu keli śrama unmiṣat sveda lavāḥ taruṇyaḥ

original: kapolakālāgurupattravallī- kalmāṣam ambho gṛhadīrghikāsu // PNc_1.40 //
yasyāṃ samunmīlati sundarīṇāṃ sā kāpi saubhāgyaviśeṣalakṣmīḥ /
analyzed: yasyām samunmīlati sundarīṇām sā kā api saubhāgya viśeṣa lakṣmīḥ

original: vilāsamuktāguṇavad yad āsāṃ sadā priyas tiṣṭhati kaṇṭhalagnaḥ // PNc_1.41 //
analyzed: vilāsa muktā guṇavat yat āsām sadā priyaḥ tiṣṭhati kaṇṭha lagnaḥ

original: avaimi gītena hṛte kuraṅge purandhribhiḥ saudhatalasthitābhiḥ /
analyzed: avaimi gītena hṛte kuraṅge purandhribhiḥ saudha tala sthitābhiḥ

original: śyāmāsu yasyāṃ labhate tadaccha= kapolabimbānukṛtiṃ mṛgāṅkaḥ // PNc_1.42 //
analyzed: śyāmāsu yasyām labhate tat accha kapola bimba anukṛtim mṛgāṅkaḥ

original: durgeti sarvatra gatā prasiddhiṃ nagendrakanyeva sanīlakaṇṭhā /
analyzed: durgā iti sarvatra gatā prasiddhim naga indra kanyā iva sa nīlakaṇṭhā

original: yā lagnakāñcīviṣayeṇa kāntiṃ siṃhāsanenātitarāṃ bibharti // PNc_1.43 //
analyzed: yā lagna kāñcī viṣayeṇa kāntim siṃhāsanena atitarām bibharti

original: vṛntād apāstair marutā vikīrṇaiḥ sugandhibhis tīrataruprasūnaiḥ /
analyzed: vṛntāt apāstaiḥ marutā vikīrṇaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ tīra taru prasūnaiḥ

original: śiprāsarit kūlatamālanīlā vibhāti yasyāḥ kabarīlateva // PNc_1.44 //
analyzed: śiprā sarit kūla tamāla nīlā vibhāti yasyāḥ kabarī latā iva

original: dhūmena yā naikamukhogatena saṃveṣṭyamāṇā paritaś cakāsti /
analyzed: dhūmena yā na eka mukhaḥ gatena saṃveṣṭyamāṇā paritas cakāsti

original: madāttaratneti samatsareṇa kṛtoparodheva mahārṇaveṇa // PNc_1.45 //
analyzed: mad ātta ratnā iti sa matsareṇa kṛta uparodhā iva mahā arṇaveṇa

original: vilaṅghayanti śrutivartma yasyāṃ līlāvatīnāṃ nayanotpalāni /
analyzed: vilaṅghayanti śruti vartma yasyām līlāvatīnām nayana utpalāni

original: bibharti yasyām api vakrimāṇam eko mahākālajaṭārdhacandraḥ // PNc_1.46 //
analyzed: bibharti yasyām api vakrimāṇam ekaḥ mahākāla jaṭā ardhacandraḥ

original: dhvajāgralagnena vilambatā kham anekaratnāṃśukadambakena /
analyzed: dhvaja agra lagnena vilambatā kham aneka ratna aṃśu kadambakena

original: yasyāṃ sa caṇḍīpatimaṇḍapo 'pi bibharti māyūram ivātapattram // PNc_1.47 //
analyzed: yasyām sa caṇḍīpati maṇḍapaḥ u pi bibharti māyūram iva ātapattram

original: purā kila brahmakamaṇḍalor yat āpūritaṃ puṇyatamābhir adbhiḥ /
analyzed: purā kila brahma kamaṇḍaloḥ yat āpūritam puṇyatamābhiḥ adbhiḥ

original: dhatte 'tra yā tat tripurāntakasya taḍāgam ādarśam ivāṅkadeśe // PNc_1.48 //
analyzed: dhatte yā tat tripurāntakasya taḍāgam ādarśam iva aṅka deśe

original: yasyām anekāmaraveśmarājir maṇidhvajāgrocchalitair mayūkhaiḥ /
analyzed: yasyām aneka amara veśma rājiḥ maṇidhvaja agra ucchalitaiḥ mayūkhaiḥ

analyzed: yaśaḥ iva para bhūta bhṛtām niruddhya prasabham upāhṛtam ātmanaḥ yaśobhiḥ

original: abhinavabisaśaṅkayāpahṛtya sphaṭikamayīm asamakṣam akṣamālām /
analyzed: abhinava bisa śaṅkayā apahṛtya sphaṭika mayīm a samakṣam akṣamālām

original: vihagam iva vimānahaṃsapaṅkter vighaṭitam ekataraṃ caturmukhasya // PNc_3.15 //
analyzed: vihagam iva vimāna haṃsa paṅkteḥ vighaṭitam ekataram caturmukhasya

original: cyutam iva sitacāmaraṃ maghoneḥ śramajaḍavāravilāsinīkarāgrāt /
analyzed: cyutam iva sita cāmaram maghoneḥ śrama jaḍa vāravilāsinī kara agrāt

original: apahṛtam iva lolapatrajālaṃ surasaritaḥ pavanena puṇḍarīkam // PNc_3.16 //
analyzed: apahṛtam iva lola patra jālam surasaritaḥ pavanena puṇḍarīkam

original: harahasitasitaṃ divāpi kānti- stabakam ivāpatitam sudhākarasya /
analyzed: hara hasita sitam divā api kānti stabakam iva āpatitam sudhākarasya

original: api patitam ivāntarikṣapīlor maghavadibhasya vilāsakarṇaśaṅkham // PNc_3.17 //
analyzed: api patitam iva antarikṣa pīloḥ maghavat ibhasya vilāsa karṇa śaṅkham

original: [SYNTAX: kulakam]
analyzed: syntax kulakam

original: sa ca pariṇatalodhradhūliśuklas taralam avantipateś cakāra cetaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca pariṇata lodhra dhūli śuklaḥ taralam avanti pateḥ cakāra cetaḥ

analyzed: kisalayam iva bāla candanasya stimita gatiḥ malaya acala indra vātaḥ

original: nāyakavarṇanam
analyzed: nāyaka varṇanam

original: avadad atha vibuddhapuṇḍarīka- pratimam upāntacare nidhāya cakṣuḥ /
analyzed: avadat atha vibuddha puṇḍarīka pratimam upānta care nidhāya cakṣuḥ

original: daśanamaṇimayūkhabhinnavarṇāṃ girim iti mālavarājapūrṇacandraḥ // PNc_3.19 //
analyzed: daśanamaṇi mayūkha bhinna varṇām girim iti mālava rāja pūrṇacandraḥ

analyzed: surabhi kusuma cumbinā avanamrām ali paṭalena latām imām vinā me

original: khagam amum upadarśayet ka evaṃ gaganaramāpatipāñcajanyam anyaḥ // PNc_3.20 //
analyzed: khagam amum upadarśayet kaḥ evam gagana ramāpati pāñcajanyam anyaḥ

original: smaravarakarihastaśīkarāṇām vidadhati rucayo navahāramauktikānām /
analyzed: smara vara kari hasta śīkarāṇām vidadhati rucayaḥ nava hāra mauktikānām

original: vidadhati rucayo 'sya canncukoṭau kavalitabālamṛṇālasūtralīlām // PNc_3.21 //
analyzed: vidadhati rucayaḥ sya canncu koṭau kavalita bāla mṛṇāla sūtra līlām

original: ayi/ kathaya sitacchadaḥ kva cāyaṃ vananalinīpulināntabaddhavāsaḥ /
analyzed: ayi kathaya sitacchadaḥ kva ca ayam vana nalinī pulina anta baddha vāsaḥ

original: avanipatikalatrakaṇṭhayogyaḥ kva ca śaśibandhur anargha eṣa hāraḥ // PNc_3.22 //
analyzed: avanipati kalatra kaṇṭha yogyaḥ kva ca śaśibandhuḥ anarghaḥ eṣa hāraḥ

original: vanabhuvipatitaḥ kuto 'yam asyāṃ katham ayam asya mukhātithitvam āptaḥ? /
analyzed: vana bhuvi patitaḥ kutas yam asyām katham ayam asya mukha atithi tvam āptaḥ

original: guruvibhavapadasya kasya vā syād ayam iti me na paricchinatti cetaḥ // PNc_3.23 //
analyzed: guru vibhava padasya kasya vā syāt ayam iti me na paricchinatti cetaḥ

original: ayam ucitataraḥ phaṇistriyo vā kucakalaśāntaramartyayoṣito vā ? /
analyzed: ayam ucitataraḥ phaṇi striyaḥ vā kuca kalaśa antara martya yoṣitaḥ vā

original: niyatam udadhim udram īdṛśāni kṣititalam ābharaṇāni na spṛśanti // PNc_3.24 //
analyzed: niyatam udadhim udram īdṛśāni kṣiti talam ābharaṇāni na spṛśanti

original: kim aparam anugamya eṣa haṃsaḥ śramajaḍapakṣatirāvayor vanānte /
analyzed: kim aparam anugamyaḥ eṣa haṃsaḥ śrama jaḍa pakṣatiḥ āvayoḥ vana ante

original: ayi/ yad ayam avāmanasya bhūmir mukhadhṛtahāralataḥ kutūhalasy // PNc_3.25 a //
analyzed: ayi yat ayam a vāmanasya bhūmiḥ mukha dhṛta hāra lataḥ kutūhalasi

original: ramāṅgadavākyam
analyzed: ramāṅgada vākyam

original: iti viratavacasy udīrya tasmin kṛtini nṛpe paramāravaṃśaketau /
analyzed: iti virata vacasi udīrya tasmin kṛtini nṛpe paramāra vaṃśa ketau

analyzed: sphurat adhara vikīrṇa danta kānti prasaram idam jagade ramāṅgadena

original: jaḍarucir api rocate na kasmai katham api dīrghaguṇena labdhasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: jaḍa ruciḥ api rocate na kasmai katham api dīrgha guṇena labdha saṅgaḥ

analyzed: nara vara yat anena hāra dāmnā tava patagaḥ spṛhaṇīyaḥ eṣa jātaḥ

original: upavana iva sambhavaḥ kadācin nṛpa ghaṭate vipine 'pi hārayaṣṭeḥ /
analyzed: upavane iva sambhavaḥ kadācid nṛpa ghaṭate vipine hāra yaṣṭeḥ

original: yad asurasuranāgarājakanyā iha viharanti nagendrakandareṣu // PNc_3.28 //
analyzed: yat asura sura nāga rāja kanyāḥ iha viharanti naga indra kandareṣu

original: śakunir ayam ito digantalagnair anupamamauktikanirgatair mayūkhaiḥ /
analyzed: śakuniḥ ayam itas diś anta lagnaiḥ anupama mauktika nirgataiḥ mayūkhaiḥ

original: tava viracayatīva sūtrapātaṃ sukṛtanidhāna/
analyzed: tava viracayati iva sūtrapātam sukṛta nidhāna

original: bhaviṣyataḥ śubhasya // PNc_3.29 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyataḥ śubhasya

original: drutam ayam anugamyatām idānīm anugamanena yato 'sya hāralābhaḥ /
analyzed: drutam ayam anugamyatām idānīm anugamanena yatas sya hāra lābhaḥ

original: phalam adhikam ato 'pi naḥ kadācit kim api bhaved ayam asya hetuḥ // PNc_3.30 //
analyzed: phalam adhikam naḥ kadācid kim api bhavet ayam asya hetuḥ

original: taruviṭapalatāntareṇa gacchan bhuvam abhajan bahumuktameghavartmā /
analyzed: taru viṭapa latā antareṇa gacchan bhuvam abhajan bahu mukta megha vartmā

original: ayam atiguruhārabhārajātāṃ śramajaḍatāmalam ātmano vyanakti // PNc_3.31 //
analyzed: ayam ati guru hāra bhāra jātām śrama jaḍa tām alam ātmanaḥ vyanakti

original: nayanapatham ayaṃ yathā tavārāt tvam api tathāsya sitacchadasya yātaḥ /
analyzed: nayana patham ayam yathā tava ārāt tvam api tathā asya sitacchadasya yātaḥ

original: avanitalamṛgāṅka/
analyzed: avani tala mṛga aṅka

original: yad vanāntaś cakitam ivāyam itas tataḥ prayāti // PNc_3.32 //
analyzed: yat vana antar cakitam iva ayam itas tatas prayāti

original: niculavanam atītya vartate 'yam purata imām ayam abjinīm upetaḥ /
analyzed: nicula vanam atītya vartate yam puratas imām ayam abjinīm upetaḥ

original: navajaladharaśaṅkayeva śaṅke taruṇatamālavanādito nivṛttaḥ // PNc_3.33 //
analyzed: nava jaladhara śaṅkayā iva śaṅke taruṇa tamāla vanāt itas nivṛttaḥ

original: kisalayakalitāñjaliṃ tvarāvān ayam upasarpati nīlasinduvāram /
analyzed: kisalaya kalita añjalim tvarāvān ayam upasarpati nīla sinduvāram

original: kṣaṇam ayam iha bālacūtamaulau vicakilamālyavilāsam ādadhāti // PNc_3.34 //
analyzed: kṣaṇam ayam iha bāla cūta maulau vicakila mālya vilāsam ādadhāti

analyzed: ayam abhinava karṇikāra yaṣṭim jhaṭiti ghana stabaka stanīm upaiti

analyzed: ayam ati capalaḥ nisarga raktām sthala nalinīm deva yātaḥ

analyzed: ayam iha hi latām upaiti kaundīm kusumavatīm nava mādhavīm vilaṅghya

analyzed: kvaṇat ali valayāsu nāsu tena skhalitam itas sahakāra mañjarīṣu

analyzed: abhisarati vana sthalīm iva etām madanavatīm ayam ūḍha kāmi līlaḥ

analyzed: sphurat atanu śilīmukhasya ca agre vicarati karṇe iva ayam arjunasya

original: śramam apaharatas tanūrmivātair ayam atithir vanapalvalasya jātaḥ /
analyzed: śramam apaharataḥ tanu ūrmi vātaiḥ ayam atithiḥ vana palvalasya jātaḥ

original: tarutatiṣu tirohito 'yam etāsv ayam aravindavanād ivojjihīte // PNc_3.38 //
analyzed: taru tatiṣu tirohitaḥ yam etāsu ayam aravinda vanāt iva ujjihīte

analyzed: kurabaka vanataḥ kadamba rājim vrajati tatas muca kunda kānanāni

analyzed: iti nagam avagāhate sahāraḥ tvam iva dhrta klamaḥ eṣa rājahaṃsaḥ

analyzed: kuru vijayam itas mama arpya etat dhanuḥ adhunā sa suvarṇa puṅkha bāṇam

analyzed: yat ayam ita gatiḥ gataḥ ti dūram jalapatagaḥ saha naḥ kutūhalena

original: haṃsānugamanam
analyzed: haṃsa anugamanam

original: iti kathayati cāpam arpayitvā samam iṣubhiḥ sa ramāṅgade narendras /
analyzed: iti kathayati cāpam arpayitvā samam iṣubhiḥ sa ramāṅgade narendraḥ

analyzed: patagam anu tam ātta hāram harati na kam nava vastu saṃprayogaḥ

analyzed: ṛju tam atha vihāyasā vrajantam rabhasa vaśāt anugacchataḥ nṛpasya

analyzed: samajani bhṛśam āyataḥ sya panthāḥ taru viṭapa avaṭa varjanena vakraḥ

analyzed: nṛpatiḥ anuyayau vane vihaṅgam nṛpatim abhi praṇayī ramāṅgadaḥ pi

analyzed: śrutam iva viśadam śuciḥ vivekaḥ kṛtini vivekam iva antaraḥ prasādaḥ

analyzed: mada kala kalahaṃsa nāda kṛṣṭaḥ śrama viveśaḥ saḥ sitacchadaḥ prapede

analyzed: vilulita kabarī kalāpa mālyāḥ mṛdu nava śaivala mekhalāḥ vahantyaḥ

analyzed: rati raṇam avasāya yatra nityam saha ramaṇaiḥ amara aṅganāḥ ramante

analyzed: salila gata dhiyā atha tena dūrāt sa guruḥ amucyata niḥsahena hāraḥ

analyzed: jaḍa hṛta hṛdayāḥ kiyat ciram vā guṇa mahatām iha bhāram udvahanti

analyzed: sa ca vitata marīci cañcu lekhaḥ vigalita hāra latā āmiṣeṇa haṃsaḥ

original: pariṇatabisakāṇḍabhaṅgapītaṃ paya iva vistṛtadhāram ujjagāra // PNc_3.47 //
analyzed: pariṇata bisa kāṇḍa bhaṅga pītam payaḥ iva vistṛta dhāram ujjagāra

analyzed: atha kanaka mṛṇālikā yugasya dyuti nicayena citam visarpatā adhas

original: aśiśiramahaso visāriṇā khe valayitam aṃśulatākadambakena // PNc_3.48 //
analyzed: a śiśira mahasaḥ visāriṇā khe valayitam aṃśu latā kadambakena

analyzed: taṭa bhuvi tam apaśyat āpatantam patiḥ avane rava taṃsita āyata akṣaḥ

original: sitam abhinavahemadaṇḍaśobhi sphaṭikaśalākam ivātapatram aindram // PNc_3.49 //
analyzed: sitam abhinava hema daṇḍa śobhi sphaṭika śalākam iva ātapatram aindram

original: [SYNTAX: sandānitakam]
analyzed: syntax sandānitakam

original: sarasi dhavalite tataḥ samantād amṛtamarīciruceva tasya kāntyā /
analyzed: sarasi dhavalite tatas samantāt amṛta marīci rucā iva tasya kāntyā

analyzed: vyadhita balavatī viyoga pīḍā padam a pade hṛdayeṣu cakranāmnām

analyzed: ati vitata guṇa eka dhāmni tasmin vidhuram adhas patite viśuddhi bhāji

analyzed: katham api vasudhādhipaḥ pramodam jhaṭiti jagāma guṇiṣu amatsaraḥ hi

original: atha nabhasi piśaṅgasāndhyarāga- cchurita ivāmbaranimnagātaraṅgam /
analyzed: atha nabhasi piśaṅga sāndhya rāga churite iva ambara nimnagā taraṅgam

original: kiyad api sarasas taṭe sa gatvā kamalarajaḥkapiśe dadarśa hāram // PNc_3.52 //
analyzed: kiyat api sarasaḥ taṭe sa gatvā kamala rajaḥ kapiśe dadarśa hāram

original: sa ca sapadi ramāṅgadopanītaṃ kanakasaroruhakāntinā kareṇa /
analyzed: sa ca sapadi ramā aṅgada upanītam kanaka saroruha kāntinā kareṇa

original: nijayaśa iva mūrtam ādade taṃ bhuvanatalābhayadānadīkṣitena // PNc_3.53 //
analyzed: nija yaśaḥ iva mūrtam ādade tam bhuvana tala abhaya dāna dīkṣitena

original: sujanam iva guṇair upoḍhaśobhaṃ śucitarabālamṛṇālasūtradīrghaiḥ /
analyzed: su janam iva guṇaiḥ upoḍha śobham śucitara bāla mṛṇāla sūtra dīrghaiḥ

original: ahamahamikayā kṛtapraveśaṃ taraṇikaraglapitair ivendupādaiḥ // PNc_3.54 //
analyzed: ahamahamikayā kṛta praveśam taraṇi kara glapitaiḥ iva indu pādaiḥ

original: dadhatam aruṇam aṅgarāgaśeṣaṃ kvacid api yaṣṭiṣu tāramauktikāsu /
analyzed: dadhatam aruṇam aṅgarāga śeṣam kvacid api yaṣṭiṣu tāra mauktikāsu

original: ghaṭitam iva navātapena kiṃcid bahunavayā śaśalakṣmaṇas tviṣā ca // PNc_3.55 //
analyzed: ghaṭitam iva nava ātapena kiṃcid bahu navayā śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ tviṣā ca

original: ativitataruciṃ vahantam antas taralamaṇiṃ taruṇendragopaśr̆bham /
analyzed: ati vitata rucim vahantam antar tarala maṇim taruṇa indragopa śrbham

original: aviralam asakṛnnivāsalagnaṃ lalitavadhūhṛdayād ivānurāgam // PNc_3.56 //
analyzed: aviralam asakṛt nivāsa lagnam lalita vadhū hṛdayāt iva anurāgam

original: katicid api latāntare dadhānaṃ mṛgamadaliptatalāni mauktikāni /
analyzed: katicid api latā antare dadhānam mṛgamada lipta talāni mauktikāni

original: śabalajalalavair ivāttajanmāny ayam aranadīyamunātither ghanasya // PNc_3.57 //
analyzed: śabala jala lavaiḥ iva ātta janmāni ayam ara nadī yamunā atitheḥ ghanasya

original: anuguṇapadavīvinirgatāsu pratilatam āyatamauktikaprabhāsu /
analyzed: anuguṇa padavī vinirgatāsu pratilatam āyata mauktika prabhāsu

original: rajanikaramarīcisūcidīrghair bahubhir iva grathitaṃ mṛṇālasūtraiḥ // PNc_3.58 //
analyzed: raja nikara marīci sūci dīrghaiḥ bahubhiḥ iva grathitam mṛṇāla sūtraiḥ

original: atidṛḍham anuraktayā vitīrṇaṃ mukharamahodadhimekhalāṃ vahantyā /
analyzed: ati dṛḍham anuraktayā vitīrṇam mukhara mahodadhi mekhalām vahantyā

original: urasi nihitabandhujīvam urvyā vicakilamālyam iva svayaṃvarāya // PNc_3.59 //
analyzed: urasi nihita bandhujīvam urvyāḥ vicakila mālyam iva svayaṃvarāya

original: [SYNTAX: kulakam]
analyzed: syntax kulakam

original: arucad atha kare sa tasya bibhrad yuvatiradacchadakāntimadhyaratnam /
analyzed: arucat atha kare sa tasya bibhrat yuvati radacchada kānti madhya ratnam

original: kim api manasijena śāsanāṅkaḥ prahitanijāyudhacitrapuṣpamudraḥ // PNc_3.60 //
analyzed: kim api manasijena śāsana aṅkaḥ prahita nija āyudha citra puṣpa mudraḥ

original: śaśikararucā sa tena reje mṛdukarapuṣkaravartinā narendraḥ /
analyzed: śaśi kara rucā sa tena reje mṛdu kara puṣkara vartinā narendraḥ

original: amarapuradhunīsamuddhṛtena tridaśakarīva mṛṇālakandalena // PNc_3.61 //
analyzed: amara pura dhunī samuddhṛtena tridaśa karī iva mṛṇāla kandalena

original: itaḥ śilotsaṅgatale niṣeduṣā divaścyuteneva kuraṅgalakṣmaṇā /
analyzed: itas śilā utsaṅga tale niṣeduṣā divaḥ cyutena iva kuraṅga lakṣmaṇā

original: adhas taruṇām amunā vinīyate kṣaṇaṃ mṛgavyopanataḥ pariśramaḥ // PNc_4.33 //
analyzed: adhas taruṇām amunā vinīyate kṣaṇam mṛgavyā upanataḥ pariśramaḥ

original: ayaṃ sa na syān navasāhasāṅka ity anaṅgalīlāsu kṛtī bhuvaḥpatiḥ /
analyzed: ayam sa na syāt nava sāhasa aṅkaḥ iti anaṅga līlāsu kṛtī bhuvaḥpatiḥ

original: sa yena mukto nijanāmalāñchitaḥ śaśiprabhākelikuraṅgake śaraḥ // PNc_4.34 //
analyzed: sa yena muktaḥ nija nāma lāñchitaḥ śaśi prabhā keli kuraṅgake śaraḥ

original: ayaṃ sa no hāra ivāsya dṛśyate karodare pallavapāṭalatviṣi /
analyzed: ayam sa naḥ hāraḥ iva asya dṛśyate kara udare pallava pāṭala tviṣi

original: itaḥ kim etasya na saikate saḥ kiṃ sitacchado locanagocaraṃ gataḥ // PNc_4.35 //
analyzed: itas kim etasya na saikate saḥ kim sitacchadaḥ locana gocaram gataḥ

original: suvarṇapuṅkhe likhitaṃ śilīmukhe tad asya nāmāsti samānam ākṛteḥ /
analyzed: suvarṇa puṅkhe likhitam śilīmukhe tat asya nāma asti samānam ākṛteḥ

original: yad adbhutām ekapade pṛṣatkatām agād anaṅgasya śaśiprābhāṃ prati // PNc_4.36 //
analyzed: yat adbhutām eka pade pṛṣatka tām agāt anaṅgasya śaśi prābhām prati

original: anena ced yogam upaiti daivataḥ phanīndrakanyā śaśineva rohiṇī /
analyzed: anena ced yogam upaiti daivataḥ phanī indra kanyā śaśinā iva rohiṇī

original: analpalāvaṇyatiraskṛtopamaṃ vapus tad asyāḥ saphalatvam eṣyati // PNc_4.37 //
analyzed: analpa lāvaṇya tiraskṛta upamam vapuḥ tat asyāḥ saphala tvam eṣyati

original: vidhātum enām aham eva vā kṣamā mitodarīm aṅkatale 'sya ko vidhiḥ /
analyzed: vidhātum enām aham eva vā kṣamāḥ mita udarīm aṅka tale sya kaḥ vidhiḥ

original: mamedṛśe yadviṣaye vimatsarāḥ stuvanti sakhyo masṛṇoktisauṣṭhavam // PNc_4.38 //
analyzed: mama īdṛśe yat viṣaye vimatsarāḥ stuvanti sakhyaḥ masṛṇa ukti sauṣṭhavam

original: sahāmunā kiṃcidupāntavartinā vadaty asaūdgatadantadīdhitiḥ /
analyzed: saha amunā kiṃcid upānta vartinā vadati asau udgata danta dīdhitiḥ

original: kutūhalākṣiptanimeṣalāsyayā vilokayan mām iva dīrghayā dṛśā // PNc_4.39 //
analyzed: kutūhala ākṣipta nimeṣa lāsyayā vilokayan mām iva dīrghayā dṛśā

original: pāṭalāyāḥsamīpagamanam
analyzed: pāṭalāyāḥ samīpa gamanam

original: athādhigantuṃ kila tasya patriṇo gatiṃ vanānte katham apy alakṣitām /
analyzed: athā adhigantum kila tasya patriṇaḥ gatim vanānte katham api alakṣitām

original: tam abhyagāt sā nṛpatiṃ sacāmarā sarit saphenā nidhim ambhasām iva // PNc_4.40 //
analyzed: tam abhyagāt sā nṛpatim sa cāmarā sarit sa phenā nidhim ambhasām iva

original: samuccaran nūpurasinncitaiḥ padair yathā yathā saṃmukham ājagāma sā /
analyzed: samuccaran padaiḥ yathā yathā saṃmukham ājagāma sā

original: tayāyatākṣyeva tathātatheritā dṛg asya paścād apasāram ādade // PNc_4.41 //
analyzed: tayā āyata akṣyā iva tathā tathā īritā dṛś asya paścāt apasāram ādade

original: śanais tatas tāṃ savidhopasarpaṇīṃ nirīkṣya hāraṃ pidadhe narādhipaḥ /
analyzed: śanais tatas tām savidha upasarpaṇīm nirīkṣya hāram pidadhe narādhipaḥ

original: nijottarīyeṇa sitena mārutaḥ śaraddhaneneva śaśāṅkamaṇḍalam // PNc_4.42 //
analyzed: nija uttarīyeṇa sitena mārutaḥ śarad hanena iva śaśāṅka maṇḍalam

original: payodharotsaṅganivāsalālitaṃ vyadhād imaṃ pannagarājakanyakā /
analyzed: payodhara utsaṅga nivāsa lālitam vyadhāt imam pannaga rāja kanyakā

original: iti prarohadbahumānamantharo babhūva tasminn avanīpurandaraḥ // PNc_4.43 //
analyzed: iti prarohat bahu māna mantharaḥ babhūva tasmin avanīpurandaraḥ

original: analpalāvaṇyavilāsajanmabhūr vicitraratnadyutibhāsvarormikā /
tamiddhamuktābharaṇaṃ bhuvaḥpatiṃ payodhiveleva suvelam āpa sā // PNc_4.44 //
analyzed: tam iddha muktā ābharaṇam bhuvaḥpatim payodhi velā iva suvelam āpa sā

original: avāpa devaḥ śriyam antikasthayā tayā sa vālavyajanāṅkahastayā /
analyzed: avāpa devaḥ śriyam antika sthayā tayā sa vāla vyajana aṅka hastayā

original: niṣevyamāṇaḥ sphuṭalakṣyadehayā narendralakṣmyeva yaśaḥsametayā // PNc_4.45 //
analyzed: niṣevyamāṇaḥ sphuṭa lakṣya dehayā narendra lakṣmyā iva yaśaḥ sametayā

original: pāṭalākṛtaḥ satkāraḥ
analyzed: pāṭalā kṛtaḥ satkāraḥ

original: vibhinnacūrṇālakabhakti kurvatī vikīrṇacūḍāmaṇicandrikaṃ śiraḥ /
analyzed: vibhinna cūrṇa alaka bhakti kurvatī vikīrṇa cūḍāmaṇi candrikam śiraḥ

original: athānubhavena nideśiteva sā nanāma māninyavaśā viśāṃpatim // PNc_4.46 //
analyzed: athā anubhavena nideśitā iva sā nanāma māninī avaśā viśām patim

original: dṛśā narendreṇa nideśite svayaṃ śilātale nātividūravartini /
analyzed: dṛśā narendreṇa nideśite svayam śilā tale na ati vidūra vartini

original: upāviśat sā raśanāmaṇitviṣā niṣicyamāne 'maracāpaśobhini // PNc_4.47 //
analyzed: upāviśat sā raśanā maṇi tviṣā niṣicyamāne mara cāpa śobhini

original: ramāṅgadavākyam
analyzed: ramāṅgada vākyam

original: tayātidīrghair daśanānupātibhir vikṛṣyamāṇām iva bhūṣaṇāṃśubhiḥ /
analyzed: tayā ati dīrghaiḥ daśana anupātibhiḥ vikṛṣyamāṇām iva bhūṣaṇa aṃśubhiḥ

original: iti kṣitīśeṅgitavartmadīpikām udīrayām āsa giraṃ ramāṅgadaḥ // PNc_4.48 //
analyzed: iti kṣitīśa iṅgita vartma dīpikām udīrayām āsa giram ramāṅgadaḥ

original: anena vindhyādrivihārajanmanā śrameṇa kāmaṃ bhavatī kadarthitā /
analyzed: anena vindhya adri vihāra janmanā śrameṇa kāmam bhavatī kadarthitā

original: prasuptajūṭāhimukhāniloṣmaṇā jaṭāviṭaṅkendukaleva śūlinaḥ // PNc_4.49 //
analyzed: prasupta jūṭa ahi mukha anila ūṣmaṇā jaṭā viṭaṅka indu kalā iva śūlinaḥ

original: amī sarojapratime mukhe muhus tavātapātāmrakapolabhittini /
analyzed: amī saroja pratime mukhe muhur tava ātapa ātāmra kapolabhittini

original: samunmiṣanti śramavāribindavo natāṅgi lāvaṇyasudhālavās iva // PNc_4.50 //
analyzed: samunmiṣanti śrama vāri bindavaḥ nata aṅgi lāvaṇya sudhā lavāḥ iva

original: ito 'vataṃsotpalalāsyadeśike nirantaraṃ gandhavahe vahaty api /
analyzed: itas vataṃsa utpala lāsya deśike nirantaram gandhavahe vahati api

original: na ghūrṇate khinnalalāṭasaṅginī tavālakaśreṇir iyaṃ manāg api // PNc_4.51 //
analyzed: na ghūrṇate khinna lalāṭa saṅginī tava alaka śreṇiḥ iyam manāk api

original: anena pīnastanakampadāyinā nirāyatenodvahatā kaduṣṇatām /
analyzed: anena pīna stana kampa dāyinā nirāyatena udvahatā kaduṣṇa tām

original: atha pravālād api pāṭalacchavir na dūyate niḥśvasitena te 'dharaḥ // PNc_4.52 //
analyzed: atha pravālāt api pāṭala chaviḥ na dūyate niḥśvasitena te dharaḥ

original: uditya paṅktyā śramavārivipruṣāṃ nirantarādhyāsitarekhayānayā /
analyzed: uditya paṅktyā śrama vāri vipruṣām nirantara adhyāsita rekhayā anayā

original: tavaiṣa kaṇṭhaḥ kuṭajāvadātayā vilāsamuktālatatayeva bhūṣyate // PNc_4.53 //
analyzed: tava eṣa kaṇṭhaḥ kuṭaja avadātayā vilāsa muktā lata tayā iva bhūṣyate

original: idaṃ mahac citram amānuṣaṃ tvayā vigāhyate yad vanam advitīyayā /
analyzed: idam mahat citram amānuṣam tvayā vigāhyate yat vanam advitīyayā

original: imāḥ kva vindhyasya bhuvo 'tidurgamāḥ kva rājaveśmābharaṇaṃ bhavādṛśī // PNc_4.54 //
analyzed: imāḥ kva vindhyasya bhuvaḥ ti durgamāḥ kva rāja veśma ābharaṇam bhavādṛśī

original: navodgatāśokapalāśakāntinā nikāmaniryannakhacandrikeṇa ca /
analyzed: nava udgata aśoka palāśa kāntinā nikāma niryat nakha candrikeṇa ca

original: bibharṣi kasyedam anena pāṇinā vadāvadhūtendumarīci cāmaram // PNc_4.55 //
analyzed: bibharṣi kasya idam anena pāṇinā vada avadhūta indu marīci cāmaram

original: nṛpasya kasyāpi paricchadāṅganā yadi tvam uccair vibhavo hi ko 'pi sa /
analyzed: nṛpasya kasya api paricchada aṅganā yadi tvam uccais vibhavaḥ hi kaḥ pi sa

original: marutpatir menakayeva tanvi yas tvayāpi vālavyajanena vījyate // PNc_4.56 //
analyzed: marutpatiḥ menakayā iva tanvi yaḥ tvayā api vāla vyajanena vījyate

original: atha rdhimatyā paravaty asi striyā kayāpi kāsau jagadekasundarī /
analyzed: atha ṛdhimatyā paravatī asi striyā kayā api kā asau jagat eka sundarī

original: natabhru yasyāḥ smaracāpayaṣṭayo vidheyatāṃ yānti bhavadvidhā api // PNc_4.57 //
analyzed: nata bhru yasyāḥ smara cāpa yaṣṭayaḥ vidheya tām yānti bhavadvidhāḥ api

original: parasparaspardhi vilāsasampadāṃ trayaṃ bhavatsvāmitayā vikalpyate /
analyzed: paraspara spardhi vilāsa sampadām trayam bhavat svāmi tayā vikalpyate

original: marutvato vā ramaṇī ramātha vā kalatram ardhenduvibhūṣaṇasya vā ? // PNc_4.58 //
analyzed: marutvataḥ vā ramaṇī ramātha vā kalatram ardhendu vibhūṣaṇasya vā

original: iyaṃ paribhrāntir agendrakandare sakhīva te śaṃsati kāryagauravam /
analyzed: iyam paribhrāntiḥ aga indra kandare sakhī iva te śaṃsati kārya gauravam

original: bhavādṛśaḥ śvāpadadūṣite 'nyathā caranty araṇye kim adhīnanītayaḥ // PNc_4.59 //
analyzed: bhavādṛśaḥ śvāpada dūṣite nyathā caranti araṇye kim adhīna nītayaḥ

original: anena khelanmadadantinā vada tvam āgatā caṇḍi kuto duradhvanā /
analyzed: anena khelat mada dantinā vada tvam āgatā caṇḍi kutas duradhvanā

original: vidhāya viśleṣaviṣādam āvayoḥ svakāryaniṣṭhe kathaya kva yāsyasi ? // PNc_4.60 //
analyzed: vidhāya viśleṣa viṣādam āvayoḥ sva kārya niṣṭhe kathaya kva yāsyasi

original: nāyakavākyam
analyzed: nāyaka vākyam

original: iti sābhihitā mṛgāyatākṣī samupoḍhapraṇayaṃ yaśobhaṭena /
analyzed: iti sā abhihitā mṛga āyata akṣī samupoḍha praṇayam yaśobhaṭena

original: sahasā na jagāda lajjayā nu śramataḥ kiṃ tu nṛpas tu tām avocat // PNc_4.61 //
analyzed: sahasā na jagāda lajjayā nu śramataḥ kim tu nṛpaḥ tu tām avocat

original: śrāntāsi kautukahṛtena kadarthitāsi praśnair anena vihito na tavopacāraḥ /
analyzed: śrāntā asi kautuka hṛtena kadarthitā asi praśnaiḥ anena vihitaḥ na tava upacāraḥ

original: ātithyam eṣa kurute param aṅgalekhā- saṃvāhanaikacaturo niculānilas te // PNc_4.62 //
analyzed: ātithyam eṣa kurute param aṅga lekhā saṃvāhana eka caturaḥ nicula anilaḥ te

original: evaṃ nisargamadhureṇa sudhārasaika- niṣyandinā phaṇivadhūr atha sā hasantī /
analyzed: evam nisarga madhureṇa sudhā rasa eka nisyandinā phaṇi vadhūḥ atha sā hasantī

original: candrāṃśunā kumudinīva dinoṣmataptā vītaklamā narapater vacasā babhūva // PNc_4.63 //
analyzed: candra aṃśunā kumudinī iva dina ūṣma taptā vīta klamā narapateḥ vacasā babhūva

original: iti śrīmṛgāṅkaguptasūnoḥ parimalāparanāmnaḥ padmaguptasya kṛtau navasāhasāṅkacarite mahākāvye pāṭalādarśanaṃ nāma caturthaḥ sargaḥ ************************************************
analyzed: iti śrī mṛgāṅkagupta sūnoḥ parimala apara nāmnaḥ padmaguptasya kṛtau navasāhasāṅkacarite mahākāvye pāṭalādarśanam nāma caturthaḥ sargaḥ

original: pañcamaḥ sargaḥ
analyzed: pañcamaḥ sargaḥ

original: atha sā vadane navendukānti- smitam aṅke viniveśya cāmaraṃ ca /
analyzed: atha sā vadane nava indu kānti smitam aṅke viniveśya cāmaram ca

original: jagatīpatim evam ā babhāṣe masṛṇaṃ mūrtimatī vidagdhateva // PNc_5.1 //
analyzed: jagatīpatim evam ā babhāṣe masṛṇam mūrtimatī vidagdha tā iva

original: [VAR 5.1a: {kānti/lem /em; kānti /ed}]
analyzed: var

original: tvayi puṇyavaśena dṛṣtim āpte labhate śarma gataśramo mamātmā /
analyzed: tvayi puṇya vaśena dṛṣtim āpte labhate śarma gata śramaḥ mama ātmā

original: udite hi virocane nalinyā vitamastāmarasaṃ vikāsam eti // PNc_5.2 //
analyzed: udite hi virocane nalinyāḥ vitamaḥ tāmarasam vikāsam eti

original: atimātram upoḍhasaukumārye vacasi śrotram upeyuṣi tvadīye /
analyzed: atimātram upoḍha saukumārye vacasi śrotram upeyuṣi tvadīye

original: jhaṭiti pratibhāsate mamāyaṃ kaṭhinaś candanapallavāvataṃsaḥ // PNc_5.3 //
analyzed: jhaṭiti pratibhāsate mama ayam kaṭhinaḥ candana pallava avataṃsaḥ

original: kim ayaṃ mayi saṃbhramo 'yam āstāṃ kim ayaṃ na eva janaḥ paricchadas te /
analyzed: kim ayam mayi saṃbhramaḥ yam āstām kim ayam naḥ eva janaḥ paricchadaḥ te

original: upacāraviśeṣasaṃvidhāne pratipaccandra iva uditas tvam eva // PNc_5.4 //
analyzed: upacāra viśeṣa saṃvidhāne pratipad candraḥ iva uditaḥ tvam eva

original: bhavadiṅgitavedinaiva pṛṣṭā yad anenāham upāntavartinā te /
analyzed: bhavat iṅgita vedinā eva pṛṣṭā yat anena aham upānta vartinā te

original: kim u tat kathayāmi sammataṃ cet kriyatāṃ me svayam ājñayā prasādaḥ // PNc_5.5 //
analyzed: kim u tat kathayāmi sammatam ced kriyatām me svayam ājñayā prasādaḥ

original: nāyakanideśaḥ
abhidhehi lavaḥ kutūhalasya tvadudantaśravaṇe mamāpi jātaḥ /
analyzed: abhidhehi lavaḥ kutūhalasya tvad udanta śravaṇe mama api jātaḥ

original: iti sā vasudhāpater nideśād atha pātālavilāsinī jagāda // PNc_5.6 //
analyzed: iti sā vasudhā pateḥ nideśāt atha pātālavilāsinī jagāda

original: bhujaṅgalokavarṇanam
analyzed: bhujaṅga loka varṇanam

original: sa tava śrutim āpta eva tāvat smaralīlābhavanaṃ bhujaṅgalokaḥ /
analyzed: sa tava śrutim āptaḥ eva tāvat smara līlā bhavanam bhujaṅga lokaḥ

original: upayāti yad ekadeśasāmyaṃ na mahī nāpi purī purandarasya // PNc_5.7 //
analyzed: upayāti yat eka deśa sāmyam na mahī nā api purī purandarasya

original: atidurlabhasūryabhāsi yasmiṃs tamasām ullasatāṃ tiraskriyāyai /
analyzed: ati durlabha sūrya bhāsi yasmin tamasām ullasatām tiraskriyāyai

original: phaṇino 'ruṇakāntibhiḥ śirasthair maṇibhir bālam ivātapaṃ vahanti // PNc_5.8 //
analyzed: phaṇinaḥ ruṇa kāntibhiḥ śira sthaiḥ maṇibhiḥ bālam iva ātapam vahanti

original: anulimpati rodasī yathenduḥ prabhayā māṃ na tathety asūyayeva /
analyzed: anulimpati rodasī yathā induḥ prabhayā mām na tathā iti asūyayā iva

original: paṭu yaḥ pramādāvilāsahāsa- stabakair induparamparāḥ prasūte // PNc_5.9 //
analyzed: paṭu yaḥ pramāda āvilāsa hāsa stabakaiḥ indu paramparāḥ prasūte

original: savilāsam udastahastamuktair nikarair digdviradendraśīkarāṇām /
analyzed: sa vilāsam udasta hasta muktaiḥ nikaraiḥ diś dvirada indra śīkarāṇām

original: parito nicitāḥ sadaiva yasmin kakubhas tārikā ivāvabhānti // PNc_5.10 //
analyzed: paritas nicitāḥ sadā eva yasmin kakubhaḥ tārikāḥ iva avabhānti

original: pratibhāti dadhan phaṇākalāpe pṛthivīṃ yatra saḥ śeṣanāgarājaḥ /
analyzed: pratibhāti dadhan phaṇā kalāpe pṛthivīm yatra saḥ śeṣa nāga rājaḥ

original: nabhaso nipatañ javena bhittvā jagatīṃ gāṅga iva cyutaḥ pravāhaḥ // PNc_5.11 //
analyzed: nabhasaḥ nipatam javena bhittvā jagatīm gāṅgaḥ iva cyutaḥ pravāhaḥ

original: bhogavatīvarṇanam
analyzed: bhogavatī varṇanam

original: viditā khalu vāsukes trilokyāṃ harakaṇṭhābharaṇasya bhogibhartuḥ /
analyzed: viditā khalu vāsukeḥ trilokyām hara kaṇṭha ābharaṇasya bhogi bhartuḥ

original: lalitādbhutabhūmir asti tasmin nagarī bhogavatīti rājadhānī // PNc_5.12 //
analyzed: lalitā adbhuta bhūmiḥ asti tasmin nagarī bhogavatī iti rājadhānī

original: maṇiharmyatalāni ratnadīpāḥ phaṇikāntārdhavilokitāni vīṇāḥ /
analyzed: maṇi harmya talāni ratna dīpāḥ phaṇi kānta ardha vilokitāni vīṇāḥ

original: ṛtavo 'py akhilāḥ sametya yatra smarasāmrājyamahādhuraṃ vahanti // PNc_5.13 //
analyzed: ṛtavaḥ pi akhilāḥ sametya yatra smara sāmrājya mahā dhuram vahanti

original: anupādhir upāhṛto vikāsaḥ kamalair yatra vilāsadīrghikāsu /
analyzed: an upādhiḥ upāhṛtaḥ vikāsaḥ kamalaiḥ yatra vilāsa dīrghikāsu

original: api yatra kumudvatībhir astaḥ sahajaś candramarīcipakṣapātaḥ // PNc_5.14 //
analyzed: api yatra kumudvatībhiḥ astaḥ sahajaḥ candra marīci pakṣapātaḥ

original: abhikān abhisartum udyataḥ san sapadi vyālavilāsinīsamūhaḥ /
analyzed: abhikān abhisartum udyataḥ san sapadi vyāla vilāsinī samūhaḥ

original: bhavati svaphaṇāmaṇipradīpe timirotsāriṇi yatra sābhyasūyaḥ // PNc_5.15 //
analyzed: bhavati sva phaṇāmaṇi pradīpe timira utsāriṇi yatra sa abhyasūyaḥ

original: adhirohati yatra vaṃśamuktā- paṭalasmerataṭā surasravantī /

analyzed: smaram ūrdhva vilocana arciṣi iva tripuram yaḥ śara pāvake juhāva

jagadekalalāma tasya kanyā guṇavaty asti śaśiprabhā nāmnā /

analyzed: na ratiḥ na śacī na citralekhā na ghṛtācī na tilottamā na rambhā

analyzed: viharati apacīyamāna bālyā haraśaile malaye himālaye ca

analyzed: nikaṣā nicula pravāla śayyām tam atha prekṣitavatī āpta nidram

analyzed: jalade lalita indracāpa bhaktau ahimāṃśoḥ iva bhāsuraḥ mayūkhaḥ

analyzed: aravinda dala tviṣā kareṇa svayam utpāṭya sa kautukam gṛhīte

analyzed: avalokitam etayā atha tasmin vijaya aṅke navasāhasa aṅka nāma

analyzed: aviśat naranātha nāma pūrvam hṛdaye syāḥ sahasā atha puṣpaketuḥ

analyzed: amṛta aṃśu marīci lupta nidre labhate yat kumude ntaram dvirephaḥ

analyzed: nava megha malīmasāt yuga ante vasudhām uddharataḥ rathāṅga pāṇeḥ

analyzed: paritas śrama vāri bindavaḥ ye nirapīyanta payodha śukti yūthaiḥ

analyzed: prakṛtiḥ kila yasya te parītā pariṇāmena tad antare haṃsaḥ

analyzed: śayana anta gatam mṛṇāla śaṅki shṛtavān hāram adhīra locanāyāḥ

original: [SYNTAX: sandānitakam]
analyzed: syntax sandānitakam

analyzed: a pada arpita vaitaneya śaṅkaḥ phaṇi kanyāsu muhūrta viklavāsu

analyzed: ati dūra vikṛṣṭa nāga kanyā cakita udañcita dīrgha netra mālaḥ

original: ahirājasutānideśato 'smin asamāpteṣuvilokanotsavo 'pi /
analyzed: ahi rāja sutā nideśataḥ smin a samāpta iṣu vilokana utsavaḥ pi

analyzed: gahanāsu api tad gaveṣaṇāyai vana lekhāsu mama tu ayam prayatnaḥ

analyzed: sarasīṣu api nā āyata ūrmi lekhāḥ ntara pāriplava sārasāsu dṛṣṭaḥ

analyzed: acale vicayaḥ patatriṇaḥ yam phalitaḥ sādhu mama ahita śramaḥ

analyzed: uparodham imam na manyase ced yadi vā asmāsu tava asti pakṣapātaḥ

analyzed: na sa dṛṣṭim itas tava api manye tat aham tad vicayāt itas nivarte

analyzed: nanu tāmyati kāmam ātta cintā cirayantyām mayi sā ahi rāja kanyā

analyzed: punar pi pāṭala uktiḥ

analyzed: saḥ nṛ loka śaśī tvam eva manye mṛgayā baddha ruciḥ sa yat pṛṣatkaḥ

analyzed: sthitam etat ayomukheṣu amīṣu sphuta varṇam tava nāmadheya lakṣma

analyzed: samupaiti sa nātha tām kim anyat tritayena tritayam narendra candra

analyzed: tridivam namuci dviṣā tvayā iyam vasudhā vāsukinā rasātalam ca

analyzed: sanaye nṛpatau akhaṇḍita ājñe tvayi śāsati avanīm dilīpa kalpe

analyzed: vidadhīta padam su durnaye kaḥ tam ṛte hāra malimlucam vihaṅgam

analyzed: asatām asuhṛd na lajjate yam kim iti jyā kiṇa lāñchitaḥ bhujaḥ te

analyzed: avanau yat anena rakṣitāyām vayam asyām mūṣitāḥ patatriṇā api

analyzed: apayātu khagaḥ saḥ tena kṛtyam na hi me hāram iha tvam eva yācyaḥ

analyzed: na diśanti kim atra cora luptam bata ṣaṣṭa aṃśa bhujaḥ vasundharāyāḥ

original: pathi ced avatiṣṭhase praṇīte manunā nātha tad arpyatāṃ sa hāraḥ /
analyzed: pathi ced avatiṣṭhase praṇīte manunā nātha tat arpyatām sa hāraḥ

original: na narendra bhavādṛśāḥ kadācit padavīṃ nyāyavidāṃ vilaṅghayanti // PNc_5.52 //
analyzed: na narendra bhavādṛśāḥ kadācid padavīm nyāya vidām vilaṅghayanti

original: nijam arthayase śilīmukhaṃ ced bhavatā yatnavatāpi kiṃ na labhyaḥ? /
analyzed: nijam arthayase śilīmukham ced bhavatā yatnavatā api kim na labhyaḥ

original: tvam anāgasi yac chaśiprabhāyāḥ praharan kelimṛge kṛtavyālīkaḥ // PNc_5.53 //
analyzed: tvam anāgasi yat śaśiprabhāyāḥ praharan keli mṛge kṛta vyālīkaḥ

original: atha vā mṛgayiṣyate na hāraṃ viśikhaṃ dāsyati coragendrakanyā /
analyzed: atha vā mṛgayiṣyate na hāram viśikham dāsyati ca uraga indra kanyā

original: tvayi netrapathātithitvam āpte sulabho 'syā hi mahājanoparodhaḥ // PNc_5.54 //
analyzed: tvayi netra patha atithi tvam āpte sulabhaḥ syāḥ hi mahā jana uparodhaḥ

original: atidūrato dṛśyate 'yaṃ tvam ivābhyunnatimānino nagendraḥ /
analyzed: ati dūratas dṛśyate yam tvam iva abhyunnati māninaḥ naga indraḥ

original: vahati praṇayoparuddhakūlā kalahaṃsair amum antareṇa revā // PNc_5.55 //
analyzed: vahati praṇaya uparuddha kūlā kalahaṃsaiḥ amum antareṇa revā

original: amṛtendukalāsahodarāsyāḥ sutanus tīratale 'vatiṣṭhate sā /
analyzed: amṛta indu kalā sahodara āsyāḥ su tanuḥ tīra tale vatiṣṭhate sā

original: urasīva payodhirājakanyā vanamālābharaṇe rathāṅgapāṇeḥ // PNc_5.56 //
analyzed: urasi iva payodhi rāja kanyāḥ vanamālā ābharaṇe rathāṅga pāṇeḥ

original: tad itaḥ svayam eva deva gatvā pulinaṃ somabhuvas taraṅgavatyāḥ /
analyzed: tat itas svayam eva deva gatvā pulinam soma bhuvaḥ taraṅgavatyāḥ

original: khagaluptavibhūṣaṇaṃ kṣitau te phaṇirājendrasutāṃ vibodhayehi // PNc_5.57 // c
analyzed: khaga lupta vibhūṣaṇam kṣitau te phaṇi rāja indra sutām vibodhaya ihi c

original: iti tadvacasā smaraikadūta- prasavollāsavasantavāsareṇa /
analyzed: iti tad vacasā smara eka dūta prasava ullāsa vasanta vāsareṇa

original: so nṛpaḥ kam api pramodam āpat ghanarājidhvanineva nīlakaṇṭhaḥ // PNc_5.58 //
analyzed: saḥ nṛpaḥ kam api pramodam āpat ghana rāji dhvaninā iva nīlakaṇṭhaḥ

original: avadac ca vihasya pārthivendraḥ phaṇirājendrasutāvilāsinīṃ tām /
analyzed: avadat ca vihasya pārthiva indraḥ phaṇi rāja indra sutā vilāsinīm tām

original: vacasotkayatā mayūraśāvān navajīmūtaninādasodareṇa // PNc_5.59 //
analyzed: vacasā utkayatā mayūra śāvān nava jīmūta nināda sodareṇa

original: api nāma mṛdūni vetsi vaktuṃ nipunaṃ nyāyam anujjhatī vacāṃsi /
analyzed: api nāma mṛdūni vetsi vaktum nipunam nyāyam an ujjhatī vacāṃsi

original: prasabhaṃ vihitās tvayā yad ete vayam ātmaskhalite 'pi sāparādhāḥ // PNc_5.60 //
analyzed: prasabham vihitāḥ tvayā yat ete vayam ātma skhalite sa aparādhāḥ

original: idam om iti gṛhyate vacas te saha medhāvini kas tvayā vivādaḥ /
analyzed: idam om iti gṛhyate vacaḥ te saha medhāvini kaḥ tvayā vivādaḥ

original: yad imā viśadodgamā giras te pathi siddhāntasamīkṣite caranti // PNc_5.61 //
analyzed: yat imāḥ viśada udgamāḥ giraḥ te pathi siddhānta samīkṣite caranti

original: tad anena vinodayāśu tāvan mama hāreṇa manaḥ śaśiprabhāyāḥ /
analyzed: tat anena vinodaya āśu tāvat mama hāreṇa manaḥ śaśiprabhāyāḥ

original: iha palvalasaikateṣu yāvat tadalaṅkāram avekṣituṃ yatiṣyate // PNc_5.62 //
analyzed: iha palvala saikateṣu yāvat tad alaṅkāram avekṣitum yatiṣyate

original: hārapradānam
analyzed: hāra pradānam

original: atha hāram anādareṇa kaṇṭhāt svayam ākṛṣya saḥ kṛṣṭacandraśobham /
analyzed: atha hāram anādareṇa kaṇṭhāt svayam ākṛṣya saḥ kṛṣṭa candra śobham

original: vihasann aravindakośatāmre nidade pāṇitale vilāsavatyāḥ // PNc_5.63 //
analyzed: vihasan aravinda kośa tāmre nidade pāṇi tale vilāsavatyāḥ

original: api kośagṛhodare durāpaṃ phaṇināṃ bhartur upoḍhavismayā sā /

analyzed: śarad prasanne saritaḥ pratimā induḥ iva ambhasi

original: stanapatralatāṃ tasyā bibheda pulakodgamaḥ /

original: satyaṃ yadantaraṅgeṇa bahiraṅgo nirasyate // PNc_6.37 //

original: tasyāḥ kucayuge kiṃcin niśvāsaḥ kampam ādadhe /

original: rathāṅganāmamithune sāyantana ivānilaḥ // PNc_6.38 //
analyzed: rathāṅga nāma mithune sāyantanaḥ iva anilaḥ

original: viśato 'ntar anaṅgasya lājāñjalir ivojjhitaḥ // PNc_6.39 //
analyzed: viśataḥ ntar anaṅgasya lāja añjaliḥ iva ujjhitaḥ

original: śaṅke śaram ṛjūkurvan dadṛśe manmathas tayā /
analyzed: śaṅke śaram ṛjūkurvan dadṛśe manmathaḥ tayā

original: yat sā mṛdukvaṇatkāñci- kiṅkiṇīkam akampata // PNc_6.40 //
analyzed: yat sā mṛdu kvaṇat kāñci kiṅkiṇīkam akampata

original: eṣa dṛṣṭas tvayety uktā sakhyā sā sādhvasākulā /
analyzed: eṣa dṛṣṭaḥ tvayā iti uktā sakhyā sā sādhvasa ākulā

original: gadgadākṣaram avyaktaṃ kṛcchrāt prativaco dadau // PNc_6.41 //
analyzed: gadgada akṣaram avyaktam kṛcchrāt prativacaḥ dadau

original: citravartiny api nṛpe tattvāveśena cetasi /
analyzed: citravartini api nṛpe tattva āveśena cetasi

original: vrīḍārdhavalitaṃ cakre mukhendum avaśaiva sā // PNc_6.42 //
analyzed: vrīḍā ardha valitam cakre mukha indum avaśā eva sā

original: dṛṣṭā sakhībhiḥ sākūtaṃ sā bālādharapallave /
analyzed: dṛṣṭā sakhībhiḥ sa ākūtam sā bāla adhara pallave

analyzed: vailakṣya hasitam prasūnam iva mādhavī

original: navaṃ prema navotkaṇṭhā navās te te manorathāḥ /
analyzed: navam prema nava utkaṇṭhāḥ navāḥ te te manorathāḥ

analyzed: iti tasyāḥ tathā evā abhūt antaraṅgaḥ paricchadaḥ

analyzed: tam ānarca iva rāja indum animitta smitena sā

analyzed: kṛta aṅga bhaṅga valanā jhaṭiti ālasyam āyayau

analyzed: tad kṣaṇena eva sā citram tanvī tad maya tām yayau

original: kaṃ na pratārayaty eṣa kitavaḥ kusumāyudhaḥ // PNc_6.47 //
analyzed: kam na pratārayati eṣa kitavaḥ kusumāyudhaḥ

analyzed: stimitā iva avatasthe sā sāraṅga āyata locanā

original: acetaneva śūnyeva suptevālikhiteva ca // PNc_6.48 //
analyzed: acetanā iva śūnyā iva suptā iva a likhitā iva ca

analyzed: smareṇa marmaṇi kvāpi sā avidhyata sumadhyamā

analyzed: anidritā api yat sā abhūt kṣaṇam mukulita īkṣaṇā

analyzed: vyañcita anaṅga līlena śṛṅgāra rasa bandhunā

analyzed: tanvī nava anurāgeṇa sā anyā eva ghaṭitā abhavat

original: ṛjunā aikṣata yac citraṃ yad abhūc ca trapāvatī /

original: tenātigūḍhabhāvāpi sā sakhībhir alakṣyata // PNc_6.51 //
analyzed: tena ati gūḍha bhāvā api sā sakhībhiḥ alakṣyata

original: athānaṅgavatī nāma sakhī tām ity avocata /

original: daśanajyotsnayāraṇyaṃ sudhayeva niṣiñcatī // PNc_6.52 //
analyzed: daśana jyotsnayā araṇyam sudhayā iva niṣiñcatī

original: kac cid asya pramodāya kumudasyeva cakṣuṣaḥ /

original: ayaṃ madhyamalokenduḥ pātālendukale tava // PNc_6.53 //
analyzed: ayam madhyama loka induḥ pātāla indu kale tava

analyzed: roma udgamaḥ iva anena dhṛtaḥ tvad avalokanāt

original: kandarpādhikakānto 'yam avantimṛgalāñchanaḥ // PNc_6.55 //
tvām apy avāñcitāṃ manye yat tvayaitasya vakṣasi /
analyzed: tvām api a vāñcitām manye yat tvayā etasya vakṣasi

analyzed: ete sa vibhramam nyaste dṛśau muktā late iva

analyzed: ārohati parām koṭim atra yat tava sambhramaḥ

original: tvam atra baddhabhāveva kim indumukhi lajjase /
analyzed: tvam atra baddha bhāvā iva kim indu mukhi lajjase

analyzed: vilaṅghayati a laṅghyāni smara durlalitāni kaḥ

analyzed: kaḥ sakhi nṛśaṃsaḥ sti kāmam viṣama bāṇataḥ

original: sukumāre tavāpy aṅge yena vyāpāritaḥ śaraḥ // PNc_6.59 //
analyzed: sukumāre tava api aṅge yena vyāpāritaḥ śaraḥ

original: bimbauṣṭhe eva rāgas te tanvi pūrvam adṛśyata /
analyzed: bimba oṣṭhe eva rāgaḥ te tanvi pūrvam adṛśyata

original: adhunā hṛdaye 'py eṣa mṛgaśāvākṣi lakṣyate // PNc_6.60 //
analyzed: adhunā hṛdaye pi eṣa mṛgaśāvākṣi lakṣyate

analyzed: anena tu dvitīyena likhitena api te manaḥ

analyzed: kutas trapā tava ālīṣu kiṃcid unnamaya ānanam

analyzed: aho bata tvam etasmin atyāyata kutūhalā

analyzed: tvat udantam iva etasya kathayati ali kūjitaiḥ

original: indukāntaśileva tvam ārdratām avagāhase // PNc_6.64 //
analyzed: indukānta śilā iva tvam ārdra tām avagāhase

analyzed: tathā tathā tava vyaktam ayam ucchvasati smaraḥ

analyzed: idam nirjita bālyasya yauvanasya uditam yaśaḥ

original: yathā taveyam aratir yathā sutanu vepase /

original: tathā kavacitaḥ śaṅke niḥśaṅkaṃ madanas tvayi // PNc_6.67 //
analyzed: tathā kavacitaḥ śaṅke niḥśaṅkam madanaḥ tvayi

eṣa stabakito 'śokaḥ suhṛt kāmasya kā gatiḥ // PNc_6.72 //
analyzed: eṣa śokaḥ suhṛd kāmasya kā gatiḥ

analyzed: smita chaṭā iva niryāti sinduvārasya mañjarī

original: marutā dviradasyeva madaniṣyandagandhinā // PNc_6.91 //

analyzed: tatas sya ṣaṭpadasya iva balāt cetaḥ hariṣyati

original: sthirā bhava nṛpena tvam iha saṃyogam āpsyasi /
analyzed: sthirā bhava nṛpena tvam iha saṃyogam āpsyasi

original: yathā kaṇvāśrame pūrvaṃ duṣyantena śakuntalā // PNc_6.94 //
analyzed: yathā kaṇva āśrame pūrvam duṣyantena śakuntalā

analyzed: vyāja sācīkṛta mukham niśaśvāsa śaśiprabhā

analyzed: cukūja mañju kaṇṭhaḥ tām dakṣiṇena kapiñjalaḥ

original: harṣāśrulavakīrṇena satpatrāvalicāruṇā /

analyzed: vāmena pasphure tasyāḥ cakṣuṣā ca stanena ca

original: narendrasavitus tasya puraḥ sandhyeva pāṭalā // PNc_6.98 //
analyzed: narendra savituḥ tasya puras sandhyā iva pāṭalā

original: tasyās traye ca tritayam apaśyat phaṇikanyakā /

original: mukhe smitaṃ kare hāraṃ sitam aṃse ca cāmaram // PNc_6.99 //
analyzed: mukhe smitam kare hāram sitam aṃse ca cāmaram

original: sā hārahastā ruruce dhṛtastimitacāmarā /

original: sarasī suptahaṃseva phenādhyāsitapaṅkajā // PNc_6.100 //
analyzed: sarasī supta haṃsā iva phena adhyāsita paṅkajā

original: dṛṣṭiḥ phanīndraduhitur atikramyaiva pāṭalām /
analyzed: dṛṣṭiḥ phanīndra duhituḥ atikramya eva pāṭalām

original: bhṛṅgaśreṇir ivāśoke papātāvantibhartari // PNc_6.101 //
analyzed: bhṛṅga śreṇiḥ iva aśoke papāta avanti bhartari

original: priyaṃ naḥ sa ayam āyāti paśya paśya śaśiprabhe /
analyzed: priyam naḥ saḥ ayam āyāti paśya paśya śaśiprabhe

original: paramārānvayodāra- hāramadhyamaṇir nṛpas // PNc_6.102 //
analyzed: para māra anvaya udāra hāra madhya maṇiḥ

original: iti priyasakhīsūkti- sudhāniṣyandalekhayā /
analyzed: iti priya sakhīsu ukti sudhā nisyanda lekhayā

original: sikte tadābhavat tasyāḥ smaraḥ pallavito hṛdi // PNc_6.103 //
analyzed: sikte tadā abhavat tasyāḥ smaraḥ pallavitaḥ hṛdi

original: [SYNTAX: sandānitakam]
analyzed: syntax sandānitakam

original: sudhārasa ivorvībhṛt tayā saṃmukham āpatan /
analyzed: sudhā rasaḥ iva urvībhṛt tayā saṃmukham āpatan

original: dṛśā sphaṭikaśuktyeva vāraṃvāram apīyata // PNc_6.104 //
analyzed: dṛśā sphaṭika śuktyā iva vāram vāram apīyata

original: vitene 'py ahikanyābhiḥ kautukenātanīyasā /
analyzed: vitene pi ahi kanyābhiḥ kautukena atanīyasā

analyzed: tasya agre rājahaṃsasya netra indīvara vāgurā

analyzed: avantitilaka udantam upasṛtya atha pāṭalā
