analyzed: anaṅga dīpanam tasyai jagāda iṅgita vedinī

original: deva paścātsthito 'py agre prāptaḥ paryutsuko bhavān /
analyzed: deva paścāt sthitaḥ u pi agre prāptaḥ paryutsukaḥ bhavān

original: ity abhāṣyata bhūpālaḥ citre caturayā tayā // PNc_6.107 //
analyzed: iti abhāṣyata bhūpālaḥ citre caturayā tayā

original: abhūt paryākulā sā ca muhūrtam asitekṣaṇā /
analyzed: abhūt paryākulā sā ca muhūrtam asita īkṣaṇā

original: paścād alajjatālībhis tathā sasmitam īkṣitā // PNc_6.108 //
analyzed: paścāt alajja tālībhiḥ tathā sa smitam īkṣitā

original: tasyai hāraṃ mahībhartur arpayām āsa pāṭalā /
analyzed: tasyai hāram mahībhartuḥ arpayām āsa pāṭalā

original: ākṛṣya bhartum ānītam atiśuddham iva āśayam // PNc_6.109 //
analyzed: ākṛṣya bhartum ānītam atiśuddham iva āśayam

original: sakhīnām anurodhena sā kilānaṅgamohitā /
analyzed: sakhīnām anurodhena sā kila anaṅga mohitā

original: hṛdi dīrghaguṇaṃ dadhre hāraṃ priyam ivāparam // PNc_6.110 //
analyzed: hṛdi dīrgha guṇam dadhre hāram priyam iva aparam

original: tuṣārapāṇḍunā tena vavṛdhe 'syā manobhavaḥ /
analyzed: tuṣāra pāṇḍunā tena vavṛdhe syāḥ manobhavaḥ

original: digantavāntajyotsnena mahodadhir ivendunā // PNc_6.111 //
analyzed: diganta vānta jyotsnena mahodadhiḥ iva indunā

original: puṣpodgameneva latā prasādeneva bhāratī /
analyzed: puṣpa udgamena iva latā prasādena iva bhāratī

original: sā tena reje hāreṇa yaśaseva narendratā // PNc_6.112 //
analyzed: sā tena reje hāreṇa yaśasā iva narendra tā

original: tataḥ śithilaparyasta- vilolakabarīlatā /
analyzed: tatas vilola kabarī latā

original: ketuyaṣṭir iva śyāma- patākāṅgā hiraṇmayī // PNc_6.113 //
analyzed: ketu yaṣṭiḥ iva śyāma patākā aṅgā hiraṇmayī

original: vasaṃtakamalollāsi- mattabhramaraniḥsvanā /
analyzed: vasaṃta kamala ullāsi matta bhramara niḥsvanā

original: dīpamānopadeśeva svarahasye manobhuvaḥ // PNc_6.114 //
analyzed: dīpamāna upadeśā iva sva rahasye manobhuvaḥ

original: ullasatkuṭajācchāccha- vilāsahasitacchaviḥ /
analyzed: ullasat kuṭaja accha accha vilāsa hasita chaviḥ

original: jhaṭity uadadhiveleva nirgacchad amṛtacchaṭā // PNc_6.115 //
analyzed: jhaṭiti nirgacchat amṛta chaṭā

original: sarojinīva haṃsībhir bhṛṅgībhir iva mālatī /
analyzed: sarojinī iva haṃsībhiḥ bhṛṅgībhiḥ iva mālatī

original: śaśilekheva tārābhiḥ sakhībhir abhito vṛtā // PNc_6.116 //
analyzed: śaśi lekhā iva tārābhiḥ sakhībhiḥ abhitas vṛtā

original: dṛṣṭvā narandram āyāntam udasthād utsukātha sā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā narandram āyāntam udasthāt utsukā atha sā

original: dadhatī nūtanaprema- pariṇītām adhīratām // PNc_6.117 //
analyzed: dadhatī nūtana prema pariṇītām adhīra tām

original: [SYNTAX: kulakam]
analyzed: syntax kulakam

original: atha sutanur alolatārake sā suciram udañcitadīrghapakṣmamāle /
analyzed: atha su tanuḥ alola tārake sā su ciram udañcita dīrgha pakṣma māle

original: śaśina iva navodgatasya dūrāt- avanipateḥ pathi locane mumoca // PNc_6.118 //
analyzed: śaśinaḥ iva nava udgatasya dūrāt avanipateḥ pathi locane mumoca

original: āsannānucaradhṛtena paṅkajinyāḥ patreṇa sphuṭaghaṭitātapatralīlaḥ /
analyzed: āsanna anucara dhṛtena paṅkajinyāḥ patreṇa sphuṭa ghaṭita ātapatra līlaḥ

original: saś cchāyām atha mahasā hasan himāṃśoḥ kṣmāpālaḥ pulinam avāpa narmadāyās // PNc_6.119 //
analyzed: saḥ chāyām atha mahasā hasan himāṃśoḥ kṣmāpālaḥ pulinam avāpa narmadāyāḥ

original: iti śrīmṛgāṅkaguptasūnoḥ parimalāparanāmnaḥ padmaguptasya kṛtau navasāhasāṅkacarite mahākāvye śaśiprabhādarśano nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ sargaḥ ************************************************
analyzed: iti śrī mṛgāṅkagupta sūnoḥ parimala apara nāmnaḥ padmaguptasya kṛtau navasāhasāṅkacarite mahākāvye śaśiprabhādarśanaḥ nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ sargaḥ

original: saptamaḥ sargaḥ
analyzed: saptamaḥ sargaḥ

original: śaśiprabhādarśanam
analyzed: śaśi prabhā darśanam

original: tataḥ sa dūrād ahirājakanyakāṃ javaikamitreṇā yutāṃ patatriṇā /
analyzed: tatas sa dūrāt ahi rāja kanyakām java eka mitreṇa ā yutām patatriṇā

original: viśāmpatidīrghaguṇānuṣaṅgiṇīm anaṅgakodaṇḍalatām ivaikṣata // PNc_7.1 //
analyzed: viśām pati dīrgha guṇa anuṣaṅgiṇīm anaṅga kodaṇḍa latām iva aikṣata

original: upoḍhalāvaṇyataraṅgabhaṅgayā sarāgabimbauṣṭhagalatpravālayā /
analyzed: upoḍha lāvaṇya taraṅga bhaṅgayā sa rāga bimba oṣṭha galat pravālayā

original: ahāri lolaṃ nṛpates tayā balāt anaṅgaratnākaravelayā manaḥ // PNc_7.2 //
analyzed: ahāri lolam nṛpateḥ tayā balāt anaṅga ratna ākara velayā manaḥ

original: ramāṅgadakṛtaṃ śaśiprabhāvarṇanam
analyzed: ramāṅgada kṛtam śaśi prabhā varṇanam

original: savismayo locanamārgam āptayā tayā saḥ pātālatalendulekhayā /
analyzed: sa vismayaḥ locana mārgam āptayā tayā saḥ pātāla tala indu lekhayā

original: athettham amlānamanorathodgamo ramāṅgadenābhidadhe narādhipaḥ // PNc_7.3 //
analyzed: athā ittham a mlāna manoratha udgamaḥ ramāṅgadena abhidadhe narādhipaḥ

original: avaimi saiveyam amogham āyudhaṃ manobhuvaḥ pannagarājakanyakā /
analyzed: avaimi sā evā iyam amogham āyudham manobhuvaḥ pannaga rāja kanyakā

original: udaṃśulekhena mukhena kurvatī jagad vilīnenduvilokanaspṛham // PNc_7.4 //
analyzed: udaṃśu lekhena mukhena kurvatī jagat vilīna indu vilokana spṛham

original: narendra satyaṃ saḥ kutūhalī bhaved alaukikaṃ rūpam avekṣituṃ rateḥ /
analyzed: narendra satyam saḥ kutūhalī bhavet alaukikam rūpam avekṣitum rateḥ

original: iyaṃ na yasyātithitāṃ gatā dṛśor agādhalāvaṇyasarit sumadhyamā // PNc_7.5 //
analyzed: iyam na yasya atithi tām gatā dṛśoḥ agādha lāvaṇya sarit sumadhyamā

original: iyaṃ sudhā mugdhavilāsajanmabhūr iyaṃ bhujaṅgālayaratnadīpikā /
analyzed: iyam sudhā mugdha vilāsa janma bhūḥ iyam bhujaṅga ālaya ratna dīpikā

original: iyaṃ jagannetracakoracandrikā puraḥ patākeyam ayugmapatriṇaḥ // PNc_7.6 //
analyzed: iyam jagat netra cakora candrikā puras patākā iyam ayugma patriṇaḥ

original: iyattayā muktam avaimi naipuṇaṃ prajāpater adbhutaśilpakarmaṇi /
analyzed: iyat tayā muktam avaimi naipuṇam prajāpateḥ adbhuta śilpa karmaṇi

original: nṛpopamānām upamānatāṃ gataṃ vinirmitaṃ yena hi ratnam īdṛśam // PNc_7.7 //
analyzed: nṛpa upamānām upamāna tām gatam vinirmitam yena hi ratnam īdṛśam

original: iyaṃ tavānena virājatetarāṃ karasthitenāvanipālapatriṇā /
analyzed: iyam tava anena virājatetarām kara sthitena avanipāla patriṇā

original: upeyuṣā kāñcanapadmam aṃśunā himetarāṃśor iva jahnukanyakā // PNc_7.8 //
analyzed: upeyuṣā kāñcana padmam aṃśunā himetara aṃśoḥ iva jahnu kanyakā

original: arālakeśīyam anena bhāti te śareṇa kārtasvarapuṅkhaśobhinā /
analyzed: arāla keśīyam anena bhāti te śareṇa kārtasvara puṅkha śobhinā

original: nisargagaureṇa narendraraśminā sakajjalā dīpaśikheva śārvarī // PNc_7.9 //
analyzed: nisarga gaureṇa narendra raśminā sa kajjalā dīpa śikhā iva śārvarī

original: iyaṃ vilāsorminimagnaśaiśavaṃ svibhāvyamānastanakuḍmalodgamam /
analyzed: iyam vilāsa ūrmi nimagna śaiśavam svibhāvyamāna stana kuḍmala udgamam

original: madaikavisrambhagṛhaṃ vigāhate vayo vibhaktāṅgam anaṅgadohadam // PNc_7.10 //
analyzed: mada eka visrambha gṛham vigāhate vayaḥ vibhakta aṅgam anaṅga dohadam

original: iyaṃ natāṅgī jagadekasundare nideśite pāṭalayā nṛpa tvayi /
analyzed: iyam nata aṅgī jagat eka sundare nideśite pāṭalayā nṛpa tvayi

original: dṛśau navendīvarapatrapeśale vimuñcati śrīr iva śārṅgadhanvani // PNc_7.11 //
analyzed: dṛśau nava indīvara patra peśale vimuñcati śrīḥ iva śārṅgadhanvani

original: anaṅgasāmrājyavilāsacāmare vanānilavyākulite 'ṃsucumbini /
analyzed: anaṅga sāmrājya vilāsa cāmare vana anila vyākulite ṃsu cumbini

original: pariślathe saṃyamanārtham etayā salīlam astaḥ kabarībhare karaḥ // PNc_7.12 //
analyzed: pariślathe saṃyamana artham etayā sa līlam astaḥ kabarībhare karaḥ

original: vilokayantī kusumaṃ kacāgrataś cyutaṃ kucasparśadhiyeva vakṣasi /
analyzed: vilokayantī kusumam kaca agratas cyutam kuca sparśa dhiyā iva vakṣasi

original: iyaṃ kṛśāṅgī kusumāstraśaṅkayā kṛtapraṇāmeva tavāvalokyate // PNc_7.13 //
analyzed: iyam kṛśa aṅgī kusuma astra śaṅkayā kṛta praṇāmā iva tava avalokyate

original: vilokayāsyāḥ kṣitipāla bibhratīṃ pradīpaśobhāṃ kabarīṃ niśāmukhe /
analyzed: vilokaya asyāḥ kṣitipāla bibhratīm pradīpa śobhām kabarīm niśā mukhe

original: amī muhuḥ kuṅkumakesarāruṇā lasanti sīmantamaṇer marīcayaḥ // PNc_7.14 //
analyzed: amī muhur kuṅkuma kesara aruṇāḥ lasanti sīmantamaṇeḥ marīcayaḥ

original: virājate 'syās tilako 'yam añcito vikuñcitabhrūlatikāntare nṛpa /
analyzed: virājate syāḥ tilakaḥ yam añcitaḥ vikuñcita bhrū latikā antare nṛpa

original: vijitya lokadvitayaṃ divaṃ prati smareṇa bāṇo dhanuṣīva saṃhitaḥ // PNc_7.15 //
analyzed: vijitya loka dvitayam divam prati smareṇa bāṇaḥ dhanuṣi iva saṃhitaḥ

original: apāṅgasaṃvardhitaśoṇakāntinā sukṛṣṇatāreṇa tuṣārapāṇḍunā /
analyzed: apāṅga saṃvardhita śoṇa kāntinā su kṛṣṇa tāreṇa tuṣāra pāṇḍunā

original: iyaṃ pravālāsitaratnamauktikair vinirmiteneva cakāsti cakṣuṣā // PNc_7.16 //
analyzed: iyam pravāla asita ratna mauktikaiḥ vinirmitena iva cakāsti cakṣuṣā

original: iyaṃ puro niryatidūram āyate kapolataḥ kāñcanakuṇḍalārciṣi /
analyzed: iyam puras niryati dūram āyate kapolataḥ kāñcana kuṇḍala arciṣi

original: iṣuṃ ruṣeva pratibhoktum udyatā manobhuve muktaśilīmukhe hṛdi // PNc_7.17 //
analyzed: iṣum ruṣā iva pratibhoktum udyatāḥ manobhuve mukta śilīmukhe hṛdi

original: iyaṃ triyāmāpatikāntipeśalaṃ vibuddhabandhūkadalādhikatviṣā /
analyzed: iyam triyāmā pati kānti peśalam vibuddha bandhūka dala adhika tviṣā

original: bibharti bimbādharamudrayā mukhaṃ manobhirāmaṃ rajanīva sandhyayā // PNc_7.18 //
analyzed: bibharti bimba adhara mudrayā mukham manobhirāmam rajanī iva sandhyayā

original: upoḍhatārāpatitārahārayor iyaṃ yugena stanayor virājate /
analyzed: upoḍha tārā pati tāra hārayoḥ iyam yugena stanayoḥ virājate

original: dvayena deva uṣasi cakravākayoḥ saridgṛhītaikamṛṇālayor iva // PNc_7.19 //
analyzed: dvayena devaḥ uṣasi cakravākayoḥ sarit gṛhīta eka mṛṇālayoḥ iva

original: surāpagāvīcivipāṇḍur eṣa te cireṇa hāraś caritārthatāṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: surā āpagā avīci vipāṇḍuḥ eṣa te cireṇa hāraḥ caritārtha tām gataḥ

original: dhṛtaḥ kṣitīśa praṇayārdrayānayā salīlam utkampini yat kucadvaye // PNc_7.20 //
analyzed: dhṛtaḥ kṣitīśa praṇaya ārdrayā anayā sa līlam utkampini yat kuca dvaye

original: iyaṃ mahīpāla vilokitena te vigāhate kāntam idaṃ daśāntaram /
analyzed: iyam mahīpāla vilokitena te vigāhate kāntam idam daśāntaram

original: bhavaty anārūḍhavikāsavibhramā kim udgame candramasaḥ kumudvatī // PNc_7.21 //
analyzed: bhavati an ārūḍha vikāsa vibhramā kim udgame candramasaḥ kumudvatī

original: kim anyad uktaṃ sudhayeva sāndrayā tad anyathā nātha na pāṭalavacaḥ /
analyzed: kim anyat uktam sudhayā iva sāndrayā tat anyathā nātha na pāṭala vacaḥ

original: sphuṭeyam asyāḥ kurute yad aṅgake balāt pariṣvaṅgam anaṅgavikriyā // PNc_7.22 //
analyzed: sphuṭā iyam asyāḥ kurute yat aṅgake balāt pariṣvaṅgam anaṅga vikriyā

original: śaśiprabhāsamīpagamanam
analyzed: śaśiprabhā samīpa gamanam

original: itīṅgitajñe vadati priyaṃvade ramāṅgadena smitam udgatasmitaḥ /
analyzed: iti iṅgita jñe vadati priyaṃvade ramāṅgadena smitam udgata smitaḥ

original: avāpa paryāptaśaśāṅkadarśanaḥ phanīndrakanyāsavidhaṃ narādhipaḥ // PNc_7.23 //
analyzed: avāpa paryāpta śaśāṅka darśanaḥ phanīndra kanyā savidham narādhipaḥ

original: nāyikāceṣṭāḥ
analyzed: nāyikā ceṣṭāḥ

original: uvāha lajjānatam añcitālakaṃ tato bhujaṅgādhipateḥ sutāmukhaṃ /
analyzed: uvāha lajjā natam añcita alakam tatas bhujaṅga adhipateḥ sutā mukham

original: avāñcitaṃ kiṃ cana mātariśvanā saṣaṭpadaṃ padmam ivāravindinī // PNc_7.24 //
analyzed: a vāñcitam kim cana mātariśvanā sa ṣaṭpadam padmam iva aravindinī

original: pataty adhaḥ kuṅkumapaṅkapāṭale mayūkhalekhāpaṭale śikhāmaṇeḥ /
analyzed: patati adhas kuṅkuma paṅka pāṭale mayūkha lekhā paṭale śikhāmaṇeḥ

original: hriyeva raktāṃśukapallavas tayā pidhātum ālekhyanṛpe nyadhīyata // PNc_7.25 //
analyzed: hriyā iva rakta aṃśuka pallavaḥ tayā pidhātum ālekhya nṛpe nyadhīyata

original: nṛpasya citre madhureyam ākṛtir na bhidyate candramaso yathāmbhasi /
analyzed: nṛpasya citre madhurā iyam ākṛtiḥ na bhidyate candramasaḥ yathā ambhasi

original: sakhījanas tām iti narmapeśalaḥ śanais trapānamramukhīm abhāṣata // PNc_7.26 //
analyzed: sakhī janaḥ tām iti narma peśalaḥ śanais trapā namra mukhīm abhāṣata

original: yathāsmi vaktāsi tathāsya bhūpater yadā punaḥ karṇasamīpam āpsyasi /
analyzed: yathā asmi vaktāsi tathā asya bhūpateḥ yadā punar karṇa samīpam āpsyasi

original: itīva nirvyājam udīrya tatyaje tayāyatākṣyā sa narendrasāyakaḥ // PNc_7.27 //
analyzed: iti iva nirvyājam udīrya tatyaje tayā āyata akṣyā sa narendra sāyakaḥ

original: alaṃ hriyaivaṃ samupekṣya gṛhyatām ayaṃ hi pāṇigrahaṇocitas tava /
analyzed: alam hriyā evam samupekṣya gṛhyatām ayam hi pāṇigrahaṇa ucitaḥ tava

original: itīrayantyāḥ kuṭilaṃ vacaḥ karād anaṅgavatyāḥ kamalaṃ jahāra sā // PNc_7.28 //
analyzed: iti īrayantyāḥ kuṭilam vacaḥ karāt anaṅgavatyāḥ kamalam jahāra sā

original: atha svabimbādharapāṭalacchadaṃ kareṇa tattatsadṛśena bibhratī /
analyzed: atha sva bimba adhara pāṭala chadam kareṇa tad tad sadṛśena bibhratī

original: niṣevitum bhūpatim abhyupāgatā rameva rājīvamukhī rarāja sā // PNc_7.29 //
analyzed: niṣevitum bhūpatim abhyupāgatā ramā iva rājīva mukhī rarāja sā

original: dṛśas tatas tatparivārayoṣitāṃ netrāñjanaśyāmalapakṣmarājayaḥ /
analyzed: dṛśaḥ tatas tad parivāra yoṣitām netra añjana śyāmala pakṣma rājayaḥ

original: śaśiprabhe bhūmipatau sakautukāḥ samāpatan kunda ivālipaṅktayaḥ // PNc_7.30 //
analyzed: śaśi prabhe bhūmipatau sa kautukāḥ samāpatan kunde iva ali paṅktayaḥ

original: nṛpārhaṇam
analyzed: nṛpa arhaṇam

original: nipīyamānasya tayā śanaiḥśanair apāṅgasañcāritadīrghanetrayā /
analyzed: nipīyamānasya tayā śanais śanais apāṅga sañcārita dīrgha netrayā

original: upāttapuṣpaḥ kṣitibhartur arhaṇāṃ cakāra tasyāś caturaḥ sakhījanaḥ // PNc_7.31 //
analyzed: upātta puṣpaḥ kṣitibhartuḥ arhaṇām cakāra tasyāḥ caturaḥ sakhī janaḥ

original: puraḥ śirasy āhitamanmathājñayā tayā kaṭākṣaiḥ kuṭajair ivārcitaḥ /
analyzed: puras śirasi āhita manmatha ājñayā tayā kaṭākṣaiḥ kuṭajaiḥ iva arcitaḥ

original: nṛpaḥ saparyāṃ punaruktasaṃvidāṃ sas tadvayasyānihitāv amanyata // PNc_7.32 //
analyzed: nṛpaḥ saparyām punar ukta saṃvidām saḥ tad vayasyā nihitau amanyata

original: sarāgavaty utkalikābhir ākule mṛduny alaṃ pāṭalayā samarpite /
analyzed: sa rāgavati utkalikābhiḥ ākule mṛduni alam pāṭalayā samarpite

original: atha nyaṣīdannavapallavāsane phanīndrakanyāmanasīva pārthivaḥ // PNc_7.33 //
analyzed: atha nyaṣīdat nava pallava āsane phanīndra kanyā manasi iva pārthivaḥ

original: anu kṣitīśaṃ nalinīdalāsane kayā cid āste parivārayoṣitā /
analyzed: anu kṣitīśam nalinī dala āsane kayā cit āste parivāra yoṣitā

original: ramāṅgado 'py āsanabandham ādade vasundharāyāṃ vinayaikabandhuḥ // PNc_7.34 //
analyzed: ramāṅgadaḥ pi āsana bandham ādade vasundharāyām vinaya eka bandhuḥ

original: śramānurodhād upaviśyatām itaḥ kṣaṇaṃ kṛśāṅgīti sakhībhir arthitā /
analyzed: śrama anurodhāt upaviśyatām itas kṣaṇam kṛśa aṅgī iti sakhībhiḥ arthitā

original: upāviśad vepitavāmanastanī tataḥ samaṃ tābhir ahīndrakanyakā // PNc_7.35 //
analyzed: upāviśat vepita vāmana stanī tatas samam tābhiḥ ahi indra kanyakā

original: nāyikāvilasitāni
vivartayantī vadanendumaṇḍalaṃ viśālanetrāntaniṣaktatārakam /
analyzed: vivartayantī vadana indu maṇḍalam viśāla netra anta niṣakta tārakam

original: dvayena sā kṛṣyata sundarī samaṃ hriyā nṛpālokanakautukena ca // PNc_7.36 //
analyzed: dvayena sā kṛṣyata sundarī samam hriyā nṛpa ālokana kautukena ca

original: athāvataṃsīkṛtalocanotpalaṃ kapoladolāyitaratnakuṇḍalam /
analyzed: atha avataṃsīkṛta locana utpalam kapola dolāyita ratna kuṇḍalam

original: ciraṃ papau saḥ stimitena cakṣuṣā tadānanaṃ mālavamīnaketanaḥ // PNc_7.37 //
analyzed: ciram papau saḥ stimitena cakṣuṣā tad ānanam mālava mīnaketanaḥ

original: kṛtī dṛśāsyāḥ sudṛśaḥ pibaty ayaṃ kapolalāvaṇyasudhāṃ narādhipaḥ /
analyzed: kṛtī dṛśā asyāḥ su dṛśaḥ pibati ayam kapola lāvaṇya sudhām narādhipaḥ

original: mithaḥ sakhīnām iti sasmitaṃ vaco niśamya sābhūd adhikādhikatrapā // PNc_7.38 //
analyzed: mithas sakhīnām iti sa smitam vacaḥ niśamya sā abhūt adhika adhika trapā

original: manāg ivāṃsād apavartitānanā nirīkṣya taṃ bhūpatim arpitekṣaṇam /
analyzed: manāk iva aṃsāt apavartita ānanā nirīkṣya tam bhūpatim arpita īkṣaṇam

original: vihasya lajjāmukule cakarṣa sā balād apāṅgaprasṛte vilocane // PNc_7.39 //
analyzed: vihasya lajjā mukule cakarṣa sā balāt apāṅga prasṛte vilocane

original: yaśobhaṭe rūpam avantiśasituḥ kṛtasmite citragataṃ praśaṃsati /
analyzed: yaśobhaṭe rūpam avantiśasituḥ kṛta smite citra gatam praśaṃsati

original: karasthitaṃ sā jhaṭiti nyadhāt tataḥ śilātale tāmarasaṃ trapāvatī // PNc_7.40 //
analyzed: kara sthitam sā jhaṭiti nyadhāt tatas śilā tale tāmarasam trapāvatī

original: nikāmam uktaṃ sukumāram aṅganā vilāsinas tasya jahāra sā manaḥ /
analyzed: nikāmam uktam sukumāram aṅganā vilāsinaḥ tasya jahāra sā manaḥ

original: smaraikadūtīsahakāraśākhino lasanmadhāv anyabhṛteva pallavam // PNc_7.41 //
analyzed: smara eka dūtī sahakāra śākhinaḥ lasat madhau anya bhṛtā iva pallavam

original: tadīyam uddāmarasorminirbharaṃ sa rājahaṃso 'pi viveśa mānasam /
analyzed: tadīyam uddāma rasa ūrmi nirbharam sa viveśa mānasam

original: kṛtapraveśaś ca salīlam acchinan manāṅ mṛṇālīm iva dhīratām ataḥ // PNc_7.42 //
analyzed: kṛta praveśaḥ ca sa līlam acchinat manāk mṛṇālīm iva dhīra tām atas

original: kṣaṇād apāṅgastimitāyatākṣayoḥ sakampayoḥ kaṇṭakitāṅgalekhayoḥ /
analyzed: kṣaṇāt apāṅga stimita āyata akṣayoḥ sa kampayoḥ kaṇṭakita aṅga lekhayoḥ

original: avāpad anyonyanibaddhabhāvayos tayoḥ prarohaṃ hṛdi bālamanmathaḥ // PNc_7.43 //
analyzed: avāpat anyonya nibaddha bhāvayoḥ tayoḥ praroham hṛdi bāla manmathaḥ

original: nāyakasya nāyikāṃ praty uktiḥ
analyzed: nāyakasya nāyikām prati uktiḥ

original: asūyayevātha vimuñcatī dṛśaṃ sakhīṣu sā sūtritanarmasūktiṣu /
analyzed: asūyayā iva atha vimuñcatī dṛśam sakhīṣu sā sūtrita narmasu uktiṣu

original: iti smitakṣālitadantavāsasā nṛpeṇa nāgendrasutābhyadhīyata // PNc_7.44 //
analyzed: iti smita kṣālita danta vāsasā nṛpeṇa nāga indra sutā abhyadhīyata

original: vadānavadyāṅgi sakhījanādṛtaḥ kim eṣa nāma vyatiricyate janaḥ /
analyzed: vada anavadya aṅgi sakhī jana ādṛtaḥ kim eṣa nāma vyatiricyate janaḥ

original: vihāya visrambhaviśeṣam etayā yad aṅgam anto viśatīva lajjayā // PNc_7.45 //
analyzed: vihāya visrambha viśeṣam etayā yat aṅgam antar viśati iva lajjayā

original: sadā sadācārapareti vārtayā vayaṃ hṛtāḥ pannagarājaputri te /
analyzed: sadā sat ācāra parā iti vārtayā vayam hṛtāḥ pannaga rāja putri te

original: ataḥ kim evaṃ pratipattimūḍhatāṃ vigāhase 'smāsu vimucyatām iyam // PNc_7.46 //
analyzed: atas kim evam pratipatti mūḍha tām vigāhase smāsu vimucyatām iyam

original: anena te sundari darśanena vā kṛtopacāro 'smi kiyat kadarthyase /
analyzed: anena te sundari darśanena vā kṛta upacāraḥ smi kiyat kadarthyase

original: na vīkṣate valgu na mañju bhāṣate gatā kvacil locanavartmamālatī // PNc_7.47 //
analyzed: na vīkṣate valgu na mañju bhāṣate gatā kvacid locana vartma mālatī

original: adhaḥkṛtāḥ satyam adhīralocane rasātalena tridivasya bhūmayaḥ /
analyzed: adhas kṛtāḥ satyam adhīra locane rasātalena tridivasya bhūmayaḥ

original: anaṅgadurvāraśarādhidaivataṃ bhavadvidhaṃ ratnam avāpyate 'tra yat // PNc_7.48 //
analyzed: anaṅga durvāra śara adhidaivatam bhavadvidham ratnam avāpyate yat

original: kutūhalādhyāsitamadhyalokayā tvayā muhūrtaṃ phaṇilokakaumudi /
analyzed: kutūhala adhyāsita madhya lokayā tvayā muhūrtam phaṇi loka kaumudi

original: avaimi pātālam avāptasandhinā vilaṅghyate santamasena samprati // PNc_7.49 //
analyzed: avaimi pātālam avāpta sandhinā vilaṅghyate santamasena samprati

original: idaṃ mṛṇālad api komalaṃ vapus tavaiṣa dūrād aravindinīpatiḥ /
analyzed: idam mṛṇālat api komalam vapuḥ tava eṣa dūrāt aravindinīpatiḥ

original: punaḥ punaḥ saṃspṛśatīva kautukāt tamālagulmāntarapātibhiḥ karaiḥ // PNc_7.50 //
analyzed: punar punar saṃspṛśati iva kautukāt tamāla gulma antara pātibhiḥ karaiḥ

original: anena te saśramavāribindunā navīnapīyūṣatuṣāradanturaḥ /
analyzed: anena te sa śrama vāri bindunā navīna pīyūṣa tuṣāra danturaḥ

original: śirīṣamṛdvaṅgi tuṣārapāṇḍunā kapolabimbena viḍambyate śāśī // PNc_7.51 //
analyzed: śirīṣa mṛdu aṅgi tuṣāra pāṇḍunā kapola bimbena viḍambyate śāśī

original: idaṃ vadāśikṣata kaitavaṃ kutas tavaiṣa mugdhe saralāṅguliḥ karaḥ /
analyzed: idam vada aśikṣata kaitavam kutas tava eṣa mugdhe sarala aṅguliḥ karaḥ

original: ihaitad ālikhya śilātale śanair anena līlākamalaṃ yad ujjhitam // PNc_7.52 //
analyzed: iha etat ālikhya śilā tale śanais anena līlā kamalam yat ujjhitam

original: na citram evaṃ kva cid asti bhūtale mamātra tenāsti kutūhalaṃ mahat /
analyzed: na citram evam kva cit asti bhū tale mama atra tena asti kutūhalam mahat

original: ataḥ kim etat pihitaṃ prakāśyatām ahetukas tanvi ka eṣa matsaraḥ // PNc_7.53 //
analyzed: atas kim etat pihitam prakāśyatām ahetukaḥ tanvi kaḥ eṣa matsaraḥ

original: adṛśyam etad yadi manyase tataḥ kim arthyase kiṃ tv iyad eva śaṃso naḥ /
analyzed: adṛśyam etat yadi manyase tatas kim arthyase kim tu iyat eva śaṃsaḥ naḥ

original: kṛtī tvayāyaṃ bhujagāmbaraukasām alekhi citre katamaḥ kṛśodari // PNc_7.54 //
analyzed: kṛtī tvayā ayam bhujaga ambaraukasām alekhi citre katamaḥ kṛśa udari

original: lateva sammīlitaṣaṭpadasvanā kiyac ciraṃ nirvacanaiva tiṣṭhasi /
analyzed: latā iva sammīlita ṣaṭpada svanā kiyat ciram nirvacanā eva tiṣṭhasi

original: itaś cakorākṣi vicintya sūnṛtaṃ mamottaraṃ kiṃ cana dātum arhasi // PNc_7.55 //
analyzed: itas cakora akṣi vicintya sūnṛtam mama uttaram kim cana dātum arhasi

original: yathātijihreṣi yathātivepase yathā kapole pulakaṃ bibharṣi ca /
analyzed: yathā atijihreṣi yathā ativepase yathā kapole pulakam bibharṣi ca

original: tathātra manye tava pakṣapātavan nitāntam antaḥkaraṇaṃ kṛśodari // PNc_7.56 //
analyzed: tathā atra manye tava pakṣapāta vat nitāntam antaḥkaraṇam kṛśa udari

original: hriye taveyaṃ yadi kalpate kathā kim etayā naḥ prakṛte yatāmahe /
analyzed: hriye tava iyam yadi kalpate kathā kim etayā naḥ prakṛte yatāmahe

original: yad artham ete vayam āgatāḥ svayaṃ sa nārpyate kiṃ karabhoru sāyakaḥ // PNc_7.57 //
analyzed: yat artham ete vayam āgatāḥ svayam sa na arpyate kim karabha ūru sāyakaḥ

original: salīlam evaṃ vadati smitānane nṛpe navapremasārdracetasi /
analyzed: sa līlam evam vadati smita ānane nṛpe nava prema sārdra cetasi

original: vivartayantī maṇikaṅkaṇaṃ kare mumoca maunaṃ na phaṇīndrakanyakā // PNc_7.58 //
analyzed: vivartayantī maṇi kaṅkaṇam kare mumoca maunam na phaṇīndra kanyakā

original: mālyavatīvacanam
analyzed: mālyavatī vacanam

original: tayā tathā dṛṣṭam athāntarāntarā kaṭākṣakāntiḥ snapitāvataṃsayā /
analyzed: tayā tathā dṛṣṭam atha antarā antarā kaṭākṣa kāntiḥ snapita avataṃsayā

original: iti smitāpy āyitadantadīdhitir jagāda taṃ mālyavātī viśāmpatim // PNc_7.59 //
analyzed: iti smitā api āyita danta dīdhitiḥ jagāda tam mālyavātī viśām patim

original: tavaitayā satkṛtipātra satkṛtaṃ svayaṃ na yat kalpitam alpamadhyayā /
analyzed: tava etayā satkṛti pātra satkṛtam svayam na yat kalpitam alpa madhyayā

original: na sa avalepo na ca sā pramāditā na ca trapā tatra nṛpo 'parāddhyati // PNc_7.60 //
analyzed: na sa avalepaḥ na ca sā pramādi tā na ca trapā tatra

original: kṛtīti vārtā tava vetsi vāñchitaṃ tvam antarātmeva na kasya vā bhuvi /
analyzed: kṛtī iti vārtā tava vetsi vāñchitam tvam antarātmā iva na kasya vā bhuvi

original: ataḥ sakhībhāvagatasya gopanaṃ na yujyate nas tvayi tan niśāmyatām // PNc_7.61 //
analyzed: atas sakhī bhāva gatasya gopanam na yujyate naḥ tvayi tat niśāmyatām

original: śilīmukhe 'smiṃs tava nāmalāñchite mṛgopanīte mṛgaśāvalocanā /
analyzed: śilīmukhe smin tava nāma lāñchite mṛga upanīte mṛgaśā avalocanā

original: pramodam āpteyam ito vilokite kare cakorīva tuṣāradīdhiteḥ // PNc_7.62 //
analyzed: pramodam āptā iyam itas vilokite kare cakorī iva tuṣāradīdhiteḥ

original: ka eṣa rājeti muhuḥ kutūhalād iyaṃ yadā pṛṣṭavatī sakhījanam /
analyzed: kaḥ eṣa rājā iti muhur kutūhalāt iyam yadā pṛṣṭavatī sakhī janam

original: atas tadāsyai kathitaḥ savistaraṃ mayā tvam urvītalamīnalāñchānaḥ // PNc_7.63 //
analyzed: atas tadā asyai kathitaḥ sa vistaram mayā tvam urvī tala mīna lāñchānaḥ

original: kareṇa sāsūyam apāsya karṇataḥ kvaṇaddvirephāvali nīlam utpalam /
analyzed: kareṇa sa asūyam apāsya karṇataḥ kvaṇat dvirepha āvali nīlam utpalam

original: tadaitayābhyudgatapakṣapātayā śrutā guṇāḍhyasya bṛhatkathā tava // PNc_7.64 //
analyzed: tadā etayā abhyudgata pakṣapātayā śrutā guṇāḍhyasya bṛhat kathā tava

original: imāṃ tvadākāranirūpiṇe sakhīm avetya paryutsukalocanām iva /
analyzed: imām tvad ākāra nirūpiṇe sakhīm avetya paryutsuka locanām iva

original: tato mayā viśvavilocanotsavas tvam eva citre likhito 'si pārthiva / // PNc_7.65 //
analyzed: tatas mayā viśva vilocana utsavaḥ tvam eva citre si pārthiva

original: udañcitavyāyatapakṣmaṇā tataḥ sakhīsamakṣaṃ nibhṛtena cakṣuṣā /
analyzed: udañcita vyāyata pakṣmaṇā tatas sakhī samakṣam nibhṛtena cakṣuṣā

original: ciraṃ nipītasatṛṣeva mugdhayā tvayaitayā madhyamalokavāsasaḥ // PNc_7.66 //
analyzed: ciram nipīta sa tṛṣā iva mugdhayā tvayā etayā madhyama loka vāsasaḥ

original: [VAR 7.66d: {tvayaitayā/
analyzed: var tvayā etayā

original: lem /
analyzed: lem

original: em; tvayetayā /ed}]
analyzed: em tvayetayā ed

original: ato varo 'yaṃ yuvayoḥ samāgamaḥ kumudvatīcandramasor ivocitaḥ /
analyzed: atas varaḥ yam yuvayoḥ samāgamaḥ kumudvatī candramasoḥ iva ucitaḥ

original: iyaṃ hi bālocchvasito manobhuvas tvam atra lokatritayaikasundaraḥ // PNc_7.67 //
analyzed: iyam hi bāla ucchvasitaḥ manobhuvaḥ tvam atra loka tritaya eka sundaraḥ

original: nṛpa gṛhītuṃ nayam atra ko 'py alaṃ sureṣu vā pannagapuṅgaveṣu vā /
analyzed: nṛpa gṛhītum nayam atra kaḥ pi alam sureṣu vā pannaga puṅgaveṣu vā

original: sa eṣa paṅkeruhakarṇikāmṛdus tvayā śayo 'syāḥ kriyate sakautukaḥ // PNc_7.68 //
analyzed: saḥ eṣa paṅkeruha karṇikā mṛduḥ tvayā syāḥ kriyate sa kautukaḥ

original: ayācito 'py arpita eva te śaraḥ kṣiter ayaṃ nyāyavidāṃ varaitayā /
analyzed: a yācitaḥ u pi arpitaḥ eva te śaraḥ kṣiteḥ ayam nyāya vidām vara etayā

original: tad enam abhyarthayase kathaṃ punaḥ kalatram eṣā hi vasundharā tava // PNc_7.69 //
analyzed: tat enam abhyarthayase katham punar kalatram eṣā hi vasundharā tava

original: [7.69b: em. kṣitir ?]
analyzed: em kṣitiḥ

original: itītivṛttaṃ tadupāśrayaṃ tathā prakāśayantī pṛthivīpatiṃ prati /
analyzed: iti iti vṛttam tad upāśrayam tathā prakāśayantī pṛthivīpatim prati

original: chalād alīkabhṛkuṭiṃ vidhāya sā tayāluloke phaṇirājakanyayā // PNc_7.70 //
analyzed: chalāt alīka bhṛkuṭim vidhāya sā tayā āluloke phaṇi rāja kanyayā

original: atha dvirephasya mukhābjapātino nivāraṇayoragarājakanyakā /
analyzed: atha dvirephasya mukha abja pātinaḥ nivāraṇayā uraga rāja kanyakā

original: śilātalāt saṃbhramamīlitasmṛtis tadāśu līlāśatapatram ādade // PNc_7.71 //
analyzed: śilā talāt saṃbhrama mīlita smṛtiḥ tadā āśu līlā śatapatram ādade

original: tataḥ sa romañcanipīḍitāṅgado ramāṅgadaṃ vyaktaśaśiprabheṅgitaḥ /
analyzed: tatas sa romañca nipīḍita aṅgadaḥ ramā aṅgadam vyakta śaśi prabhā iṅgitaḥ

original: apaśyad indīvaradāmadīrghayā pramodavistaritayā dṛśā nṛpaḥ // PNc_7.72 //
analyzed: apaśyat indīvara dāma dīrghayā pramoda vistaritayā dṛśā nṛpaḥ

original: ramāṅgadavacanam
analyzed: ramāṅgada vacanam

original: samarpitā pārthiva puṣpaketunā taveyam ārdrapraṇayā manasvinī /
analyzed: samarpitā pārthiva puṣpaketunā tava iyam ārdra praṇayā manasvinī

original: asīmasaundaryasudhāvilāsabhūr udanvatevendukalā pinākinaḥ // PNc_7.73 //
analyzed: asīma saundarya sudhā vilāsa bhūḥ udanvatā iva indu kalā pinākinaḥ

original: kim anyad atrollasitaṃ jagattraye tavaiva saubhāgyapatākayā nṛpa /
analyzed: kim anyat atrā ullasitam jagattraye tava eva saubhāgya patākayā nṛpa

original: yad āgatā manmathapatriṇām iyaṃ śaravyatām evam api śrute tvayi // PNc_7.74 //
analyzed: yat āgatā manmatha patriṇām iyam śaravya tām evam api śrute tvayi

original: vadhūr dilīpasya sudakṣiṇā yathā yathā sunandā bharatasya bhūpateḥ /
analyzed: vadhūḥ dilīpasya sudakṣiṇā yathā yathā sunandā bharatasya bhūpateḥ

original: raghūdvahasyāvanikanyakā yathā tathā taveyaṃ vidhinā upapāditā // PNc_7.75 //
analyzed: raghūdvahasya avani kanyakā yathā tathā tava iyam vidhinā upapāditā

original: kim anyad asyāḥ kṛtapāṇipīḍanaḥ padaṃ nidhatse gṛhamedhināṃ dhuri /
analyzed: kim anyat asyāḥ kṛta pāṇi pīḍanaḥ padam nidhatse gṛhamedhinām dhuri

original: iti prasarpatsmitacandrikaḥ śanair abhāṣatorvītilakaṃ ramāṅgadaḥ // PNc_7.76 //
analyzed: iti prasarpat smita candrikaḥ śanais abhāṣata urvī tilakam ramāṅgadaḥ

original: [SYNTAX: kulakam]
analyzed: syntax kulakam

original: vilokitaṃ citram alīkabhāṣiṇī bhavatsakhīyaṃ pratibhāsate mama /
analyzed: vilokitam citram alīka bhāṣiṇī bhavat sakhī iyam pratibhāsate mama

original: udīritaivaṃ kila pārthivena sā bhṛśam lalajje nibhṛtaṃ jahāsa ca // PNc_7.77 //
analyzed: udīritā evam kila pārthivena sā bhṛśam lalajje nibhṛtam jahāsa ca

original: vilokayantī tam apāṅgalocanā samullasatsvedalavāṅkitastanī /
analyzed: vilokayantī tam apāṅga locanā samullasat sveda lava aṅkita stanī

original: tataḥ sujātastabakāstamauktikā lateva sā hemamayī vyakampata // PNc_7.78 //
analyzed: tatas sujāta stabaka asta mauktikā latā iva sā hema mayī vyakampata

original: mukhe tavāsaktam idaṃ śaśiprabhe dṛśāvataṃsāgatayaitadīyayā /
analyzed: mukhe tava āsaktam idam śaśiprabhe dṛśā avataṃsa āgatayā etadīyayā

original: sakhījanaḥ sasmitam ity uvāca tām avantināthaṃ ca mitho ramāṅgadaḥ // PNc_7.79 //
analyzed: sakhī janaḥ sa smitam iti uvāca tām avanti nātham ca mithas ramāṅgadaḥ

original: atrāntare jhaṭiti cittam ivāccham ambhaḥ kṣobhaṃ jagāma saritas tuhināṃśusūteḥ /
analyzed: atrā antare jhaṭiti cittam iva accham ambhaḥ kṣobham jagāma saritaḥ tuhināṃśu sūteḥ

original: vāti sma ca prasabhabhagnatamālatāla- hintālasālasaralaḥ sahasā samīraḥ // PNc_7.80 //
analyzed: vāti sma ca prasabha bhagna tamāla tāla hintāla sāla saralaḥ sahasā samīraḥ

original: payododayaḥ
udanamad atha tatkṣaṇād udañcat- kanakapiśaṅgataḍillataḥ payodaḥ /
analyzed: udanamat atha tad kṣaṇāt udañcat kanaka piśaṅga taḍit lataḥ payodaḥ

original: adharitamurajadhvanīni muñcan vidhuritakarṇatalāni garjitāni // PNc_7.81 //
analyzed: adharita muraja dhvanīni muñcan vidhurita karṇa talāni garjitāni

original: atha samuditatrāsā meghasvanān nanu bhūpater bhujaparighayor anto bālā praveṣṭum iyeṣa sā /
analyzed: atha samudita trāsā megha svanāt nanu bhūpateḥ bhuja parighayoḥ antar bālā praveṣṭum iyeṣa sā

original: kim asi cakitā mā tvaṃ bhaiṣīr ito bhava lajjayā kṛtam iti ca tām ūce devaḥ sa sāhasalāñcanaḥ // PNc_7.82 //
analyzed: kim asi cakitā mā tvam bhaiṣīḥ itas bhava lajjayā kṛtam iti ca tām ūce devaḥ sa sāhasa lāñcanaḥ

original: iti śrīmṛgāṅkaguptasūnoḥ parimalāparanāmnaḥ padmaguptasya kṛtau navasāhasāṅkacarite mahākāvye śaśiprabhāsaṃllāpo nāma saptamaḥ sargaḥ samāptaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī mṛgāṅkagupta sūnoḥ parimala apara nāmnaḥ padmaguptasya kṛtau navasāhasāṅkacarite mahākāvye śaśiprabhāsaṃllāpaḥ nāma saptamaḥ sargaḥ samāptaḥ

original: aṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ
analyzed: aṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ

original: nāyikātirodhānam
analyzed: nāyikā tirodhānam

original: sāpade 'tha bhujagendrakanyakā khe payodapatalais tirohite /
analyzed: bhujaga indra kanyakā khe payoda patalaiḥ tirohite

original: narmadāpulinapallavasthitā haṃsapaṅktir iva kampam ādade // PNc_8.1 //
analyzed: narmadā pulina pallava sthitā haṃsa paṅktiḥ iva kampam ādade

original: spardhayeva nicayaḥ payomucāṃ tāramandram anadad yathā yathā /
analyzed: spardhayā iva nicayaḥ payomucām tāra mandram anadat yathā yathā

original: sā narendratilakaṃ tam aikṣata mugdhalolanayanā tathā tathā // PNc_8.2 //
analyzed: sā narendra tilakam tam aikṣata mugdha lola nayanā tathā tathā

original: ullasan navapayodharālasāṃ dyāṃ ca tāṃ ca sumukhīṃ vilokayan /
analyzed: ullasan nava payodhara alasām dyām ca tām ca su mukhīm vilokayan

original: bhūpatiḥ sa nitarām abhūd vaśo vismayasya ca manobhavasya ca // PNc_8.3 //
analyzed: bhūpatiḥ sa nitarām abhūt vaśaḥ vismayasya ca manobhavasya ca

original: vāmanatvam alinatvam atyajan vyañjitakrama iva trivikramaḥ /
analyzed: vāmana tvam alina tvam atyajan vyañjita kramaḥ iva trivikramaḥ

original: krāmati sma sahasaiva meghabhūr andhakāranikaro 'tha rodasī // PNc_8.4 //
analyzed: krāmati sma sahasā eva megha bhūḥ rodasī

original: [8.4d: andhaka pun?]
analyzed: andhaka pun

original: netrarodhini tayor na kevalaṃ mūrcchite tamasi vaiśasaṃ hṛdi /
analyzed: netra rodhini tayoḥ na kevalam mūrcchite tamasi vaiśasam hṛdi

original: yāvad āsyavigaladbisāṅkure cakravākamithune 'py ajṛmbhata // PNc_8.5 //
analyzed: yāvat āsya vigalat bisa aṅkure cakravāka mithune pi ajṛmbhata

original: karṇabhūṣaṇamaṇiprabhālavais tokalakṣitakapolapatrayā /
analyzed: karṇabhūṣaṇa maṇi prabhā lavaiḥ toka lakṣita kapola patrayā

original: kṛṣyamāṇanayano 'tha pipriye pannagendrasutayā tayā nṛpaḥ // PNc_8.6 //
analyzed: kṛṣyamāṇa nayanaḥ pipriye pannaga indra sutayā tayā nṛpaḥ

original: tejasi sphurati tāḍite muhur bibhyatī kanakabhaṅgapiṅgale /
analyzed: tejasi sphurati tāḍite muhur bibhyatī kanaka bhaṅga piṅgale

original: taṃ hṛdisthitam iveśam īkṣituṃ sāpi mīlitavilocanābhavat // PNc_8.7 //
analyzed: tam hṛdisthitam iva īśam īkṣitum sā api mīlita vilocanā bhavat

original: ākāśavāṇī
analyzed: ākāśa vāṇī

original: eṣa te na ghaṭate manorathaḥ pārthivāhipatikanyakāṃ prati /
analyzed: eṣa te na ghaṭate manorathaḥ pārthiva ahi pati kanyakām prati

original: gaccha vindhyavipināntadṛṣṭayā vañcito 'si mṛgatṛṣṇayaitayā // PNc_8.8 //
analyzed: gaccha vindhya vipina anta dṛṣṭayā vañcitaḥ si mṛgatṛṣṇayā etayā

original: sāhasodadhiviloḍane svayaṃ yo 'ṃsam aṃsalatayārpayiṣyati /
analyzed: sāhasa udadhi viloḍane svayam ṃsam aṃsalatayā arpayiṣyati

original: śrīr ivorasi muradviṣaḥ padaṃ tasya niścitam iyaṃ vidhāsyati // PNc_8.9 //
analyzed: śrīḥ iva urasi muradviṣaḥ padam tasya niścitam iyam vidhāsyati

original: paśya paśya capaleyam antikāt nīyate tava yathocitaṃ kuru /
analyzed: paśya paśya capalā iyam antikāt nīyate tava yathocitam kuru

original: evam eva yad iyaṃ na labhyate jānakīva janakapratijñayā // PNc_8.10 //
analyzed: evam eva yat iyam na labhyate jānakī iva janaka pratijñayā

original: kanyakāsi kim idaṃ śaśiprabhe yuktam ehi pitur antikaṃ vraja /
analyzed: kanyakā asi kim idam śaśiprabhe yuktam ehi pituḥ antikam vraja

original: ity avigrahavatī nabhastalāt ullalāsa sahasā sarasvatī // PNc_8.11 //
analyzed: iti avigrahavatī nabhastalāt ullalāsa sahasā sarasvatī

original: tāṃ niśamya sa nikāmavismitaḥ sācikārmukalatām alokata /
analyzed: tām niśamya sa nikāma vismitaḥ sāci kārmuka latām alokata

original: indumauligalakandalāsitaṃ tatkṣaṇāc ca timiraṃ nyavartata // PNc_8.12 //
analyzed: indumauli gala kanda lāsitam tad kṣaṇāt ca timiram nyavartata

original: sācirāṃśutapanīyamekhalā śakracāpamaṇikuṇḍalā tataḥ /
analyzed: sācira aṃśu tapanīya mekhalā śakracāpa maṇi kuṇḍalā tatas

original: kvāpi mudritamayūratāṇḍavā saṃhatir jalamucāṃ tirodadhe // PNc_8.13 //
analyzed: kvāpi mudrita mayūra tāṇḍavā saṃhatiḥ jalamucām tirodadhe

original: sā purātanapathena pāvanī somasūtir api nimnagā vahat /
analyzed: sā purātana pathena pāvanī soma sūtiḥ api nimnagāḥ vahat

original: svādunirmalarasorminirbharā bhāratīva masṛṇaṃ mahākaveḥ // PNc_8.14 //
analyzed: svādu nirmala rasa ūrmi nirbharā bhāratī iva masṛṇam mahā kaveḥ

original: apy apākṛtarayaḥ sa narmadā- vīcilāsyaracanākutūhalī /
analyzed: api apākṛta rayaḥ sa narmadā vīci lāsya racanā kutūhalī

original: āvavau śabararājayoṣitāṃ nartitālakalataḥ samīraṇaḥ // PNc_8.15 //
analyzed: āvavau śabara rāja yoṣitām nartita alaka lataḥ samīraṇaḥ

original: ity akālajaladādivaikṛte kena cid viracite gate śamam /
analyzed: iti akāla jalada ādi vaikṛte kena cit viracite gate śamam

original: bhūpateḥ śaśimukhī sakhīyutā netranirviṣayatām avāpa sā // PNc_8.16 //
analyzed: bhūpateḥ śaśi mukhī sakhī yutā netra nirviṣaya tām avāpa sā

original: kvāpi nūnam apahṛtya tanmano nāgarājaduhitā jagāma sā /
analyzed: kvāpi nūnam apahṛtya tat manaḥ nāga rāja duhitā jagāma sā

original: utpalasya sarasaṃ lasatspṛhā cakravākavaniteva kesaram // PNc_8.17 //
analyzed: utpalasya sarasam lasat spṛhā cakravāka vanitā iva kesaram

original: agrataḥ kṛtapayodharaśriyā dhautataptatapanīyakāntayā /
analyzed: agratas kṛta payodhara śriyā dhauta tapta tapanīya kāntayā

original: vidyuteva sadṛśā tayākulaḥ sa abhavaj jhaṭiti dṛṣṭanaṣṭayā // PNc_8.18 //
analyzed: vidyutā iva sadṛśā tayā ākulaḥ sa abhavat jhaṭiti dṛṣṭa naṣṭayā

original: sā puro mama hṛteti lajjayā cintayā kim iva sā cared iti /
analyzed: sā puras mama hṛtā iti lajjayā cintayā kim iva sā caret iti

original: sā puno na sulabhety asau śucā tapyate sma tisṛbhiḥ kṣitīśvaraḥ // PNc_8.19 //
analyzed: sā punar na sulabhā iti asau śucā tapyate sma tisṛbhiḥ kṣitīśvaraḥ

original: tasya tāpajananena mānasaṃ tena bālaviraheṇa vivyathe /
analyzed: tasya tāpa jananena mānasam tena bāla viraheṇa vivyathe

original: ketakacchadakadarthane paraṃ yat kaṇo 'pi śiśiraḥ pragalbhate // PNc_8.20 //
analyzed: ketaka chada kadarthane param yat śiśiraḥ pragalbhate

original: jitvaraṃ jagati puṣpaketunā tadvikṛṣya tarasā śarāsanam /
analyzed: jitvaram jagati puṣpaketunā tat vikṛṣya tarasā śarāsanam

original: tāḍyate sma hṛdaye patatṛiṇā so 'tha mālavakuraṅgalāñchanaḥ // PNc_8.21 //
analyzed: tāḍyate sma hṛdaye mālava kuraṅga lāñchanaḥ

original: lajjayā valitakaṇṭhakandalaṃ locanāñcalamiladvataṃsakam /
analyzed: lajjayā valita kaṇṭha kandalam locana añcala milat vataṃsakam

original: tasya vartitam ivābhavat tadā tat priyāvadanam unnasaṃ hṛdi // PNc_8.22 //
analyzed: tasya vartitam iva abhavat tadā tat priyā vadanam unnasam hṛdi

original: mlānim āpa sas tayā vinā nṛpas tatra pannagapates tanūjayā /
analyzed: mlānim āpa saḥ tayā vinā nṛpaḥ tatra pannaga pateḥ tanūjayā

original: svāṃ ruciṃ na hi kadā cid aśnute śarvarīvirahadhūsaraḥ śaśī // PNc_8.23 //
analyzed: svām rucim na hi kadā cid aśnute śarvarī viraha dhūsaraḥ śaśī

original: pāṇḍupakṣmaladṛśaḥ paricyutaṃ so 'tha mālyaśakalaṃ vyalokata /
analyzed: pāṇḍu pakṣmala dṛśaḥ paricyutam mālya śakalam vyalokata

original: tādṛśi vyatikare vinirgataṃ hāsaleśam iva puṣpadhanvanaḥ // PNc_8.24 //
analyzed: tādṛśi vyatikare vinirgatam hāsa leśam iva puṣpadhanvanaḥ

original: śaṃsadujjvalakapolasaṃgataṃ kuṅkumena dalakoṭicumbinā /
analyzed: śaṃsat ujjvala kapola saṃgatam kuṅkumena dala koṭi cumbinā

original: sambhrameṇa galitaṃ natabhruvaḥ karṇatāmarasam ādade 'tha sa // PNc_8.25 //
analyzed: sambhrameṇa galitam nata bhruvaḥ karṇa tāmarasam ādade sa

original: kārmuke sati śareṣu satsv api preyasī tava hṛtāntikād iti /
analyzed: kārmuke sati śareṣu satsu api preyasī tava hṛtā antikāt iti

original: tena saurabhahṛtāliniḥsvanair vācyateva nṛpater vyadhīyata // PNc_8.26 //
analyzed: tena saurabha hṛta āli niḥsvanaiḥ vācya tā iva nṛpateḥ vyadhīyata

original: koṣṇaniḥśvasitavepitacchadaṃ tanniveśya vadane saḥ sādaraḥ /
analyzed: koṣṇa niḥśvasita vepita chadam tat niveśya vadane saḥ sa ādaraḥ

original: ardhanimīlitalocanotpalaḥ pustakalpita ivābhavat kṣaṇam // PNc_8.27 //
analyzed: ardha nimīlita locana utpalaḥ pusta kalpitaḥ iva abhavat kṣaṇam

original: narmadormilulite tadaṃśuke pallavālikhitahaṃsahāriṇi /
analyzed: narmadā ūrmi lulite tad aṃśuke pallava ālikhita haṃsa hāriṇi

original: āhṛtastanavilepane dṛśā so 'kṛtapraṇayam indupāṇḍuni // PNc_8.28 //
analyzed: āhṛta stana vilepane dṛśā saḥ kṛta praṇayam indu pāṇḍuni

original: mā viṣīda navasāhasāṅka,
analyzed: mā viṣīda nava sāhasa aṅka

original: te kāntayā gatam anena vartmanā /
analyzed: te kāntayā gatam anena vartmanā

original: paśya tatpadam itīva revayā tasya sārasarutair asūcyata // PNc_8.29 //
analyzed: paśya tat padam iti iva revayā tasya sārasa rutaiḥ asūcyata

original: kiṃ nimagnam iha bālayā tayā bhītayā bhujagarājakanyayā /
analyzed: kim nimagnam iha bālayā tayā bhītayā bhujaga rāja kanyayā

original: naivam atra niyataṃ rasātale vidyate vivaram ityatarkayat // PNc_8.30 //
analyzed: nā evam atra niyatam rasātale vidyate vivaram iti atarkayat

original: so 'timātragahane 'pi raṃhasā pārthivaḥ patitum aicchad ambhasi /
analyzed: saḥ timātra gahane pi raṃhasā pārthivaḥ patitum aicchat ambhasi

original: jīvitaṃ tṛṇam ivāvajānate sāhasavyasanino 'pi tādṛśāḥ // PNc_8.31 //
analyzed: jīvitam tṛṇam iva avajānate sāhasa vyasaninaḥ pi tādṛśāḥ

original: tat samīhitam avantivāsavas tasya nāvadad upāntavartinaḥ /
analyzed: tat samīhitam avantivāsavaḥ tasya na avadat upānta vartinaḥ

original: eṣa vighnam iha sāhasotsave kalpayiṣyati mameti śaṅkitaḥ // PNc_8.32 //
analyzed: eṣa vighnam iha sāhasa utsave kalpayiṣyati mama iti śaṅkitaḥ

original: ujjhati sma saḥ śanaiḥ samucchvasan pallavāsanam upāsya śāsanaḥ /
analyzed: ujjhati sma saḥ śanais samucchvasan pallavāsanam upāsya śāsanaḥ

original: agrahīc ca saśaraṃ kareṇa tad vyaktarājakakudena kārmukam // PNc_8.33 //
analyzed: agrahīt ca sa śaram kareṇa tat vyakta rāja kakudena kārmukam

original: pannagendraduhituḥ kareṇa yaḥ sakhyam āpad aravindabandhunā /
analyzed: pannaga indra duhituḥ kareṇa yaḥ sakhyam āpat aravinda bandhunā

original: arpitaṃ praṇayinā tam apy asau sāyakaṃ kanakapuṅkham ādade // PNc_8.34 //
analyzed: arpitam praṇayinā tam api asau sāyakam kanakapuṅkham ādade

original: subhruvaḥ smaravilāsadeśikaṃ taṃ śaśaṃsa saḥ śaram patatriṣu /
analyzed: subhruvaḥ smaravilāsa deśikam tam śaśaṃsa saḥ śaram patatriṣu

original: pītaśītakaramūrtitānavaṃ bhānumān iva mayūkham aṃśuṣu // PNc_8.35 //
analyzed: pīta śītakara mūrti tānavam bhānumān iva mayūkham aṃśuṣu

original: vyaktataccaraṇalakṣmaṇā tataḥ srastakeśakusumākulālinā /
analyzed: vyakta tad caraṇa lakṣmaṇā tatas srasta keśa kusuma ākula ālinā

original: meghasiktasikatenavartmanā narmadājalasamīpam āpa sa // PNc_8.36 //
analyzed: megha sikta sikatena vartmanā narmadā jala samīpam āpa sa

original: eṣa jātu na vikatthate kva cil lakṣyate 'sya phalataḥ sadā kriyā /
analyzed: eṣa jātu na vikatthate kva cit lakṣyate sya phalataḥ sadā kriyā

original: tat kariṣyati kim atra sāhasaṃ cetasīti vidadhe ramāṅgadaḥ // PNc_8.37 //
analyzed: tat kariṣyati kim atra sāhasam cetasi iti vidadhe ramāṅgadaḥ

original: narmadāpraveśaḥ
analyzed: narmadā praveśaḥ

original: akṣipat taṭaśilāviṭaṅkataḥ pārthivaḥ svam atha narmadāmbhasi /
analyzed: akṣipat taṭa śilā viṭaṅkataḥ pārthivaḥ svam atha narmadā ambhasi

original: vāridheḥ payasi viśvadīpakaḥ sāyamadriśikharād ivāryamā // PNc_8.38 //
analyzed: vāridheḥ payasi viśva dīpakaḥ sāyam adri śikharāt iva aryamā

original: tatra mīnamakarākule patan āsasāda sa vilāsam iśvaraḥ /
analyzed: tatra mīna makara ākule patan āsasāda sa vilāsam iśvaraḥ

original: yāmunāmbhasi nipātinaḥ purā gopatām upāgatasya śārṅgiṇaḥ // PNc_8.39 //
analyzed: yāmuna ambhasi nipātinaḥ purā gopa tām upāgatasya śārṅgiṇaḥ

original: ambhasas tadavapātatāḍitād ūrdhvam etya nipatatsu binduṣu /
analyzed: ambhasaḥ tad avapāta tāḍitāt ūrdhvam etya nipatatsu binduṣu

original: sāhasena paritoṣitaiḥ surair mauktikārgha iva tasya cikṣipe // PNc_8.40 //
analyzed: sāhasena paritoṣitaiḥ suraiḥ mauktika arghaḥ iva tasya cikṣipe

original: kiṃ cid antaritamūrtibhiḥ kṣaṇād anvagacchad atha taṃ ramāṅgadaḥ /
analyzed: kim cit antarita mūrtibhiḥ kṣaṇāt anvagacchat atha tam ramāṅgadaḥ

original: yena yāty aruṇasārathiḥ pathā vāsaras tam avalambate na kim ? // PNc_8.41 //
analyzed: yena yāti aruṇasārathiḥ pathā vāsaraḥ tam avalambate na kim

original: kas tulāgram adhiropya jīvitaṃ svāminaṃ tvam iva sevatām iti /
analyzed: kaḥ tulā agram adhiropya jīvitam svāminam tvam iva sevatām iti

original: tasya haṃsaninādena valgunā sādhuvādam iva narmadā dadau // PNc_8.42 //
analyzed: tasya haṃsa ninādena valgunā sādhuvādam iva narmadā dadau

original: bilapraveśaḥ
analyzed: bila praveśaḥ

original: tau muhur jalacarair adṛśyatām agrataś cakitam uktavartmabhiḥ /
analyzed: tau muhur jalacaraiḥ adṛśyatām agratas cakitam ukta vartmabhiḥ

original: dhvāntasantatibhide rasātalaṃ prastitau raviniśākarāv iva // PNc_8.43 //
analyzed: dhvānta santati bhide rasātalam prastitau ravi niśākarau iva

original: āśrayaty avanimeghavāhane vārigarbham abhito garīyasi /
analyzed: āśrayati avani megha vāhane vāri garbham abhitas garīyasi

original: prāpa mekalasutā samānatām antarāhitanidhānayā bhuvā // PNc_8.44 //
analyzed: prāpa mekala sutā samāna tām antara āhita nidhānayā bhuvā

original: ujjhitā jhaṭiti kāryagauravād īśvareṇa ruruce na medinī /
analyzed: ujjhitā jhaṭiti kārya gauravāt īśvareṇa ruruce na medinī

analyzed: sa udyamena punar u pi avaiṣyatā bhānunā iva padavī payomucām

original: āpapāta saramāṅgadaḥ kṣaṇāt sarvataḥ sas tamasāvile bile /
analyzed: āpapāta saramāṅgadaḥ kṣaṇāt sarvatas saḥ tamasā āvile bile

original: gūḍhamatsaraviṣe viśeṣavān durjanasya manasīva sadguṇaḥ // PNc_8.46 //
analyzed: gūḍha matsara viṣe viśeṣavān durjanasya manasi iva sat guṇaḥ

analyzed: tasya tad dinakara aṃśu bhāsuraiḥ mauli ratna kiraṇaiḥ abhajyata

analyzed: sandra hema rajasā mahā ojasām agraṇīḥ agaru dhūpa gandhinā

analyzed: saḥ tha tena bila vartmanā śanais krośa mātram agamat nareśvaraḥ

original: siṃhadarśanam
analyzed: siṃha darśanam

analyzed: lagna sāndra gaja śoṇita chaṭaiḥ śaurya pāvaka śikhā aṅkuraiḥ iva

analyzed: kesaraiḥ ati karāla kandharaḥ mārgam asya rurudhe tha kesarī

original: muktagharghararavaḥ sa raṃhasā taṃ viśāmadhipam abhyadhāvata /
analyzed: mukta gharghara ravaḥ sa raṃhasā tam viśām adhipam abhyadhāvata

analyzed: vyātta dīrgha daśana āsya kandaraḥ pūrṇam indum iva siṃhikāsutaḥ

original: ardhacandram atha tajjighāṃsayā saṃdadhe dhanuṣi yāvad īśvaraḥ /
analyzed: ardhacandram atha tad jighāṃsayā saṃdadhe dhanuṣi yāvat īśvaraḥ

original: tāvad asphuṭitakorakaṃ puro bālakundaviṭapaṃ tam aikṣata // PNc_8.51 //
analyzed: tāvat a sphuṭita korakam puras bāla kunda viṭapam tam aikṣata

original: bibhrato vikaṭadaṃṣṭram ānanaṃ kālameghaśakalāsitatviṣaḥ /
analyzed: bibhrataḥ vikaṭa daṃṣṭram ānanam kāla megha śakala asita tviṣaḥ

analyzed: āyataḥ abhimukham īrṣyayā javāt tena vartma mumuce na potriṇaḥ

original: gajadarśanam
analyzed: gaja darśanam

original: kiṃ cid asya purato 'tha gacchataḥ karṇatālavidhutālipaṅktinā /
analyzed: kim cit asya puratas gacchataḥ karṇa tāla vidhu tāli paṅktinā

analyzed: ruddhyate sma sa madena paddhatiḥ dīrghadanta musalena dantinā

analyzed: mandra kaṇṭha ninadaḥ ti vegavān ūrdhva vāladhiḥ udagra locanaḥ

analyzed: kuṇḍalīkṛta karaḥ tam abhyagāt saḥ krudhā nibhṛta karṇa pallavaḥ

original: ed emends ? gandhamada to gandhavaha) // PNc_8.55 //
analyzed: gandha mada taḥ gandha vaha

analyzed: utpatat nipatat agratas muhur muñcat aṭṭahasitam saha arciṣā

analyzed: kevalam kapila kuntalam śiraḥ paśyataḥ sya na camatkṛtam manaḥ

analyzed: evamādi yat abhūt mahīpateḥ adbhutam pathi

analyzed: tat bibheda nija sattva sampadā tigmadīdhitiḥ iva tviṣā tamaḥ

original: sariduttaraṇam
analyzed: sarit uttaraṇam

analyzed: sparśataḥ kila yat ambhasām jhaṭiti aśma bhāvam upayānti a sūrayaḥ

analyzed: mārutaiḥ apara pāra nunnayā prāṃśu vaṃśa latayā saḥ sa anugaḥ

original: tām alaṅghayad athopagūḍhayā janmabhītim iva yogavidyayā // PNc_8.59 //
analyzed: tām alaṅghayat atha upagūḍhayā janma bhītim iva yoga vidyayā

original: nagaradarśanam
analyzed: nagara darśanam

analyzed: nirmitam maṇi mayūkha pallavaiḥ bālam ātapam iva vyalokata

analyzed: indranīla kapi śīrṣakam tatas sa abhitas sphaṭika sālam aikṣata

analyzed: sa avaśeṣa jala nīla koṭibhiḥ śāradaiḥ ghaṭitam ambudaiḥ iva

analyzed: utpatāka maṇi toraṇa aṅkitam maṇditam kanaka pallava srajā

analyzed: nirvṛtaiḥ padam iva ujjhita avaniḥ sūrya maṇḍala pathena yogavān

analyzed: tatra vaidruma gavākṣam ucchritam hema harmyam avalokate sma sa

analyzed: meru śṛṅgam iva dhātu tāmrayā sandhyayā kṛta padam kva cit kva cit

original: strīdarśanam

analyzed: syntax kulakam

analyzed: durmanāḥ nṛpa

analyzed: narmadā kṛtaḥ satkāraḥ

analyzed: nivedyatām mānavadeva kasmāt alaṅkṛtā bhūmiḥ iyam tvayā iti

analyzed: tasyai śaśaṃsa nijam ā mṛgayā vihārāt vṛttāntam anta virasam sa viśuddha vṛttiḥ

analyzed: navamaḥ sargaḥ

original: narmadāvākyam
analyzed: narmadā vākyam

analyzed: atha svareṇa aṅgaṇa dīrghikāṇām saṃvāhayantī kalahaṃsa nādam

analyzed: tam iti avantīśvaram ā babhāṣe sā mekalakṣmādhara rāja kanyā

original: nāsya kṣitīśopakṛtaṃ janasya kiyat tayā pannagarājaputryā /
analyzed: na asya kṣitīśa upakṛtam janasya kiyat tayā pannaga rāja putryā

original: yasyāḥ kṛte samprati bhūṣiteyaṃ bhūmis tvayā bhūśaśalāñchanena // PNc_9.2 //
analyzed: yasyāḥ kṛte samprati bhūṣitā iyam bhūmiḥ tvayā bhū śaśa lāñchanena

original: idaṃ nṛpa tvām avalokya jātaṃ manaḥ pramodena mamāsvatantram /
analyzed: idam nṛpa tvām avalokya jātam manaḥ pramodena mama asvatantram

original: no kasya lokatrayasaṃmatānāṃ bhavet satāṃ saṅgatam utsavāya // PNc_9.3 //
analyzed: no kasya loka traya saṃmatānām bhavet satām saṅgatam utsavāya

original: adyaiṣa kasyāpi mayā śubhasya tvaddarśanenānumito vipākaḥ /
analyzed: adyā eṣa kasya api mayā śubhasya tvad darśanena anumitaḥ vipākaḥ

original: ātithyam akṣṇoḥ katham anyathaivam āyānti ratnāni bhavadvidhāni // PNc_9.4 //
analyzed: ātithyam akṣṇoḥ katham anyathā evam āyānti ratnāni bhavadvidhāni

original: so vatsa, jāte janakaḥ kṛtātmā sā puṇyamūrtijananī jagatsu /
analyzed: saḥ vatsa jāte janakaḥ kṛtātmā sā puṇya mūrti jananī jagatsu

original: mahīkalāpodvahanādipātraḥ putro yayos tvaṃ naralokapālaḥ // PNc_9.5 //
analyzed: mahī kalāpa udvahana ādi pātraḥ putraḥ yayoḥ tvam nara lokapālaḥ

original: rūpeṇa tejasvitayārjavena priyaṃvadatvena tavāmunā ca /
analyzed: rūpeṇa tejasvi tayā ārjavena priyaṃvada tvena tava amunā ca

original: dilīpaduṣyantabhagīrathādīn tān ādirājān jhaṭiti smarāmi // PNc_9.6 //
analyzed: dilīpa duṣyanta bhagīratha ādīn tān ādi rājān jhaṭiti smarāmi

original: samānabhāvais tribhir eva manye samudranemivasudhā dhṛteyam /
analyzed: samāna bhāvaiḥ tribhiḥ eva manye samudra nemi vasudhā dhṛtā iyam

original: bhujaṅgamendreṇa ca meruṇā ca doṣṇā ca maurvīkiṇaśobhinā te // PNc_9.7 //
analyzed: bhujaṅgama indreṇa ca meruṇā ca doṣṇā ca maurvī kiṇa śobhinā te

original: tvayi sthite samprati jāgarūke jagadvidheyeṣu vidhūtacintaḥ /
analyzed: tvayi sthite samprati jāgarūke jagat vidheyeṣu vidhūta cintaḥ

original: karoti netre bhagavān avaimi sa yoganidrāmukule mukundaḥ // PNc_9.8 //
analyzed: karoti netre bhagavān avaimi sa yoga nidrā mukule mukundaḥ

original: na kiṃ cid ikṣvākukulāvatīrṇād rathāṅgapāṇeḥ parihīyate te /
analyzed: na kim cit ikṣvāku kula avatīrṇāt rathāṅga pāṇeḥ parihīyate te

original: ajāyatāmbhojadṛśā viyogo vane yathā tasya tathā tavāpi // PNc_9.9 //
analyzed: ajāyata ambhoja dṛśā viyogaḥ vane yathā tasya tathā tava api

original: akṛtrimo 'yaṃ guṇavatsu jāne jātyaiva te pārthiva pakṣapātaḥ /
analyzed: akṛtrimaḥ yam guṇavatsu jāne jātyā eva te pārthiva pakṣapātaḥ

original: yat prauḍhalāvaṇyasudhāsravantyā tayā vinā cetasi tāmyasīva // PNc_9.10 //
analyzed: yat prauḍha lāvaṇya sudhā sravantyā tayā vinā cetasi tāmyasi iva

original: alaṃ viṣādena ghanādhirūḍhā lalāmabhūtā jagato 'khilasya /
analyzed: alam viṣādena ghana adhirūḍhā lalāma bhūtā khilasya

original: tavāṅkam abhyeṣyati sācireṇa śaśiprabhā pārthivakairavasya // PNc_9.11 //
analyzed: tava aṅkam abhyeṣyati sā acireṇa śaśiprabhā pārthiva kairavasya

original: ito 'dya yāntī purato mayā sā dṛṣṭā bhujaṅgādhipates tanūjā /

analyzed: bhavādṛśām eka pade viyogaḥ na kasya

original: rājendra,

analyzed: syntax kulakam

analyzed: tat asya kāryasya puraskṛtasya yatasva sīmānta vilokanāya

analyzed: vinirmitā śilpi kalā mayena mayena yā

analyzed: note allusion to aṇahilapura

original: capital of the solaṅkis?]
analyzed: capital of the solaṅkis

analyzed: tasya asura indrasya narādhipa indra jagat druhaḥ sā kila rājadhānī

analyzed: samedhitasya abja bhuvā vareṇa raṇeṣu avadhyaḥ marutām bhava iti

analyzed: karoti nirvāsita nāyakeṣu nija aṅganā hāra latā antareṣu

analyzed: karoti vaktrāṇi amara aṅganānām utsanna līlā smita candrikāni

analyzed: saḥ takṣaka āpādita kaṇṭha bhūṣaḥ bibharti līlām aśivaḥ śivasya

analyzed: rāhuḥ yathā viśva bhaya eka hetuḥ tārādhipasya ahimadīdhiteḥ ca

analyzed: avaimi lokatraya kaṇṭakasya laṅkā adhipasya iva sa maithilī īśaḥ

original: śrīkaṇṭhavaikuṇṭhapurandarādyair upekṣitaṃ yat tridaśair aśaktyā /
analyzed: śrīkaṇṭha vaikuṇṭha purandara ādyaiḥ upekṣitam yat tridaśaiḥ aśaktyā

original: kṛtasya tasyāsya bharaṃ visoḍhuṃ sambhāvyase me nṛpate tvam eva // PNc_9.59 //
analyzed: kṛtasya tasya asya bharam visoḍhum sambhāvyase me nṛpate tvam eva

original: kim anyad uttiṣṭha gṛhāṇa yātrāṃ vajrāṅkuśaṃ pratyamitapratāpa /
analyzed: kim anyat uttiṣṭha gṛhāṇa yātrām vajrāṅkuśam pratyamita pratāpa

original: tac cāvataṃsīkuru hemapadmam ānīya,
analyzed: tat ca avataṃsīkuru hema padmam ānīya

original: bhūśakra,
analyzed: bhū śakra

original: śaśiprabhāyāḥ // PNc_9.60 //
analyzed: śaśiprabhāyāḥ

original: sā te samāptādbhutasāhasasya vatsāṅkam abhyetu phaṇīndrakanyā [[vatsāṅka pun?]] /
analyzed: sā te samāpta adbhuta sāhasasya vatsa aṅkam abhyetu phaṇi indra kanyā vatsa aṅka

original: sītā yathā daśaratheḥ salīlam āropitatryambakakārmukasya // PNc_9.61 //
analyzed: sītā yathā daśaratheḥ sa līlam āropita tryambaka kārmukasya

original: [9.61a: read asamāpta ?]
analyzed: read asamāpta

original: agādhapātālatalodgatāni vinidrakundacchadasundarāni /
analyzed: agādha pātāla tala udgatāni vinidra kunda chada sundarāni

analyzed: loka dvaye samprati te yaśāṃsi ā kalpa pallavī phala vat carantu

original: prasādam āptena cirād vilīne tasmin surārātighanoparodhe /
analyzed: prasādam āptena cirāt vilīne tasmin sura arāti ghana uparodhe

original: mukhendunā pannagasundarīṇāṃ punaḥ samāgacchatu patralekhā // PNc_9.63 //
analyzed: mukha indunā pannaga sundarīṇām punar samāgacchatu patra lekhā

original: āsīt purastāt tripurāvabhaṅge yan maṇḍalaṃ bālamṛgāṅkamauleḥ /
analyzed: āsīt purastāt tripura avabhaṅge yat maṇḍalam bāla mṛgāṅka mauleḥ

original: mahāsurair bhāvini sāmparāye tavāstu tat saṃyugajāmadagnya // PNc_9.64 //
analyzed: mahā asuraiḥ bhāvini sāmparāye tava astu tat saṃyuga jāmadagnya

original: panthāḥ śivo 'yaṃ purato 'tra gantā vaṅkurmunir locanagocaraṃ te /
analyzed: panthāḥ śivaḥ yam puratas tra gantā vaṅkuḥ muniḥ locana gocaram te

original: upācares taṃ ca tathāvidhānāṃ bhaktiṃ hi gāṃ kāmaduhām uśanti // PNc_9.65 //
analyzed: upācareḥ tam ca tathāvidhānām bhaktim hi gām kāmaduhām uśanti

original: ity udīrya maṇikāntikandalīḥ kalpitaṃ tridaśacāpam asya sā /
analyzed: iti udīrya maṇi kānti kandalīḥ kalpitam tridaśa cāpam asya sā

original: ā mumoca nijakaṇkaṇaṃ bhuje jyākiṇāṅkakaṭhiṇīkṛtatvaci // PNc_9.66 //
analyzed: ā mumoca nija kaṇkaṇam bhuje jyā kiṇa aṅka kaṭhiṇīkṛta tvaci

original: narmadoktisvīkāraḥ
avadad atha saḥ sāhasonmukhas tām iha hi vayaṃ vacasi sthitās taveti /
analyzed: avadat atha saḥ sāhasa unmukhaḥ tām iha hi vayam vacasi sthitāḥ tava iti

original: taḍid iva na cirād udīritāśīḥ sarid api sāsya puras tirobabhūva // PNc_9.67 //
analyzed: taḍit iva na cirāt udīrita āśīḥ sarit api sā asya puras tirobabhūva

original: iti śrīmṛgāṅkadattasūnoḥ parimalāparanāmnaḥ padmaguptasya kṛtau navasāhasāṅkacarite mahākāvye narmadāsaṃvādo nāma navamaḥ sargaḥ ************************************************
analyzed: iti śrī mṛgāṅkadatta sūnoḥ parimala apara nāmnaḥ padmaguptasya kṛtau navasāhasāṅkacarite mahākāvye narmadāsaṃvādaḥ nāma navamaḥ sargaḥ

original: daśamaḥ sargaḥ
analyzed: daśamaḥ sargaḥ

original: nāyakasya ramāṅgadaṃ prati praśnaḥ
analyzed: nāyakasya ramāṅgadam prati praśnaḥ

original: atha mekalācalasutātirohitau atimātravismayarasārdramānasaḥ /
analyzed: atha mekalācalasutā tirohitau atimātra vismaya rasa ārdra mānasaḥ

original: daśanacchavicchuritapāṭalādharaḥ sa ramāṅgadaṃ nṛpatir ity avocat // PNc_10.1 //
analyzed: daśana chavi churita pāṭalā dharaḥ sa ramāṅgadam nṛpatiḥ iti avocat

original: adhirohati svayam acintitāpy aho śubhasampadaṅkam aparāṅmukhe vidhau /
analyzed: adhirohati svayam a cintitā api aho śubha sampad aṅkam a parāṅmukhe vidhau

original: savapur vilocanapathaṃ yadāvayor amṛtāṃśusūtir iyam āpadāpagā // PNc_10.2 //
analyzed: sa vapuḥ vilocana patham yadā āvayoḥ amṛta aṃśu sūtiḥ iyam āpad āpagā

original: idam indrajālam iti me samutthitām matim etad arpitam udārayā tayā /
analyzed: idam indrajālam iti me samutthitām matim etat arpitam udārayā tayā

original: vikasanmarīciracitendrakārmukaṃ karavarti ratnavalayaṃ vilumpati // PNc_10.3 //
analyzed: vikasat marīci racita indrakārmukam kara varti ratna valayam vilumpati

original: ayi mekalādritanayāpuraḥkṛte kriyate kim atra vada kṛtyavastuni /
analyzed: ayi mekalādri tanayā puras kṛte kriyate kim atra vada kṛtya vastuni

original: tava yat sadā nayarahasyavedino na dhiyaś caranty anayapāṃsule pathi // PNc_10.4 //
analyzed: tava yat sadā naya rahasya vedinaḥ na dhiyaḥ caranti anaya pāṃsule pathi

original: ramāṅgadavākyam
analyzed: ramāṅgada vākyam

original: iti pārthivena kathite dadhan manāk pulakena cumbitakapolam ānanam /
analyzed: iti pārthivena kathite dadhan manāk pulakena cumbita kapolam ānanam

original: idam āttanītipatham ādade vacaḥ smitapuṣpitādharadalo ramāṅgadaḥ // PNc_10.5 //
analyzed: idam ātta nīti patham ādade vacaḥ smita puṣpita adhara dalaḥ ramā aṅgadaḥ

original: iha kiṃ pratisphurati me tavāgrato nayaśāstranīranidhipāradṛśvanaḥ /
analyzed: iha kim pratisphurati me tava agratas naya śāstra nīranidhi pāra dṛśvanaḥ

original: avalīḍhaviśvatamasaḥ puro raver na hi jātu dipakaśikhā prakāśate // PNc_10.6 //
analyzed: avalīḍha viśva tamasaḥ puras raveḥ na hi jātu dipaka śikhā prakāśate

original: viṣaye 'tra maunam ucitaṃ hi mādṛśām avaśas tathāpi kathayāmi kiṃ cana /
analyzed: viṣaye maunam ucitam hi mādṛśām avaśaḥ tathā api kathayāmi kim cana

original: kṣitipālamaulimaṇiveṇikātithes tava kena śāsanam idaṃ vilaṅghyate // PNc_10.7 //
analyzed: kṣitipāla mauli maṇi veṇikā atitheḥ tava kena śāsanam idam vilaṅghyate

original: prathamaṃ hi maṇḍalam akhaṇḍaśāktibhir vijigīṣubhiḥ svam abhitaḥ prasādhyate /
analyzed: prathamam hi maṇḍalam akhaṇḍa śāktibhiḥ vijigīṣubhiḥ svam abhitas prasādhyate

original: paramaṇḍale tad anu nītipāragair avanīpurandara,
analyzed: para maṇḍale tat anu nīti pāragaiḥ avanī purandara

original: karaḥ prasāryate // PNc_10.8 //
analyzed: karaḥ prasāryate

original: tad apāsyam evam avitarkitotthite paripanthinām iha vidheyavastuni /
analyzed: tat apāsyam evam a vitarkita utthite paripanthinām iha vidheya vastuni

original: yadi nābhaviṣyad abhimānaśālinas tava rājyam uddhṛtasamastakaṇṭakam // PNc_10.9 //
analyzed: yadi nā abhaviṣyat abhimāna śālinaḥ tava rājyam uddhṛta samasta kaṇṭakam

original: śrutaśaktisaṅkalitamantraniścayair upalabdhaṣaḍguṇavivekavartmabhiḥ /
analyzed: śruta śakti saṅkalita mantra niścayaiḥ upalabdha ṣaḍguṇa viveka vartmabhiḥ

original: tadupāyatattvam adhigamya dhūḥ kṣites tava mantribhir nṛpa durudvahohyate // PNc_10.10 //
analyzed: tad upāya tattvam adhigamya dhūḥ kṣiteḥ tava mantribhiḥ nṛpa durudvahā uhyate

original: atisāndrakāñcanamarīcipiṅgalaṃ digupāhitapracurapatraśobhinaḥ /
analyzed: ati sāndra kāñcana marīci piṅgalam diś upāhita pracura patra śobhinaḥ

original: tava kośam utsṛjati na kṣaṇaṃ ramā paramāravaṃśasarasīsaroruha // PNc_10.11 //
analyzed: tava kośam utsṛjati na kṣaṇam ramā parama āra vaṃśa sarasī saroruha

original: priyakīrtayo jayapavitritāśayās tarasā tṛṇīkṛtajagattrayā yudhi /
analyzed: priya kīrtayaḥ jaya pavitrita āśayāḥ tarasā tṛṇīkṛta jagattrayāḥ yudhi

original: jagatīviśeṣaka tavānujīvino nivasanty avantiviṣaye sahasraśaḥ // PNc_10.12 //
analyzed: jagatī viśeṣaka tava anujīvinaḥ nivasanti avanti viṣaye sahasraśas

original: pṛthivībhṛtaḥ prathitavikrameṇa ye gamitās tvayā vaśam upāyasampadā /
analyzed: pṛthivībhṛtaḥ prathita vikrameṇa ye gamitāḥ tvayā vaśam upāya sampadā

original: nayavartmagāḥ kṣitipate tavānyathā na bhavanti bhāvisamarābhiśaṅkayā // PNc_10.13 //
analyzed: naya vartma gāḥ kṣitipate tava anyathā na bhavanti bhāvi samara abhiśaṅkayā

original: apakartum atra samaye tavāttabhīr manasāpi hūṇanṛpatir na vāñchati /
analyzed: apakartum atra samaye tava ātta bhīḥ manasā api hūṇa nṛpatiḥ na vāñchati

original: ibhakumbhabhittidalanodyame harer na kapiḥ kadā cana saṭāṃ vikaṛṣati // PNc_10.14 //
analyzed: ibha kumbha bhitti dalana udyame hareḥ na kapiḥ kadā cana saṭām vikaṛṣati

original: asikāntijālajaṭilāgrabāhunā raṇasīmni nātha nihateṣu bhartṛṣu /
analyzed: asi kānti jāla jaṭila agra bāhunā raṇa sīmni nātha nihateṣu bhartṛṣu

original: bhavatātra vāgaḍavadhūjanaḥ kṛto ratisandhivigrahakathāparāṅmukhaḥ // PNc_10.15 //
analyzed: bhavatā atra vāgaḍa vadhū janaḥ kṛtaḥ rati sandhi vigraha kathā parāṅmukhaḥ

original: adhunāpi deva muralāṅganājanais vijayapraśastir iva likhyate tava /
analyzed: adhunā api deva muralā aṅganā janaiḥ vijaya praśastiḥ iva likhyate tava

original: galadañjanāśrupṛṣatāvalicchalāl lasadindupāṇḍuṣu kapolabhittiṣu // PNc_10.16 //
analyzed: galat añjana aśru pṛṣata āvali chalāt lasat indu pāṇḍuṣu kapola bhittiṣu

original: rabhasād apāsya maṇikaṅkaṇāvalīḥ kanakāravindakatakeṣu te 'sinā /
analyzed: rabhasāt apāsya maṇi kaṅkaṇa āvalīḥ kanaka aravinda katakeṣu te sinā

original: na kim arpitāni nṛpa lāṭayoṣitā sphaṭikākṣasūtravalayāni pāṇiṣu // PNc_10.17 //
analyzed: na kim arpitāni nṛpa lāṭa yoṣitā sphaṭika akṣa sūtra valayāni pāṇiṣu

original: nayanāmbubhiḥ snapitadhūsarādharāḥ pratibaddharūkṣamalinaikaveṇayaḥ /
analyzed: nayana ambubhiḥ snapita dhūsara adharāḥ pratibaddha rūkṣa malina eka veṇayaḥ

original: nihitā na kiṃ mahati śokasāgare jagatīndra kosalapateḥ purandhrayaḥ // PNc_10.18 //
analyzed: nihitāḥ na kim mahati śoka sāgare jagatī indra kosala pateḥ purandhrayaḥ

original: uditena vairitimiradruhābhitas tava nātha vikramamayūkhamālinā /
analyzed: uditena vairi timira druhā abhitas tava nātha vikrama mayūkha mālinā

original: gamitāḥ prabhāvalayaśūnyatāṃ jhaṭity aparāntapārthivavadhūmukhendavaḥ // PNc_10.19 //
analyzed: gamitāḥ prabhā valaya śūnya tām jhaṭiti aparānta pārthiva vadhū mukha indavaḥ

original: ativelam uttaradigantavartinā samaraśramābhyuditagharmabindunā /
analyzed: ativelam uttara diś anta vartinā samara śrama abhyudita gharma bindunā

original: śaradindunirmalam apāyi bhūbhṛtām asipatrapātrapatitaṃ tvayā yaśaḥ // PNc_10.20 //
analyzed: śarad indu nirmalam apāyi bhūbhṛtām asi patra pātra patitam tvayā yaśaḥ

original: nijarandhragopanapaṭīyasābhitaḥ pararandhradṛṣṭipaṭucāracakṣuṣā /
analyzed: nija randhra gopana paṭīyasā abhitas para randhra dṛṣṭi paṭu cāra cakṣuṣā

original: nayabhinnasāhasabhuvā bhuvastale bhavatā samaṃ kathaya ko viruddhyate // PNc_10.21 //
analyzed: naya bhinna sāhasa bhuvā bhuvaḥ tale bhavatā samam kathaya kaḥ viruddhyate

original: naradeva daivam adhikṛtya yā vipat nipataty avantiviṣaye kathaṃ cana /
analyzed: naradeva daivam adhikṛtya yā vipad nipatati avanti viṣaye katham cana

original: śikhimuktamantrahaviṣā vihanyate tava sā vasiṣṭhamahasā purodhasā // PNc_10.22 //
analyzed: śikhi mukta mantra haviṣā vihanyate tava sā vasiṣṭha mahasā purodhasā

original: nṛpa vāsarāṇi nirupaplavāḥ prajāḥ sukham ātmakarmaṇi ratā nayanti yat /
analyzed: nṛpa vāsarāṇi nirupaplavāḥ prajāḥ sukham ātma karmaṇi ratāḥ nayanti yat

original: vijayaṃ jayaikasuhṛdo 'sya sarvadā nanu kārmukasya tava tadvijṛmbhitam // PNc_10.23 //
analyzed: vijayam sya sarvadā nanu kārmukasya tava tat vijṛmbhitam

original: iti kiṃ cid eva na tava svamaṇḍale nṛpa cintyam asty uditaśaktisampadaḥ /
analyzed: iti kim cit eva na tava sva maṇḍale nṛpa cintyam asti udita śakti sampadaḥ

original: adhunā tu nītinihitena cetasā phaṇilokakṛtyam idam eva cintyatām // PNc_10.24 //
analyzed: adhunā tu nīti nihitena cetasā phaṇi loka kṛtyam idam eva cintyatām

original: prabhuśāktir udyamaparatvam arpita- trijagaccamatkṛtir ahaṅkṛtiś ca sā /
analyzed: prabhu śāktiḥ udyama para tvam trijagat camatkṛtiḥ ahaṅkṛtiḥ ca sā

original: asurasya tasya kathitā narendra te nagarī ca mekalanagendrakanyayā // PNc_10.25 //
analyzed: asurasya tasya kathitā narendra te nagarī ca mekala naga indra kanyayā

original: abhigamya eva sas tavādhunā ripur marutām udāranijakāryasiddhaye /
analyzed: abhigamyaḥ eva saḥ tava adhunā ripuḥ marutām udāra nija kārya siddhaye

original: śrutilagnagandhagajabṛṃhitaḥ kṣaṇaṃ nṛpa kesarī kathaya kiṃ vilambate // PNc_10.26 //
analyzed: śruti lagna gandha gaja bṛṃhitaḥ kṣaṇam nṛpa kesarī kathaya kim vilambate

original: navasāhasāṅka,
analyzed: nava sāhasa aṅka

original: na tavāsurād ahaṃ kalayāmi samprati kim apy atādṛśam /
analyzed: na tava asurāt aham kalayāmi samprati kim api a tādṛśam

original: vidhutiḥ kadā cana vibho na bhūbhṛtaḥ kalaviṅkapakṣapavanena śāṅkyate // PNc_10.27 //
analyzed: vidhutiḥ kadā cana vibho na bhūbhṛtaḥ kalaviṅka pakṣa pavanena śāṅkyate

original: bhavatā yadoccalita eṣa dakṣiṇaś caraṇas tadaiva suravairiyoṣitām /
analyzed: bhavatā yadā uccalitaḥ eṣa dakṣiṇaḥ caraṇaḥ tadā eva sura vairi yoṣitām

original: vigalanti deva nayanodabindavaḥ śaradindupāṇḍuni kapolamaṇḍale // PNc_10.28 //
analyzed: vigalanti deva nayana uda bindavaḥ śarad indu pāṇḍuni kapola maṇḍale

original: vijayaikasadmani guṇaḥ śarāsane tava yāvad atra na nṛpādhirohati /
analyzed: vijaya eka sadmani guṇaḥ śarāsane tava yāvat atra na nṛpa adhirohati

original: tuhinacchaṭādhavalacāmarasmitā vilasanti tāvad asurālaye śriyaḥ // PNc_10.29 //
analyzed: tuhina chaṭā dhavala cāmara smitāḥ vilasanti tāvat asurālaye śriyaḥ

original: kanakāravindam aravindalocana praṇayena naiva saḥ samarpayiṣyati /
analyzed: kanaka aravindam aravinda locana praṇayena nā eva saḥ samarpayiṣyati

original: suranirjayārjitamadāvṛte 'ntaraṃ labhate na sāma kila tādṛśaṃ hṛdi // PNc_10.30 //
analyzed: sura nirjaya arjita mada āvṛte ntaram labhate na sāma kila tādṛśam hṛdi

original: bhavataḥ kuto 'pi nṛpa yāvad āgamaṃ na sa vetti tāvad abhiyoktum arhasi /
analyzed: bhavataḥ kutas nṛpa yāvat āgamam na sa vetti tāvat abhiyoktum arhasi

original: sahasānyathā rahasi mantribodhitaḥ paritaḥ svadurghaṭane yatiṣyate // PNc_10.31 //
analyzed: sahasā anyathā rahasi mantri bodhitaḥ paritas sva durghaṭane yatiṣyate

original: kṛtanūtanārgalakapāṭasaṃpuṭāṃ subhaṭair udāyudhakarair adhiṣṭhitām /
analyzed: kṛta nūtana argala kapāṭa saṃpuṭām su bhaṭaiḥ udāyudha karaiḥ adhiṣṭhitām

original: paritaḥ sukhātaparikhāṃ punaḥ purīṃ racitaikadurgam apathāṃ vidhāsyati // PNc_10.32 //
analyzed: paritas su khāta parikhām punar purīm racita eka durgam a pathām vidhāsyati

original: valite 'pi kiṃ cana dhanuḥparigrahe bhuvanatrayaprathitasāhase tvayi /
analyzed: valite pi kim cana dhanuḥ parigrahe bhuvana traya prathita sāhase tvayi

original: api jāyate dhṛtiviparyayo harer asureṣu kaiva gaṇanā tapasviṣu // PNc_10.33 //
analyzed: api jāyate dhṛti viparyayaḥ hareḥ asureṣu kā eva gaṇanā tapasviṣu

original: niyataṃ, narendra,
analyzed: niyatam narendra

original: vidatphaṇāmaṇi- sphuradaṃśusūtritanavātapaṃ nabhaḥ /
analyzed: vidat phaṇāmaṇi sphurat aṃśu sūtrita nava ātapam nabhaḥ

original: suravairivīryadṛḍhamatsaraṃ puraḥ phaṇisainyam ājibhuvi te bhaviṣyati // PNc_10.34 //
analyzed: sura vairi vīrya dṛḍha matsaram puras phaṇi sainyam āji bhuvi te bhaviṣyati

original: adhunaiva te 'tra nijatāṃ vrajanti vā subhaṭāḥ svayaṃ vidhivaśena ke cana /
analyzed: adhunā eva te nija tām vrajanti vā su bhaṭāḥ svayam vidhi vaśena ke cana

original: kapayaḥ purā raghupater yathā vane hanumatpataṅgatanayāṅgadādayaḥ // PNc_10.35 //
analyzed: kapayaḥ purā raghu pateḥ yathā vane hanumat pataṅga tanaya aṅgada ādayaḥ

original: yad udīritaś ca purukutsakāntayā saritāsi vaṅkumunidarśanaṃ prati /
analyzed: yat udīritaḥ ca purukutsa kāntayā saritā asi vaṅku muni darśanam prati

original: pratibhāti kiṃ cana mamaiva tatra te kim u nirmukheṅgitavidas tadiṅgitam // PNc_10.36 //
analyzed: pratibhāti kim cana mama eva tatra te kim nirmukha iṅgita vidaḥ tat iṅgitam

original: athavaika eva vibhur asy arer vadhe nanu dhāma tat sphurati śārṅgiṇas tvayi /
analyzed: athavā ekaḥ eva vibhuḥ asi areḥ vadhe nanu dhāma tat sphurati śārṅgiṇaḥ tvayi

analyzed: udita krudhaḥ tripura dāha ḍambare śara tām avāpa kila yat pinākinaḥ

original: avalokayāmi śakunaṃ yathā tathā tad avaimi pakṣmaladṛśaḥ sabhāntare /
analyzed: avalokayāmi śakunam yathā tathā tat avaimi pakṣmala dṛśaḥ sabhā antare

analyzed: tava vedmi pauruṣam aham tvayā vinā na vapuḥ sthitim kva cana kartum utsahe

analyzed: nṛpa

analyzed: var

original: nāyakavākyam
analyzed: nāyaka vākyam

analyzed: pātāla kalpavṛkṣāṇām ānanda aśru lavāḥ iva

anāmayam ivāpṛcchat tam abhyāgatam abjinī // PNc_11.8 //
