original: saḥ kuraṅgadṛśeva nidrayā caturaṃ locanayor acumbyata // PNc_12.7 //
analyzed: saḥ kuraṅga dṛśā iva nidrayā caturam locanayoḥ acumbyata

original: svapuropavane samutsukaḥ sumukhīṃ svapnaprathena pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: sva pura upavane samutsukaḥ su mukhīm svapna prathena pārthivaḥ

original: avataṃsitahemapaṅkajām atha tām aṅkagatāṃ vyalokayat // PNc_12.8 //
analyzed: avataṃsita hema paṅkajām atha tām aṅka gatām vyalokayat

original: abhikāntam apāṅgapātinā jitanīlābjadalena cakṣuṣā /
analyzed: abhikāntam apāṅga pātinā jita nīlābja dalena cakṣuṣā

original: dadhatīm apavartitaṃ hriyā mukham āpāṇḍukapolamaṇḍalam // PNc_12.9 //
analyzed: dadhatīm apavartitam hriyāḥ mukham āpāṇḍu kapola maṇḍalam

original: śaradindumarīcinirmalaṃ vigaladvepathunā stanāṃśukam /
analyzed: śarad indu marīci nirmalam vigalat vepathunā stana aṃśukam

original: muhur ākṣipatīm alakṣitam ślathamuktāvalayena pāṇinā // PNc_12.10 //
analyzed: muhur ākṣipatīm alakṣitam ślatha muktā valayena pāṇinā

original: navapallavakāntinā kim apy acirāvāsitapuṣpaketunā /
analyzed: nava pallava kāntinā kim api acira āvāsita puṣpaketunā

original: lalitām adhareṇa bibhratīṃ mukhacandrāṃśusaṭāṃ smitacchaṭām // PNc_12.11 //
analyzed: lalitām adhareṇa bibhratīm mukha candra aṃśu saṭām smita chaṭām

original: jagadekavilokanotsave vapuṣi svedakaṇair alaṅkṛtām /
analyzed: jagat eka vilokana utsave vapuṣi sveda kaṇaiḥ alaṅkṛtām

original: uditām iva mandarāhatāt udadher lagnasudhālavāṃ śriyam // PNc_12.12 //
analyzed: uditām iva mandara āhatāt udadheḥ lagna sudhā lavām śriyam

original: valitāhitaniḥsahāṅguli- svakaraśleṣaviśeṣakampini /
analyzed: valita āhita niḥsaha aṅguli sva kara śleṣa viśeṣa kampini

original: pulakiny adhikaṃ vimuñcatīṃ cakitaṃ vāmakuce vilocane // PNc_12.13 //
analyzed: pulakini adhikam vimuñcatīm cakitam vāma kuce vilocane

original: atibhāsuraratnakuṇḍalām atikāntāyatahāramaṇḍalām /
analyzed: ati bhāsura ratna kuṇḍalām ati kānta āyata hāra maṇḍalām

original: jaghanaślathahemamekhalām asameṣor adhidevatām iva // PNc_12.14 //
analyzed: jaghana ślatha hema mekhalām asameṣoḥ adhidevatām iva

original: [SYNTAX: kulakam]
analyzed: syntax kulakam

original: nāyakoktiḥ
analyzed: nāyaka uktiḥ

original: atha sasmitam āttavepathuḥ patito manmathapatriṇāṃ pathi /
analyzed: atha sa smitam ātta vepathuḥ patitaḥ manmatha patriṇām pathi

original: iti tāṃ praṇayārdragirā saḥ kilāmbhojamukhīm avocat // PNc_12.15 //
analyzed: iti tām praṇaya ārdra girā saḥ kila ambhoja mukhīm avocat

original: valitaṃ na vibhāti pṛṣṭhataḥ kabarīkāntam idaṃ tavānanam /
analyzed: valitam na vibhāti pṛṣṭhatas kabarī kāntam idam tava ānanam

original: ayi nīlapayodhalekhayā saḥ pariṣvaṅgam ivendumaṇḍalam // PNc_12.16 //
analyzed: ayi nīla payodha lekhayā saḥ pariṣvaṅgam iva indu maṇḍalam

original: idam aṅgadavartinā karair maṇinā ruddham iveritaṃ hriyā /
analyzed: idam aṅgada vartinā karaiḥ maṇinā ruddham iva īritam hriyā

original: na samarthamitopavartituṃ vadanaṃ te lalitāṅgi kā gatiḥ // PNc_12.17 //
analyzed: na samartha mita upavartitum vadanam te lalita aṅgi kā gatiḥ

original: idam ardhavilokitādharaṃ madhurāpāṅgataraṅgitekṣaṇam /
analyzed: idam ardha vilokita adharam madhura apāṅga taraṅgita īkṣaṇam

original: śriyam ātanute sitāsitaṃ sutanu tryaśruvilokitaṃ tava // PNc_12.18 //
analyzed: śriyam ātanute sita asitam su tanu tri aśru vilokitam tava

original: militas tava gaṇḍalekhayā sudati svedalavārdrapatrayā /
analyzed: militaḥ tava gaṇḍa lekhayā sudati sveda lava ārdra patrayā

original: kim api spṛhaṇīya eṣa me marudāsannadivāntaśītalaḥ // PNc_12.19 //
analyzed: kim api spṛhaṇīyaḥ eṣa me marut āsanna divānta śītalaḥ

original: ayam utpalaḥpatralocane tava bimbādharapāṭalacchaviḥ /
analyzed: ayam utpalaḥ patra locane tava bimba adhara pāṭala chaviḥ

original: avalokaya kartum īhate padam astācalacūlake raviḥ // PNc_12.20 //
analyzed: avalokaya kartum īhate padam asta acala cūlake raviḥ

original: duritaghnam idaṃ sudarśanaṃ dadhatā bimbam anūrusāratheḥ /
analyzed: durita ghnam idam sudarśanam dadhatā bimbam an ūru sāratheḥ

original: smaralakṣmi vihāyasāmunā tava kṛṣṇena hṛte vilocane // PNc_12.21 //
analyzed: smara lakṣmi vihāyasā amunā tava kṛṣṇena hṛte vilocane

original: aravindakareṇa lohitaṃ kamalinyā dhṛtam ātapāśukam /
analyzed: aravinda kareṇa lohitam kamalinyā dhṛtam ātapa āśukam

original: idam uṣṇakareṇa kṛṣyate valitenāparadigvadhūṃ prati // PNc_12.22 //
analyzed: idam uṣṇakareṇa kṛṣyate valitena apara diś vadhūm prati

original: karuṇārpitalocanaṃ mithaḥ kramaviśleṣagaladbisāṅkuram /
analyzed: karuṇā arpita locanam mithas krama viśleṣa galat bisa aṅkuram

original: idam ārdrayatīva me mano mithunaṃ mānini cakravākayoḥ // PNc_12.23 //
analyzed: idam ārdrayati iva me manaḥ mithunam mānini cakravākayoḥ

original: avalokaya bhīru samprati tritayena tritayaṃ viyujyate /
analyzed: avalokaya bhīru samprati tritayena tritayam viyujyate

original: dyumaṇiḥ prabhayā,
analyzed: dyumaṇiḥ prabhayā

original: śriyāmbujaṃ priyayā sāśrur ayaṃ vihaṅgamaḥ // PNc_12.24 //
analyzed: śriyā ambujam priyayā sa aśruḥ ayam vihaṅgamaḥ

original: idam ambarapalvalodarād atitāmradyuti kāladantinā /
analyzed: idam ambara palvala udarāt ati tāmra dyuti kāla dantinā

original: ravivāriruhaṃ nirasyate kanakasnigdhamayūkhakesaram // PNc_12.25 //
analyzed: ravi vāriruham nirasyate kanaka snigdha mayūkha kesaram

original: paricumbati vāruṇīṃ diśaṃ purato rāgahṛte vivasvati /
analyzed: paricumbati vāruṇīm diśam puratas rāga hṛte vivasvati

original: dig iyaṃ śatamanyulāñchitā bhavati śyāmamukhī mitodari // PNc_12.26 //
analyzed: diś iyam śatamanyu lāñchitā bhavati śyāma mukhī mita udari

original: iha bhānty atilohitātapa- stabakāḥ paśya vanāntabhūmayaḥ /
analyzed: iha bhānti ati lohita ātapa stabakāḥ paśya vanānta bhūmayaḥ

original: tapanānugamotsavāṅkitā dinalakṣmyeva padaiḥ sayāvakaiḥ // PNc_12.27 //
analyzed: tapana anugama utsava aṅkitā dina lakṣmyā iva padaiḥ sa yāvakaiḥ

original: madirākṣi puro 'valokyatām aparasyāmayamānato diśi /
analyzed: madirā akṣi puras valokyatām diśi

original: stimitām avagāhate gatiṃ gurugotraskhalitākulo raviḥ // PNc_12.28 //
analyzed: stimitām avagāhate gatim guru gotra skhalita ākulaḥ raviḥ

original: amunā śatapatrabandhunā sahasā sundari yad yad ujjhitam /
analyzed: amunā śatapatra bandhunā sahasā sundari yat yat ujjhitam

original: samam adriguhāmukhasthitais timirais tat tad itaḥkaṭākṣitam // PNc_12.29 //
analyzed: samam adri guhā mukha sthitaiḥ timiraiḥ tat tat itas kaṭākṣitam

original: viramannayi pallavādhare suravīthīpathiko virocanaḥ /
analyzed: viraman nayi pallava adhare sura vīthī pathikaḥ virocanaḥ

original: ayam astagirer niṣīdati svakarāmṛṣṭaśilātale tale // PNc_12.30 //
analyzed: ayam asta gireḥ niṣīdati sva kara āmṛṣṭa śilā tale tale

original: iyam aśrutaraṅgitāṃ dṛśaṃ dvitaye cakravadhūr vimuñcati /
analyzed: iyam aśru taraṅgitām dṛśam dvitaye cakravadhūḥ vimuñcati

original: navakuṅkumalohite ravau dayite cāndraviyogaviklave // PNc_12.31 //
analyzed: nava kuṅkuma lohite ravau dayite cāndra viyoga viklave

original: calito 'si vada kva māṃ vinā virahaṃ soḍhum ahaṃ na te kṣamā /
analyzed: calitaḥ si vada kva mām vinā viraham soḍhum aham na te kṣamā

original: kṛtapaṅkajakuḍmalāñjalir nalinī kāntam itīva yācate // PNc_12.32 //
analyzed: kṛta paṅkaja kuḍmala añjaliḥ nalinī kāntam iti iva yācate

original: anupuñjitapiṅgadīdhiti- drutalākṣāruṇadarpaṇopamam /
analyzed: anupuñjita piṅga dīdhiti druta lākṣā aruṇa darpaṇa upamam

original: parato 'stagirer idaṃ galaty anavadyāṅgi pataṅgamaṇḍalam // PNc_12.33 //
analyzed: paratas sta gireḥ idam galati anavadya aṅgi pataṅga maṇḍalam

original: sarale saha vārijaśriyā nibhṛtaṃ kvāpi gataḥ sa bhāskaraḥ /
analyzed: sarale saha vārija śriyā nibhṛtam kvāpi gataḥ sa bhāskaraḥ

original: vada tena vinābjinī kathaṃ kṣaṇadām adya natāṅgi neṣyati // PNc_12.34 //
analyzed: vada tena vinā abjinī katham kṣaṇadām adya nata aṅgi neṣyati

original: sphuṭavidrumarājinaikataḥ sadṛśaṃ jātam udañcatā nabhaḥ /
analyzed: sphuṭa vidruma rājinā ekatas sadṛśam jātam udañcatā nabhaḥ

original: sudati tvadapāṅgapaṭale paṭu sāndhye mahasi prasarpati // PNc_12.35 //
analyzed: sudati tvad apāṅga paṭale paṭu sāndhye mahasi prasarpati

original: paripiñjaritāsitāmbarair nibiḍaiḥ kaṃ na haranti hāribhiḥ /
analyzed: paripiñjarita asita ambaraiḥ nibiḍaiḥ kam na haranti hāribhiḥ

original: ayi sāyam imāḥ payodharair dhṛtasandhyātapakuṅkumair diśaḥ // PNc_12.36 //
analyzed: ayi sāyam imāḥ payodharaiḥ dhṛta sandhyā ātapa kuṅkumaiḥ diśaḥ

original: kṣaṇadābhimukhena khaṇḍitā nanu sandhyā tamasā manasvinī /
analyzed: kṣaṇadā abhimukhena khaṇḍitā nanu sandhyā tamasā manasvinī

original: kupiteva nivartate javāt ativācālavihaṅganūpuram // PNc_12.37 //
analyzed: kupitā iva nivartate javāt ati vācāla vihaṅga nūpuram

original: tava caṇḍi viḍamayaty adas tanusandhyātapaliptam ambujam /
analyzed: tava caṇḍi viḍamayati adaḥ tanu sandhyā ātapa liptam ambujam

original: maṇikuṇḍalakāntisaṅkarāt idam ātāmrakapolam ānanam // PNc_12.38 //
analyzed: maṇi kuṇḍala kānti saṅkarāt idam ātāmra kapolam ānanam

original: uditāni tamāṃsi sā ca te dayitā dainyam upaiti padminī /
analyzed: uditāni tamāṃsi sā ca te dayitā dainyam upaiti padminī

original: dinabhartur itīva śaṃsituṃ sahasā sundari sandhyayā gatam // PNc_12.39 //
analyzed: dinabhartuḥ iti iva śaṃsitum sahasā sundari sandhyayā gatam

original: nihitaṃ balidīpakeṣu tat tapanenāśu mahaḥ kṛśodari /
analyzed: nihitam bali dīpakeṣu tat tapanena āśu mahaḥ kṛśa udari

original: svaśarasphuritaṃ manobhuvā tava savṛīḍavilokiteṣv iva // PNc_12.40 //
analyzed: sva śara sphuritam manobhuvā tava sa vṛīḍa vilokiteṣu iva

original: atasīkusumopamaṃ mukhe tad anu tvatkucacūcukadyuti /
analyzed: atasī kusuma upamam mukhe tat anu tvad kuca cūcuka dyuti

original: atha bālatamālamāṃsalaṃ prasṛtaṃ saṃprati sarvatas tamaḥ // PNc_12.41 //
analyzed: atha bāla tamāla māṃsalam prasṛtam saṃprati sarvatas tamaḥ

original: tarukoṭaramūkaśārikaṃ nijanīḍāṅkanilīnakokilam /
analyzed: taru koṭara mūka śārikam nija nīḍa aṅka nilīna kokilam

original: karabhoru sanidrabarhiṇaṃ pramododyānam idaṃ nimīlati // PNc_12.42 //
analyzed: karabha ūru sa nidrā barhiṇam pramoda udyānam idam nimīlati

original: prasṛtair girikandarodarāt idam indīvaradāmakāntibhiḥ /
analyzed: prasṛtaiḥ giri kandara udarāt idam indīvara dāma kāntibhiḥ

original: adhunā timirair vigāhyate bhuvanaṃ padmasaraś ca dantibhiḥ // PNc_12.43 //
analyzed: adhunā timiraiḥ vigāhyate bhuvanam padma saraḥ ca dantibhiḥ

original: timirāñjanabhaktiśobhinā dhavalenāyatapakṣmapaṅktinā /
analyzed: timira añjana bhakti śobhinā dhavalena āyata pakṣma paṅktinā

original: amunā bhavatīva cakṣuṣā kumudenaiti rucaṃ kumudvatī // PNc_12.44 //
analyzed: amunā bhavati iva cakṣuṣā kumudena eti rucam kumudvatī

original: udarasthitayoḥ kutūhalāt alinoḥ śrotum ivāsphuṭaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: udara sthitayoḥ kutūhalāt alinoḥ śrotum iva asphuṭam vacaḥ

original: kamalasya nilīya niścalaṃ dalasandhiṣv avatiṣṭhate tamaḥ // PNc_12.45 //
analyzed: kamalasya nilīya niścalam dala sandhiṣu avatiṣṭhate tamaḥ

original: tarale 'tisitāsitadyutāv iha dolāyitam īkṣaṇadvaye /
analyzed: tarale tisita asita dyutau iha dolāyitam īkṣaṇa dvaye

original: likhitāgarupatralekhayos timiraṃ mūrcchati te kapolayoḥ // PNc_12.46 //
analyzed: likhita agaru patra lekhayoḥ timiram mūrcchati te kapolayoḥ

original: uḍubhiḥ kham itas tataḥ kṣaṇād uditair bhaṅgurakeśi bhāty adaḥ /
analyzed: uḍubhiḥ kham itas tatas kṣaṇāt uditaiḥ bhaṅgura keśi bhāti adaḥ

original: atigāḍhadinoṣṇajanmabhiḥ paritaḥ svedalavair ivāṅkitam // PNc_12.47 //
analyzed: ati gāḍha dina uṣṇajanmabhiḥ paritas sveda lavaiḥ iva aṅkitam

original: śabalaṃ śaśalāñchanatviṣā satamaḥ paśya mahendradiṅmukham /
analyzed: śabalam śaśa lāñchana tviṣā satamaḥ paśya mahā indra diś mukham

original: acalendrasutāsmitacchavi- churitaṃ kaṇṭham umāpater iva // PNc_12.48 //
analyzed: acala indrasuta asmita chavi churitam kaṇṭham umāpateḥ iva

original: ahirājasute vilokyatām iyam indoḥ prathamodgatā kalā /
analyzed: ahi rāja sute vilokyatām iyam indoḥ prathama udgatā kalā

original: ayi bhāti yayā indradiṅmukhe pramadevārdranakhāṅkarekhayā // PNc_12.49 //
analyzed: ayi bhāti yayā indra diṅmukhe pramadā iva ārdra nakha aṅka rekhayā

original: yadi kautukam āyatekṣane na cirād eva sudhārdrayānayā /
analyzed: yadi kautukam āyata īkṣane na cirāt eva sudhā ārdrayā anayā

original: aravindadaladyutau kare mṛdu līlāvalayaṃ karomi te // PNc_12.50 //
analyzed: aravinda dala dyutau kare mṛdu līlā valayam karomi te

original: anavadyam itaḥ puraḥ sthitaṃ viditaṃ kiṃ śaśinā tavānanam /
analyzed: anavadyam itas puras sthitam viditam kim śaśinā tava ānanam

original: nabhasaḥ sahasāṅkam eṣa yan na kalaṅkatrapayādhirohati // PNc_12.51 //
analyzed: nabhasaḥ sahasā aṅkam eṣa yat na kalaṅka trapayā adhirohati

original: idam udgatam indumaṇḍalaṃ dig iyaṃ paśya bibharti lakṣmavat /
analyzed: idam udgatam indu maṇḍalam diś iyam paśya bibharti lakṣmavat

original: tvam ivācchakapolamaṇḍala- sphuṭakālāgarupatram ānanam // PNc_12.52 //
analyzed: tvam iva accha kapola maṇḍala sphuṭa kāla agaru patram ānanam

original: vigalattimirāṃśuke śanaiḥ spṛśati vyaktim ādhīratārake /
analyzed: vigalat timira aṃśuke śanais spṛśati vyaktim ādhīra tārake

original: iha paśya niśāvadhūmukhe sphurati śvetamarīcikuṇḍalam // PNc_12.53 //
analyzed: iha paśya niśā avadhū mukhe sphurati śveta marīci kuṇḍalam

original: ayam ullikhati dhruvaṃ karair vidhur indīvaralocane tamaḥ /
analyzed: ayam ullikhati dhruvam karaiḥ vidhuḥ indīvara locane tamaḥ

original: kumudeṣu tathā hi dṛśyatāṃ nipatanty asya lavā ivālayaḥ // PNc_12.54 //
analyzed: kumudeṣu tathā hi dṛśyatām nipatanti asya lavāḥ iva ālayaḥ

original: idam añjananīlam āhataṃ pihitāśaṃ tuhināṃśunā karaiḥ /
analyzed: idam añjana nīlam āhatam pihita āśam tuhināṃśunā karaiḥ

original: acalendraguhāsu līyate śanakaiḥ saṃkucitaṃ punastanaḥ(?) // PNc_12.55 //
analyzed: acala indra guhāsu līyate śanakais saṃkucitam punar stanaḥ

original: masṛṇollasadaṃśumaṇḍala- chalataḥ paśya divaḥkṛte 'nayā /
analyzed: masṛṇa ullasat aṃśu maṇḍala chalataḥ paśya divaḥ kṛte nayā

original: iyam indusamudgakādito niśayā hāralateva kṛṣyate // PNc_12.56 //
analyzed: iyam indu samudgaka āditas niśayā hāra latā iva kṛṣyate

original: yad abhūt tamasā jagat tathā pihite puṣkarapatralocane /
analyzed: yat abhūt tamasā jagat tathā pihite puṣkara patra locane

original: tad idaṃ parataḥ prakāśitam śaśinā kuṅkumakandapāṇḍunā // PNc_12.57 //
analyzed: tat idam paratas prakāśitam śaśinā kuṅkuma kanda pāṇḍunā

original: prasṛteva vilocanodare tilake saṅkuciteva cāndena /
analyzed: prasṛtā iva vilocana udare tilake saṅkucitā iva ca andena

original: kaliteva natāṅgi lakṣyate tava muktāvalayeṣu candrikā // PNc_12.58 //
analyzed: kalitā iva nata aṅgi lakṣyate tava muktā valayeṣu candrikā

original: kucayoḥ pratibimbitaḥ samaṃ vidhur eko 'pi bhavaty ayaṃ dvidhā /
analyzed: kucayoḥ pratibimbitaḥ samam vidhuḥ ekaḥ pi bhavati ayam dvidhā

original: vidhineva vibhinnasaṃpuṭas tava lāvaṇyasudhāsamudgakaḥ // PNc_12.59 //
analyzed: vidhinā iva vibhinna saṃpuṭaḥ tava lāvaṇya sudhā samudgakaḥ

original: hṛtamugdhamadhūkaśobhayor anayoḥ pannagalokakaumudi /
analyzed: hṛta mugdha madhūka śobhayoḥ anayoḥ pannaga loka kaumudi

original: tava candrakalāḥ kapolayoḥ patitāḥ sparśakutūhalād iva // PNc_12.60 //
analyzed: tava candra kalāḥ kapolayoḥ patitāḥ sparśa kutūhalāt iva

original: ayam indumukhi tvayā yathā samupaiti spṛhaṇīyatāṃ janaḥ /
analyzed: ayam indu mukhi tvayā yathā samupaiti spṛhaṇīya tām janaḥ

original: anayaiṣa samāgatas tathā niśayā paśya kuraṅgalāñchanas // PNc_12.61 //
analyzed: anayā eṣa samāgataḥ tathā niśayā paśya kuraṅga lāñchanaḥ

original: dhanuṣi kriyate 'dhirohaṇaṃ smaramaurvīlatayā tanūdari /
analyzed: dhanuṣi kriyate dhirohaṇam smara maurvī latayā tanūdari

original: śaśineritayā samucchrite pulinādrau ca payodhavelayā // PNc_12.62 //
analyzed: śaśinā īritayā samucchrite pulina adrau ca payodha velayā

original: kṛtacāṭuśataiḥ parasparaṃ makarandārdrarajaḥsugandhiṣu /
analyzed: kṛta cāṭu śataiḥ parasparam makaranda ārdra rajaḥ sugandhiṣu

original: sthitam antaramīṣu sāṃprataṃ bhramaraiḥ puṣkaravāsaveśmasu // PNc_12.63 //
analyzed: sthitam antar amīṣu sāṃpratam bhramaraiḥ puṣkara vāsa veśmasu

original: marutā suhṛdeva vījitaṃ kumudāmodamucā śanair itaḥ /
analyzed: marutā suhṛdā iva vījitam kumuda āmoda mucā śanais itas

original: svapiti praṇayārdrayor idaṃ mithunaṃ mānini rājahaṃsayoḥ // PNc_12.64 //
analyzed: svapiti praṇaya ārdrayoḥ idam mithunam mānini rājahaṃsayoḥ

original: ayi cakravadhūr iyaṃ puraḥ karuṇaṃ kūjati hā tapasvini /
analyzed: ayi cakra vadhūḥ iyam puras karuṇam kūjati hā tapasvini

original: iha sākṣitayālam āvayor ucitaṃ gantum ataḥ kṛpāvati // PNc_12.65 //
analyzed: iha sākṣi tayā alam āvayoḥ ucitam gantum atas kṛpāvati

original: iti bhūtalavāsavaḥ sas tām abhidhāya pramadāṃ priyaṃvadaḥ /
analyzed: iti bhū tala vāsavaḥ saḥ tām abhidhāya pramadām priyaṃvadaḥ

original: praviveśa tayāsamaṃ kila pramanāḥ kelinagendrakandaram // PNc_12.66 //
analyzed: praviveśa tayā asamam kila pramanāḥ keli naga indra kandaram

analyzed: jhaṭiti sphuṭa bhāva saṅkarām madhura amaṅgala tām dadhānayā

original: śaśikāntaśilātalaṃ tataḥ saḥ kilādhyāsta tayā yuvānvitaḥ // PNc_12.67 //
analyzed: śaśi kānta śilā talam tatas saḥ kila adhyāsta tayā yuvā anvitaḥ

original: tad anu trapayā parāṅmukhīṃ pulakālaṅkṛtapīvarastanīm /
analyzed: tat anu trapayā parāṅmukhīm pulaka alaṅkṛta pīvara stanīm

original: saḥ kilāñcitacāṭur ānayat sumukhīṃ tām anukūlavṛttitām // PNc_12.68 //
analyzed: saḥ kila āñcita cāṭuḥ ānayat su mukhīm tām anukūla vṛtti tām

original: atha mantharalocanaṃ hriyā vinamatsmeramukhaḥ smitānncitam /
analyzed: atha manthara locanam hriyā vinamat smera mukhaḥ

original: so dadarśa kila prajeśvaraḥ sudṛśaḥ svinnakapolam ānanam // PNc_12.69 //
analyzed: saḥ dadarśa kila prajeśvaraḥ sudṛśaḥ svinna kapolam ānanam

original: yad alaṃ kila mānavaty abhūd ṛjuvannendumukhī kilaikṣat /
analyzed: yat alam kila mānavatī abhūt ṛju vat nā indu mukhī kila aikṣat

original: likhiteva kilāsta yat paraṃ nṛpates tena manaḥ kilāharat // PNc_12.70 //
analyzed: likhitā iva kila āsta yat param nṛpateḥ tena manaḥ kila aharat

analyzed: parimṛjya mukham vilāsinā śravaṇa indīvara reṇu rūṣitam

original: sudṛśaḥ śamavāripaṅkilāt alakāntas tilakād apāsyata // PNc_12.71 //
analyzed: sudṛśaḥ śama vāri paṅkilāt alaka antar tilakāt apāsyata

analyzed: atha tām śithilīkṛta trapām asama prema hṛtaḥ kila īśvaraḥ

original: smarakelikalārasajñatām anayadyūthapatir vaśām iva // PNc_12.72 //
analyzed: smara keli kalā rasa jña tām anayat yūtha patiḥ vaśām iva

analyzed: śithila ākula keśapāśayā parimṛṣṭa ārdra kapola patrayā

original: viralādhararatnarāgayā sulabhasvedamukhendubimbayā // PNc_12.73 //
analyzed: virala adhara ratna rāgayā sulabha sveda mukha indu bimbayā

analyzed: truṭita ujjhita hāra lekhayā nibiḍa āśleṣa kṛśa aṅgarāgayā

original: asamagranakhāṅgamaṇḍita- stanavinyastasakampahastayā // PNc_12.74 //
analyzed: asamagra nakha aṅga maṇḍita stana vinyasta sa kampa hastayā

original: adhikādhikajātalajjayā mṛdumīlannayanatribhāgayā /

original: atha kām api nirvṛtiṃ tayā saḥ kilāpat phaṇirājakanyayā // PNc_12.75 //

original: [SYNTAX: kulakam]
analyzed: syntax kulakam

analyzed: sudṛśaḥ saḥ kila anyatas cutam

analyzed: svapna antara praṇaya jalpitam ātma bhartuḥ aśrūyata smita mukhena ramāṅgadena

analyzed: atha śuci paṭhatā śukena sāma sphuṭam uṭaja aṅgaṇa pādapa sthitena

original: viracitadayitāsamāgamasya prasabham abhajyata pārthivasya nidrā // PNc_12.80 //
analyzed: viracita dayitā samāgamasya prasabham abhajyata pārthivasya nidrā

analyzed: likhitaḥ iva saḥ kṣmāpālaḥ bhūt kṣaṇam nanu tādṛśām api manasijaḥ dhairyam lumpati aho bata sāhasam

original: iti śrīmṛgāṅkadattasūnoḥ parimalāparanāmnaḥ padmaguptasya kṛtau navasāhasāṅkacarite mahākāvye phaṇirājasutāsvapnasamāgamo nāma dvādaśaḥ sargaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī mṛgāṅkadatta sūnoḥ parimala apara nāmnaḥ padmaguptasya kṛtau navasāhasāṅkacarite mahākāvye phaṇirājasutāsvapnasamāgamaḥ nāma dvādaśaḥ sargaḥ

original: trayodaśaḥ sargaḥ

analyzed: tatas tathā pañca śara pratāritaḥ sa jṛmbham unmīlayati sma locane

original: kṛtāṅguliśleṣavivartitollasat- bhujāṃsasampīḍitakuṇḍalo nṛpaḥ // PNc_13.1 //
analyzed: kṛta aṅguli śleṣa vivartita ullasat bhuja aṃsa sampīḍita kuṇḍalaḥ nṛpaḥ

analyzed: saḥ saṅgatam yat mṛga śāva cakṣuṣaḥ śrama āpta nidraḥ sphuṭam anvabhūt iva

analyzed: apāsya vāmetara karṇa bhūṣaṇam tathā śaraiḥ enam avākirat smaraḥ

analyzed: tam iti avocat parihāsavān atho

analyzed: ramā aṅgadaḥ kiṃcid iva ślatha aṅgadam

analyzed: vaṅkumuneḥ āgamanam

analyzed: saḥ ca āsana tvam tad anujñayā anayat nṛpa candrāḥ candramaṇeḥ śilā talam

original: munipraśnaḥ
analyzed: muni praśnaḥ

original: api śrameṇāyatamārgajanmanā tanur mahārāja taveyam ujjhitā /

analyzed: muniḥ praharṣeṇa kṛta arhaṇaḥ tadā sa rāja cūḍāmaṇim iti apṛcchata

original: bhūpativākyam
analyzed: bhūpati vākyam

analyzed: akṛtrima praśraya peśalam vacaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ vaktum iti pracakrame

analyzed: kiyat ciram candra marīci cumbite padam nidhatte kumude dina klamaḥ

original: kapidarśanam
analyzed: kapi darśanam

analyzed: anena tāvat dadṛśe puras sthitaḥ viśāla lāṅgūla lataḥ valīmukhaḥ

analyzed: adhas sthalī nirgata jahnu kanyakaḥ hima ujjvalaḥ pādaḥ iva ambikā guroḥ

original: kareṇa bibhranmadhumattakeralī- kapolavatpāṭalakānti dāḍimam /

analyzed: ahar mukha ākṛṣṭa pataṅga maṇḍalaḥ phalāśayā bālaḥ iva añjanīsutaḥ

original: [SYNTAX: sandānitakam]
analyzed: syntax sandānitakam

original: phalārpaṇam
analyzed: phala arpaṇam

analyzed: dvayoḥ iva arthaḥ khalu dharma kāmayoḥ tayoḥ triloka spṛhaṇīyayoḥ kapiḥ

analyzed: muni indra bhū candramasoḥ sthitaḥ ntare tapasvibhiḥ smera mukhaiḥ adṛśyata

original: japāruṇaṃ mārutineva maithilī- śikhaṇḍaratnaṃ daśakaṇṭhaśāsanaḥ // PNc_13.21 //
analyzed: japa aruṇam mārutinā iva maithilī śikhaṇḍa ratnam daśakaṇṭha śāsanaḥ

analyzed: akṛtrima śrī nilayena rāgiṇā narendra cihna aṅkita hasta śobhinā

original: suvṛttatām udvahatā svabhāvataḥ sas tena reje bhṛśam ātmanā yathā // PNc_13.22 //
analyzed: su vṛtta tām udvahatā svabhāvataḥ saḥ tena reje bhṛśam ātmanā yathā

analyzed: ajāta pākasya nava ātapa adhikām punar punar tasya vilokya śoṇa tām

analyzed: nava pravāla upamam eṇa cakṣuṣaḥ smaran sa bimboṣṭḥam avāpa śūnya tām

analyzed: ud arciṣaḥ puṣpa śarāsana krudhā kaṇā utkaraḥ tryambaka locanāt iva

original: atha dvayenāvanipākaśāsanaḥ sa vismayasyāgramahīm anīyata /
analyzed: atha dvayena avanipākaśāsanaḥ sa vismayasya agra mahīm anīyata

original: vanaukasā tena vinītavṛttinā vikīrṇabhāsā maṇidāḍimena ca // PNc_13.26 //
analyzed: vanaukasā tena vinīta vṛttinā vikīrṇa bhāsā maṇi dāḍimena ca

original: saś cādbhutaprābhṛtatoṣitaḥ kare cakāra revāmaṇikaṅkaṇaṃ kapeḥ /
analyzed: saḥ ca adbhuta prābhṛta toṣitaḥ kare cakāra revā maṇi kaṅkaṇam kapeḥ

original: ghanātyayaṛtor nijam indupāṇḍure payodakhaṇḍe harivāḍ ivāyudham // PNc_13.27 //
analyzed: ghanātyaya ṛtoḥ nijam indu pāṇḍure payoda khaṇḍe harivāh iva āyudham

original: tataḥ sudhāsūtim ivojjhitākṛtir navāñjanaśyāmalayāṅgalekhayā /
analyzed: tatas sudhā sūtim iva ujjhita ākṛtiḥ nava añjana śyāmalayā aṅga lekhayā

original: nṛpaḥ kṣaṇād eva vicitrabhūṣaṇam pumāṃsam agre na hariṃ tam aikṣata // PNc_13.28 //
analyzed: nṛpaḥ kṣaṇāt eva vicitra bhūṣaṇam pumāṃsam agre na harim tam aikṣata

original: kṛtānatir vismitamānase munau ramāṅgade sādaramuktalocanaḥ /
analyzed: kṛta ānatiḥ vismita mānase munau ramā aṅgade sādara mukta locanaḥ

analyzed: vyadhāt praṇāmam saḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ nṛpe kapola vellat kaladhauta kuṇḍalaḥ

analyzed: muni kṛtaḥ praśnaḥ

analyzed: alaṅkṛtaḥ kasya vada anvayaḥ tvayā padam kva te kim ca kapiḥ bhavān abhūt

analyzed: tam evam āha sma sa vismaya ūrmiṇā nṛpeṇa sa ākūta vilokitaḥ muniḥ

original: [COM {āha past tense}]
analyzed: com āha past tense

analyzed: śaśikhaṇḍa vākyam

analyzed: tatas sa mugdha indu mayūkha bandhubhiḥ prasādayan danta marīcibhiḥ diśaḥ

analyzed: nava ambu bhāra alasa nīrada āvalī nināda dhīrām iti vācam āde

analyzed: śikhaṇḍa ketoḥ śaśikhaṇḍaḥ iti aham muni indra vidyādhara śāsituḥ sutaḥ

analyzed: sura aṅganā adhyāsita ratna kandhare mama adhivāsaḥ śaśi kānta parvate

analyzed: rathāṅga pāṇeḥ pratimā samudrataḥ svayam mahā nīla mayī vinirgatā

analyzed: iti pravādaḥ param īkṣitum ca tām gatāḥ maṇidvīpam itas pura striyaḥ

analyzed: mama api tasyām adhikam kutūhalam tat ehi yāvaḥ kṛtaḥ eṣa te ñjaliḥ

analyzed: kadā cit evam sahasā upasṛtya mām priyā yayāce praṇipatya mālatī

original: [SYNTAX: sandānitaka]
analyzed: syntax sandānitaka

original: tataḥ kham indīvaranīlam ekatas tayā sahotpatya javena gacchataḥ /
analyzed: tatas kham indīvara nīlam ekatas tayā saha utpatya javena gacchataḥ

analyzed: upoḍha nānā maṇi mauktika utkaraiḥ karaiḥ iva ūrdhvam prasaradbhiḥ ūrmibhiḥ

analyzed: anarghyam arghyam jagat eka cakṣuṣe samudyataḥ dātum iva aṃśumāline

analyzed: nava pravāla dyuti pāṭalā udaraḥ karaḥ murāreḥ iva śārṅga lāñchitaḥ

analyzed: alaṅkṛtaḥ jahnu mahā ṛṣi kanyayā pṛthuḥ jaṭā jūṭaḥ iva andhaka dviṣaḥ

original: udagrakallolakadarthitagrahair agādhapātālatalāvagāhibhiḥ /
analyzed: udagra kallola kadarthita grahaiḥ agādha pātāla tala avagāhibhiḥ

analyzed: diśaḥ nirundhan nava megha nādibhiḥ nimagna diṅnāga mada āvilaiḥ jalaiḥ

analyzed: samedhita śrīḥ abhitas tala utthitaiḥ sphurat maṇi stoma mayūkha dāmabhiḥ

original: yugāntajīmūtaśatodayārpitaiḥ pulomakanyāpatikārmukair iva // PNc_13.39 //
analyzed: yugānta jīmūta śata udaya arpitaiḥ puloma kanyā pati kārmukaiḥ iva

original: upāntaviśrāntapayodamaṇḍalair jaladvipaprastutavaprakelibhiḥ /
analyzed: upānta viśrānta payoda maṇḍalaiḥ jala dvipa prastuta vapra kelibhiḥ

analyzed: cira ullasat dvīpa dhiyā samīkṣitaiḥ viśāla netraiḥ timibhiḥ kṛta adbhutaḥ

analyzed: sujāta kāṭhiṇya payodharāḥ spṛhām upāharantīḥ pathi tādṛśoḥ pathi

analyzed: kva cit dadhānaḥ śarad indu peśalāḥ śilāsu śuktīḥ jala mānuṣīḥ iva

original: nijaughasīmantitasānukardamair bṛhaddarīpuñjitaratnarāśibhiḥ /
analyzed: nija ogha sīmantita sānu kardamaiḥ bṛhat darī puñjita ratna rāśibhiḥ

original: adhaḥ praviṣṭoddhṛtakacchapoddhṛtair mahācalair ullikhitāmbaraḥ kva cit // PNc_13.42 //
analyzed: adhas praviṣṭa uddhṛta kacchapa uddhṛtaiḥ mahā acalaiḥ ullikhita ambaraḥ kva cit

original: savegavelānilavellitāḥ kva cin navodgatā vidrumakandalīr dadhan /
analyzed: sa vegavelā anila vellitāḥ kva cit nava udgatāḥ vidruma kandalīḥ dadhan

analyzed: śikhāḥ iva ūrdhvam taruṇa arka lohitāḥ vinirgatāḥ vāḍaba jātavedasaḥ

analyzed: kva cit sudhā pāṇḍuni phena maṇḍale nilīna dūrvā dala nīla nīradaḥ

analyzed: sa nātha tām nītaḥ iva upari sphuṭam phaṇi indra paryaṅka śayena śārṅgiṇā

analyzed: kva cit maṇīnām kumuda udara tviṣaḥ sitetara indīvara mecakāḥ kva cit

original: [SYNTAX: kulakam]
analyzed: syntax kulakam

original: tathaiva tasyopari gatvarasya me tamālanīlena pathā payomucām /

cf pāṇini

analyzed: pradhāvamānena mayā antarā antarā nakha agra nirlūna mayūkha pallavaḥ

analyzed: saḥ ca antaram dīdhitimān iva udadheḥ viveśa kośa āmra taru chaṭā aruṇaḥ

analyzed: nivartamānam tu haṭhāt vikṛṣyatā turaṅga hastena nirundhatā nabhaḥ

original: strīdarśanam
analyzed: strī darśanam

original: mayātha tatra bhramatā savismayaṃ tam udvahantī maṇim utprabhaṃ kare /
analyzed: mayā atha tatra bhramatā sa vismayam tam udvahantī maṇim utprabham kare

analyzed: adṛśyata ekā viśatī tapaḥ vanam smarasya mūrtā mamatā iva kanyakā

original: tataḥ priyāmaulimaṇir na me 'rpitaḥ punaḥ punaḥ prārthitayāpi yat tvayā /
analyzed: tatas priyā mauli maṇiḥ na me rpitaḥ punar punar prārthitayā api yat tvayā

analyzed: aham tat asyāḥ makara aṅkite balāt apāharam manmatha ratna pāduke

analyzed: kim āśramam śūnyam idam tapodhanaiḥ anena hā dhik muṣitā asmi dasyunā

analyzed: athā iti bāṣpa udgama gadgadaiḥ padaiḥ nuhur vadantī karuṇam ruroda sā

original: munidarśanam
tatas tadīye ruditadhvanau śrute sasaṃbhramaṃ ko 'pi mahātapā muniḥ /
analyzed: tatas tadīye rudita dhvanau śrute sa saṃbhramam kaḥ pi mahā tapāḥ muniḥ

analyzed: viniryayau ratna śilā gṛhāt bahis tamāla bhāsaḥ taraṇiḥ ghanāt iva

original: anena kenāpi tavāśrame balād idaṃ hi tātābharaṇaṃ hṛtaṃ mama /
analyzed: anena kena api tava āśrame balāt idam hi tāta ābharaṇam hṛtam mama

original: iti krudhaṃ tadvacasā sa ādade havirniṣekeṇa śikhām ivānalaḥ // PNc_13.53 //
analyzed: iti krudham tad vacasā saḥ ādade haviḥ niṣekeṇa śikhām iva analaḥ

original: śāpavarṇanam
analyzed: śāpa varṇanam

original: nibaddhabhīmabhrukuṭir vilokayan dṛśā tadolkākapiśogratārayā /
analyzed: nibaddha bhīma bhrukuṭiḥ vilokayan dṛśā tadā ulkā kapiśa ugra tārayā

original: sas tīvrakopasphuritādharo 'vadad vaco mamākṣipya kṛtānater iti // PNc_13.54 //
analyzed: saḥ tīvra kopa sphurita adharaḥ vadat vacaḥ mama ākṣipya kṛta ānateḥ iti

original: prasūnam apy atra na jātu vīrudhāṃ haraty ayaṃ naḥ pavanas tapovane /
analyzed: prasūnam api atra na jātu vīrudhām harati ayam naḥ pavanaḥ tapaḥ vane

original: tvayā tu saṃpraty abalāvibhūṣaṇe śaṭhātmanāśāya karaḥ prasāritaḥ // PNc_13.55 //
analyzed: tvayā tu saṃprati abalā vibhūṣaṇe śaṭha ātma nāśāya karaḥ prasāritaḥ

original: akāri kāpeyam idaṃ tvayedṛśaṃ yad adya sadyaḥ kapir eva tad bhava /
analyzed: akāri kāpeyam idam tvayā īdṛśam yat adya sadyas kapiḥ eva tat bhava

original: tataḥ sa mām ity aśapat kamaṇḍalor apaḥ samādāya davānalopamaḥ // PNc_13.56 //
analyzed: tatas sa mām iti aśapat kamaṇḍaloḥ apaḥ samādāya dava anala upamaḥ

original: kopaśāntiḥ
analyzed: kopa śāntiḥ

original: athāsya kopaḥ praśaśāma mānase śanaiḥ kṛpā sānuśaye prasīdati /
analyzed: athā asya kopaḥ praśaśāma mānase śanais kṛpā sa anuśaye prasīdati

analyzed: apām kaṇaḥ tiṣṭhati vīci kampite na padminī patra puṭa udare ciram

original: ihānutāpo bhagavan vimucyatām iyaṃ madīyā bhavitavyatedṛśī /
analyzed: iha anutāpaḥ bhagavan vimucyatām iyam madīyā bhavitavya tā īdṛśī

original: tad ucyatāṃ śāpaniśāmukhodgataṃ kadā mamedaṃ timiraṃ vyaraṃsyati // PNc_13.58 //
analyzed: tat ucyatām śāpa niśā mukha udgatam kadā mama idam timiram vyaraṃsyati

original: mayaivam uktaḥ sas tadaivam ūcivān yadā puro vaṅkumuner ihāgataḥ /
analyzed: mayā evam uktaḥ saḥ tadā evam ūcivān yadā puras vaṅkumuneḥ iha āgataḥ

original: kare tavādhāsyati vatsa kaṅkaṇaṃ sa nārmadaṃ sīyakarājanandanaḥ // PNc_13.59 //
analyzed: kare tava ādhāsyati vatsa kaṅkaṇam sa nārmadam sīyaka rāja nandanaḥ

original: tataḥ prabhṛty eva valīmukhākṛteḥ samāḥ sahasraṃ vasato rasātale /
analyzed: tatas prabhṛti eva valīmukha ākṛteḥ samāḥ sahasram vasataḥ rasātale

original: anena me saṃprati pārthivendunā tavāśrame śāpatamas tiraskṛtam // PNc_13.60 //
analyzed: anena me saṃprati pārthiva indunā tava āśrame śāpa tamaḥ tiraskṛtam

original: pratikriyākaraṇecchā
analyzed: pratikriyā karaṇa icchā

original: kṛtaṃ yad etena munīndra līlayā pratikriyāṃ tatra na kartum asmy alam /
analyzed: kṛtam yat etena muni indra līlayā pratikriyām tatra na kartum asmi alam

original: himatviṣaḥ pratyupakāragocaro marīcilīḍhakraśimā kim aṃśumān // PNc_13.61 //
analyzed: himatviṣaḥ pratyupakāra gocaraḥ marīci līḍha kraśimā kim aṃśumān

original: tathāpy ayaṃ deva nijaprayojane laghīyasi kvāpi niyojyataṃ janaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api ayam deva nija prayojane laghīyasi kvāpi janaḥ

original: anūrum urvītalaratnadīpakaḥ kim āryamā nādhita sūtakarmaṇi // PNc_13.62 //
analyzed: anūrum urvī tala ratna dīpakaḥ kim āryamā nādhita sūta karmaṇi

original: tenaivam uktaḥ praṇayonmukhena nrpas trapānamramukho babhūva /
analyzed: tena evam uktaḥ praṇaya unmukhena nrpaḥ trapā namra mukhaḥ babhūva

original: atādṛśānāṃ stutayaḥ prakṛtyā madaṃ yad uddīpayituṃ yatante // PNc_13.63 //
analyzed: a tādṛśānām stutayaḥ prakṛtyāḥ madam yat uddīpayitum yatante

original: nijavṛttakathanam
analyzed: nija vṛtta kathanam

original: evaṃ sudhārasasamṛddhimanohareṇa ślāghyena tena śaśikhaṇḍasamāgamena /
analyzed: evam sudhā rasa samṛddhi manohareṇa ślāghyena tena śaśi khaṇḍa samāgamena

original: kām apy avāpad umayā ghaṭitasya lakṣmīṃ saḥ kṣmāpatir jhaṭiti jūṭa ivāṣṭamūrteḥ // PNc_13.64 //
analyzed: kām api avāpat umayā ghaṭitasya lakṣmīm saḥ kṣmāpatiḥ jhaṭiti jūṭe iva aṣṭamūrteḥ

original: tenātha sūnṛtavacaḥśrutaye saḥ pṛṣṭaḥ pṛthvītalāgamanahetum ajānateva /
analyzed: tena atha sūnṛta vacaḥ śrutaye saḥ pṛṣṭaḥ pṛthvī tala āgamana hetum a jānatā iva

original: ākhyātavān smitasudhāsnapitauṣṭhabimbas tasmai nijavyatikaraṃ naralokapālaḥ // PNc_13.65 //
analyzed: ākhyātavān smita sudhā snapita oṣṭha bimbaḥ tasmai nija vyatikaram nara lokapālaḥ

original: vidyādharas tad anu saḥ prahito 'pi rājñā naiva svadhāmagamanābhimukho babhūva /
analyzed: vidyādharaḥ tat anu saḥ rājñā nā eva sva dhāma gamana abhimukhaḥ babhūva

original: pūrvopakāriṇi jane 'nupakṛtya kiṃ cid yānto yad unnatadhiyaḥ kim api trapante // PNc_13.66 //
analyzed: pūrva upakāriṇi jane n upakṛtya kim cit yāntaḥ yat unnata dhiyaḥ kim api trapante

original: deva prasīda samitiḥ kriyatām idānīṃ bhṛtyaḥ svapādarajasām ayam agrayāyī /
analyzed: deva prasīda samitiḥ kriyatām idānīm bhṛtyaḥ sva pāda rajasām ayam agra yāyī

original: tasyeti valgu vacanaṃ vacasā maharṣeḥ samrāṭ tataḥ saḥ katham apy urarīcakāra // PNc_13.67 //
analyzed: tasya iti valgu vacanam vacasā mahā ṛṣeḥ samrāj tatas saḥ katham api urarīcakāra

original: vidyādharasainyāgamanam
analyzed: vidyādhara sainya āgamanam

original: āmandraśaṅkhapaṭahasvanasūcitaṃ prāk- sainyaṃ kṣaṇān nijam atha smṛtamātram eva /
analyzed: āmandra śaṅkha paṭaha svana sūcitam prāk sainyam kṣaṇāt nijam atha smṛta mātram eva

original: dhautāsipatrabahulāṃśulatopagūḍhaṃ pātālasaṃtamasam asya puro babhūva // PNc_13.68 //
analyzed: dhauta asi patra bahula aṃśu latā upagūḍham pātāla saṃtamasam asya puras babhūva

original: prasthānam
analyzed: prasthānam

original: tenopapāditam atho ratham utpātakam adhyāsya kārmukasanāthakaro narendraḥ /
analyzed: tena upapāditam atho ratham utpātakam adhyāsya kārmuka sanātha karaḥ narendraḥ

analyzed: uddāma āji kratu makha vidheḥ dīkṣayā saḥ kṣitīśaḥ medhyām eṇa tvacam iva dadhan saḥ kṣaṇam lakṣyate sma

analyzed: var vidheḥ lem k mahā e d

original: [13.71b: nalim?]

ādhūtakārtasvaraketuyaṣtir enāny aśokastabakāruṇāni /

atha pravālādharabimbacumbi- parisphuratphenavilāsahāsā /

svasti sthitasya svaḥsindhu- tīre phaṇipurasthayā /

original: nīrandhragharmasalila- chaleneva vilīyate // PNc_16.32 //

analyzed: āropayati puṣpeṣu maurvīm iva śarāsane

original: nirvāṇam eti bhavataḥ kathayā na jalārdrayā // PNc_16.34 //
analyzed: nirvāṇam eti bhavataḥ kathayā na jala ārdrayā

original: ākarṇakṛṣṭakodaṇḍas- tvāṃ vinā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
analyzed: ākarṇa kṛṣṭa kodaṇḍaḥ tvām vinā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: bhinatty aṅgam anaṅgo 'syāḥ kṣitiś cetasi kāpi me // PNc_16.35 //
analyzed: bhinatti aṅgam anaṅgo syāḥ kṣitiḥ cetasi kā api me

original: iyam atyacchahṛdaye dadhaty atisuvṛttatām /
analyzed: iyam ati accha hṛdaye dadhati ati su vṛtta tām

original: bālā māṇikyamukure vimukhī saṃmukhī tvayi // PNc_16.36 //
analyzed: bālā māṇikya mukure vimukhī saṃmukhī tvayi

original: eṣā śikheva dīpasya mugdhā dagdhadaśāśrayā /
analyzed: eṣā śikhā iva dīpasya mugdhā dagdha daśā āśrayā

original: smarānilaparāmarśād itaś cetaś ca vepate // PNc_16.37 //
analyzed: smara anila parāmarśāt itas ca itas ca vepate

analyzed: iyam indu dyuti haram yuktam atyāyataiḥ guṇaiḥ

analyzed: mṛṇāla valayam haste vahati tvām ca cetasi

analyzed: saṅkucati abjinī patram na tu tvad prema pallavaḥ

original: kārśyāgrabhūmim āptāyās tvayy antaḥkaraṇena ca // PNc_16.40 //
analyzed: kārśya agra bhūmim āptāyāḥ tvayi antaḥkaraṇena ca

original: jāyate peśalam api prāyo vastv anyathāpadi /
analyzed: jāyate peśalam api prāyas vastu anyathā āpadi

original: prāpto mṛṇālahāro 'pi yad asyā dāhahetutām // PNc_16.41 //
analyzed: prāptaḥ mṛṇāla hāraḥ pi yat asyāḥ dāha hetu tām

original: nihitāḥ sāsramālībhir lavalīpākapāṇḍunī /
analyzed: nihitāḥ sa asra mālībhiḥ lavalī pāka pāṇḍunī

original: asyāḥ stanataṭe bhāraḥ paraṃ vānīrapallavāḥ // PNc_16.42 //
analyzed: asyāḥ stana taṭe bhāraḥ param vānīra pallavāḥ

original: na candanena nośīra- vāriṇā na jalārdrayā /
analyzed: na candanena na uśīra vāriṇā na jala ārdrayā

original: nāsyāḥ puṭakinīpatraiḥ śamam eti smarajvaraḥ // PNc_16.43 //
analyzed: na asyāḥ puṭakinī patraiḥ śamam eti smara jvaraḥ

original: kiṃ cāparam tvam etasyā hṛdayasyādhidevatā /
analyzed: kim ca aparam tvam etasyāḥ hṛdayasya adhidevatā

original: yatas tvanmayam evaiṣā viśvaṃ viśveśa paśyati // PNc_16.44 //
analyzed: yatas tvad mayam eva eṣā viśvam viśveśa paśyati

original: ratnacūḍopanītena sandeśena tavādhunā /
analyzed: ratnacūḍa upanītena sandeśena tava adhunā

analyzed: iyam ucchvasitā kim cit sudhā gaṇḍūṣa bandhunā

original: tāvad āgaccha vegena gṛhītvā hemapaṅkajam /
analyzed: tāvat āgaccha vegena gṛhītvā hema paṅkajam

original: anaṅgavidhunā yāvad iyaṃ śvasiti naḥ sakhī // PNc_16.46 //
analyzed: anaṅga vidhunā yāvat iyam śvasiti naḥ sakhī

original: nāyakasya pratisandeśaḥ
analyzed: nāyakasya pratisandeśaḥ

original: evam ākarṇya lalitaṃ lekhārtham atha pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: evam ākarṇya lalitam lekha artham atha pārthivaḥ

analyzed: udbhinna sāndra pulakaḥ pāṭalām iti avocata

analyzed: tathā tvam api mām evam pāṭale kim na paśyasi

original: tad gaccha tāṃ śaśimukhīm āśvāsayitum arhasi /
analyzed: tat gaccha tām śaśimukhīm āśvāsayitum arhasi

original: vayam ete ca hemābjam ānetuṃ prayatāmahe // PNc_16.49 //
analyzed: vayam ete ca hema abjam ānetum prayatāmahe

analyzed: tathā kāryam na vandhyaḥ syāt yathā mama manorathaḥ

original: vaktavyā mālyavatyaivaṃ madgirā valguvādini // PNc_16.50 //
analyzed: vaktavyā mālyavatyā evam mad girā valgu vādini

analyzed: pāṭalā prayāṇam

analyzed: phaṇi rāja indra nagarīm tvaritam pāṭalā yayau

original: prasthānaśaṃsī sahasā tasyātha pṛthivīpateḥ /
analyzed: prasthāna śaṃsī sahasā tasya atha pṛthivīpateḥ

original: pralayāmbudharadhvāna- dhīraṃ dadhvāna dundubhiḥ // PNc_16.52 //

original: vidyādharastrīpuruṣavarṇanam
analyzed: vidyādhara strī puruṣa varṇanam

original: ninye priyapariṣvaṅga- ślathatām atha dorlatāḥ // PNc_16.53 //
analyzed: ninye priya pariṣvaṅga ślatha tām atha dos latāḥ

original: kathaṃ cit prāṇanāthasya mukhādharapallavam /

original: bālā vyaghaṭayat kā cit kācid urasaś ca payodharau // PNc_16.54 //
analyzed: bālā vyaghaṭayat kā cit kācid urasaḥ ca payodharau

original: śanair babandha jaghane nakhāṅkavati mekhalām /

analyzed: kā api smita mukhī kānte tiryak arpita locanā

original: kim atra kṛtyam ity anyā kim api vyākulābhavat // PNc_16.56 //
analyzed: kim atra kṛtyam iti anyā kim api vyākulā abhavat

analyzed: anyonya arpita netrābhiḥ vayasyābhiḥ ahasyata

analyzed: hṛdayam puṣpa cāpena madhye viddham iva ātmanaḥ

analyzed: cumbana kliṣṭa bimba oṣṭham jāgara aruṇa locanam

original: mukhāmbhojaṃ dṛśānyonaṃ vilāsibhir apīyata // PNc_16.59 //

analyzed: ratnacūḍa samāgamaḥ

original: [16.16d: ādarśe?]

original: kiyatāpy atha kālena santataiḥ saḥ prayāṇakaiḥ /

mārgair ivāyatair vācāṃ śucibhir daśanāṃśubhiḥ /

original: girāṃ tvam eko yat satyam indur bhāsām ivākaraḥ // PNc_16.85 //

original: kac cit tvayāyam ajñāyi devaḥ sāhasalāñchanaḥ /

analyzed: asyāḥ pitrā iti devena tad artham prahitāḥ vayam

original: tat kārtasvararājīvam ānīya svayam arpyatām // PNc_16.89 //
analyzed: tat kārtasvararājīvam ānīya svayam arpyatām

original: lumpanti tvanmukhacchāyāṃ yāvan nāsya camūrajaḥ /

analyzed: kuruṣva tāvat ātithyam hema abjena mahībhuje

original: iti tvayā svam evāśu pramāṇīkriyatāṃ vacaḥ // PNc_16.91 //

original: vajrāṅkuśavākyam

analyzed: pratyabhāṣata sa avajñam vihasya asura kuñjaraḥ

original: aho bata vidagdho 'pi dhiṅ mugdha iva lakṣyase /

original: viduṣāpi tvayā kiṃcid yad uktam asamañjasam // PNc_16.93 //
analyzed: viduṣā api tvayā kiṃcid yat uktam asamañjasam

original: yūyaṃ kva māṇuṣāḥ pṛthvī- saṅkaṭasvāmyaduḥsthitāḥ /

original: sā ca trijagatāṃ bhartur ucitā kva śaśiprabhā // PNc_16.94 //
analyzed: sā ca trijagatām bhartuḥ ucitā kva śaśiprabhā

original: tādṛṅmadaṅkam evātra strīratnam adhirohati /

original: patadbhaṭaṃ nirdalitāśvavāraṃ nikṛttamattebhakaraṃ kṣaṇena /
analyzed: patat bhaṭam nirdalita aśva vāram nikṛtta matta ibha karam kṣaṇena

original: vyadhāyi vidyādharasainikais tat sanāgavīrair asurendrasainyam // PNc_17.25 //
analyzed: vyadhāyi vidyādhara sainikaiḥ tat sa nāga vīraiḥ asura indra sainyam

original: haṃsair iva smerataṭāḥsamantāt paricyutaiḥ kuñjarakarṇaśaṅkhaiḥ /
analyzed: haṃsaiḥ iva smera taṭāḥ samantāt paricyutaiḥ kuñjara karṇa śaṅkhaiḥ

original: voḍhuṃ pravṛttā bhavaduttaraṅgā jhaṭity agādhā rudhirasravantī // PNc_17.26 //
analyzed: voḍhum pravṛttā bhavat uttaraṅgā jhaṭiti agādhā rudhira sravantī

original: vidyādharavyālabhaṭāvalupta- dhairyeṣu naśyatsu mahāsureṣu /
analyzed: dhairyeṣu naśyatsu mahā asureṣu

original: viśvāṅkuśo nāma surārisūnur atho rathenājimahīṃ viveśa // PNc_17.27 //
analyzed: viśvāṅkuśaḥ nāma surāri sūnuḥ atho rathena āji mahīm viveśa

original: ākarṇakṛṣtād dhanuṣaḥ patadbhir bālendulekhākṛtibhiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ /
analyzed: ākarṇa kṛṣtāt dhanuṣaḥ patadbhiḥ bāla indu lekhā ākṛtibhiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ

original: arātisainye raṇadhīravīrān bhīrūnivaiko vimukhīcakāra // PNc_17.28 //
analyzed: arāti sainye raṇa dhīra vīrān bhīrūn iva ekaḥ vimukhīcakāra

original: tadvīryanirvāsitasauṣṭhavānāṃ vidyādharāṇām apatan karebhyaḥ /
analyzed: tad vīrya nirvāsita sauṣṭhavānām vidyādharāṇām apatan karebhyaḥ

original: dhārāgralagnadvipakumbhamuktāḥ sabāṣpaleśā iva khaḍgalekhāḥ // PNc_17.29 //
analyzed: dhārā agra lagna dvipa kumbha muktāḥ sa bāṣpa leśāḥ iva khaḍga lekhāḥ

original: kṣaṇād valanti sma tadā hatāni balāni vidyādharapannagānām /
analyzed: kṣaṇāt valanti sma tadā hatāni balāni vidyādhara pannagānām

original: saritpayāṃsīva niśakarāṃśu- pūrapravṛddhārṇavapīḍitāni // PNc_17.30 //
analyzed: sarit payāṃsi iva niśakara aṃśu pūra pravṛddha arṇava pīḍitāni

original: na śekatus tasya gatiṃ niroddhuṃ vidyādharendroragarājaputrau /
analyzed: na śekatuḥ tasya gatim niroddhum vidyādhara indra uraga rāja putrau

original: ratnākarasyeva mahendrasahyā vasahyavegaṃ pralayotthitasya // PNc_17.31 //
analyzed: ratnākarasya iva mahā indrasahyāḥ vasahya vegam pralaya utthitasya

original: dordaṇḍakaṇḍūtim athāsya hartum udbhrūlataṃ bhūpatinā niyuktaḥ /
analyzed: dordaṇḍa kaṇḍūtim athā asya hartum udbhrū latam bhūpatinā niyuktaḥ

original: javāj jagāmājipathaṃ rathena ramāṅgadaḥkuṇḍalito 'gracāpaḥ // PNc_17.32 //
analyzed: javāt jagāma āji patham rathena rama aṅgadaḥ kuṇḍalitaḥ

original: tathopalebhe samaronmukhasya nādena vṛddhiḥ śarajanmanāsya /
analyzed: tathā upalebhe samara unmukhasya nādena vṛddhiḥ śara janmanā asya

original: cakre padaṃ bāṣpakaṇotkareṇa yathā kapoleṣv asurāṅganānām // PNc_17.33 //
analyzed: cakre padam bāṣpa kaṇā utkareṇa yathā kapoleṣu asura aṅganānām

original: dūrāt suparvārisutaṃ rathena sa raṃhasā saṃmukham āpatantam /
analyzed: dūrāt su parva ari sutam rathena sa raṃhasā saṃmukham āpatantam

original: rurodha taṃ bāṇaparaṃparābhir yaśobhaṭaḥ karṇam ivendrasūnus // PNc_17.34 //
analyzed: rurodha tam bāṇa paraṃparābhiḥ yaśobhaṭaḥ karṇam iva indrasūnuḥ

original: viśvāṅkuśaḥ satkavace mumoca vakṣaḥsthale haimam athāsya bāṇam /
analyzed: viśvāṅkuśaḥ sat kavace mumoca vakṣaḥ sthale haimam atha asya bāṇam

original: taṭe 'ñjanaśyāmatanau mahādreḥ śātahradaṃ jyotir ivāmbuvāhaḥ // PNc_17.35 //
analyzed: taṭe ñjana śyāma tanau mahā adreḥ śātahradam jyotiḥ iva ambuvāhaḥ

original: alakṣyasaṃdhānavimokṣapātān yaśobhaṭasyāttaruṣo 'pi ropān /
analyzed: alakṣya saṃdhāna vimokṣa pātān ropān

original: mūrcchāluṭhatsārathir āhatāśvo rathaḥ śaśaṃsāsuranandanasya // PNc_17.36 //
analyzed: mūrcchā aluṭhat sārathiḥ āhata aśvaḥ rathaḥ śaśaṃsa asura nandanasya

original: vilāsakāñcīm atha kālarātrer udyatkrudhaḥ paddhatim antakasya /
analyzed: vilāsa kāñcīm atha kālarātreḥ udyat krudhaḥ paddhatim antakasya

original: maurvīṃ pṛṣatkeṇa ramāṅgadasya ciccheda gīrvāṇaripos tanūjaḥ // PNc_17.37 //
analyzed: maurvīm pṛṣatkeṇa ramāṅgadasya ciccheda gīrvāṇa ripoḥ tanūjaḥ

original: sannābhibimbena mahājilakṣmyā vīraśriyo vibhramanūpureṇa /
analyzed: san nābhi bimbena mahā āji lakṣmyāḥ vīra śriyaḥ vibhrama nūpureṇa

original: saṃrabhya rāhor iva cakrapāṇiḥ sa apy asya cakreṇa śiraś cakarta // PNc_17.38 //
analyzed: saṃrabhya rāhoḥ iva cakra pāṇiḥ saḥ api asya cakreṇa śiraḥ cakarta

original: nanarta vidyādharasundarīṇāṃ gaṇo nadannūpuram ambare 'tha /
analyzed: nanarta vidyādhara sundarīṇām gaṇaḥ nadat nūpuram ambare

original: maulau śarakṣuṇṇaśirastraratne cikṣepa cāsyām arapuṣpavṛṣṭim // PNc_17.39 //
analyzed: maulau śara kṣuṇṇa śirastra ratne cikṣepa ca asyām ara puṣpa vṛṣṭim

original: dṛṣṭe śirasy utphalite svasūnor diṅmulalīnāsu patākinīṣu /
analyzed: dṛṣṭe śirasi utphalite sva sūnoḥ diṅmula līnāsu patākinīṣu

original: vajrāṅkuśāḥ saṃmukham āpapāta patyur viśām astagirer ivārkaḥ // PNc_17.40 //
analyzed: vajra aṅkuśāḥ saṃmukham āpapāta patyuḥ viśām asta gireḥ iva arkaḥ

original: madāmbuvarṣī samare 'bhidhāvan reje gajas tasya sahemakakṣyaḥ /
analyzed: mada ambu varṣī samare bhidhāvan reje gajaḥ tasya sa hema kakṣyaḥ

original: bhinne 'ntarāle pavamānanunnas tamālanīlas taḍiteva meghaḥ // PNc_17.41 //
analyzed: bhinne ntarāle pavamāna nunnaḥ tamāla nīlaḥ taḍitā iva meghaḥ

original: patyuḥ prasādasmitarajjukṛṣṭā bhaṭā vivṛtyāsya puro babhūvuḥ /
analyzed: patyuḥ prasāda smita rajju kṛṣṭāḥ bhaṭāḥ vivṛtya asya puras babhūvuḥ

original: svajīvitānyājimukhe vihātum atyutsukā bhaṅgamalīmasāni // PNc_17.42 //
analyzed: sva jīvitāni āji mukhe vihātum ati utsukāḥ bhaṅga malīmasāni

original: āruhya candraḥ kham ivābhirāmaṃ nakṣatramālābharaṇaṃ gajendram /
analyzed: āruhya candraḥ kham iva abhirāmam nakṣatra mālā ābharaṇam gaja indram

original: devo 'pi tadvairitamo niyantum atha pratasthe navasāhasāṅkaḥ // PNc_17.43 //
analyzed: devaḥ pi tad vairitamaḥ niyantum atha pratasthe nava sāhasa aṅkaḥ

original: ekatra pārśve śaśikhaṇḍanāmā vidyādharendro nṛpater babhūva /
analyzed: ekatra pārśve śaśikhaṇḍa nāmā vidyādhara indraḥ nṛpateḥ babhūva

original: arātisenānalinīvanaika- śītāṃśur anyatra yaśobhaṭaś ca // PNc_17.44 //
analyzed: śītāṃśuḥ anyatra yaśaḥ bhaṭaḥ ca

original: sphuratphaṇachatramaṇipratāna- tejaśchaṭājarjaritāndhakāraḥ /
analyzed: sphurat phaṇa chatra maṇi pratāna tejaḥ chaṭā jarjarita andhakāraḥ

original: aphalgur vīryaḥ phaṇabhṛtkumāro 'py agre 'bhavat tasya sa ratnacūḍaḥ // PNc_17.45 //
analyzed: aphalguḥ vīryaḥ phaṇabhṛt kumāraḥ pi agre bhavat tasya sa ratnacūḍaḥ

original: vidhūtanistriṃśataraṅgitāni sabāṇacakrīkṛtakārmukāni /
analyzed: vidhūta nistriṃśa taraṅgitāni sa bāṇa cakrīkṛta kārmukāni

original: hatāvaśeṣāṇi puro 'sya celur balāni vidyādharapannagānām // PNc_17.46 //
analyzed: hata avaśeṣāṇi puras sya celuḥ balāni vidyādhara pannagānām

original: raktāsavakṣībasahastatāla- vetālatālocchalitāṭṭahāsaḥ /
analyzed: rakta āsava kṣība sa hasta tāla vetāla tāla ucchalita aṭṭahāsaḥ

original: mahābhaṭānām asunirvyapekṣam anyonyam āvartata saṃparāyaḥ // PNc_17.47 //
analyzed: mahā bhaṭānām a su nirvyapekṣam anyonyam āvartata saṃparāyaḥ

original: cakāśire śastrabhṛtāṃ śiraḥsu mithaḥ patantyaḥ karavālavallyaḥ /
analyzed: cakāśire śastrabhṛtām śiraḥsu mithas patantyaḥ karavāla vallyaḥ

original: muktāḥ salīlāṃ tridaśāṅganābhir mālā ivendīvarapatramayyaḥ // PNc_17.48 //
analyzed: muktāḥ sa līlām tridaśa aṅganābhiḥ mālāḥ iva indīvara patra mayyaḥ

original: keṣāṃ cid ūhuḥ kavacāni śobhāṃ kva cit kva cil lohitapāṭalāni /
analyzed: keṣām cit ūhuḥ kavacāni śobhām kva cit kva cit lohita pāṭalāni

original: khelajjayaśrīcaraṇāravinda- lākṣāraseneva navāṅkitāni // PNc_17.49 //
analyzed: khelat jaya śrī caraṇa aravinda lākṣā rasena iva nava aṅkitāni

original: hṛdipraviṣṭair aviśuddhimadbhir abhūd vyathā kāpi śaraiḥ pareṣām /
analyzed: hṛdi praviṣṭaiḥ a viśuddhimadbhiḥ abhūt vyathā kā api śaraiḥ pareṣām

original: durātmanāṃ sādhuguṇair ivāgre phalena saṃyogam upeyivadbhiḥ // PNc_17.50 //
analyzed: durātmanām sādhu guṇaiḥ iva agre phalena saṃyogam upeyivadbhiḥ

original: parasparāpātajuṣām asīnāṃ dhārācyutaḥ saṃyaticūrṇareṇuḥ /
analyzed: paraspara āpāta juṣām asīnām dhārā cyutaḥ saṃyati cūrṇa reṇuḥ

original: avāpa tāpiccharucir jayaśrī- vilāsakālāñjanadhūlilīlām // PNc_17.51 //
analyzed: avāpa tāpiccha ruciḥ jaya śrī vilāsa kālāñjana dhūli līlām

original: paryāyajātobhayasainyabhaṅga- karālakolāhalakātarāṇām /
analyzed: paryāya jāta ubhaya sainya bhaṅga karāla kolāhala kātarāṇām

original: surārividyādharasundarīṇāṃ doleva śokapramādāvabhūtām // PNc_17.52 //
analyzed: surāri vidyādhara sundarīṇām dolā iva śoka pramādau abhūtām

original: athāsurendradviradena vegād abhyutthitenodgatadānadhāram /
analyzed: atha asura indra dviradena vegāt abhyutthitena udgata dāna dhāram

original: madhyeraṇaṃ madhyamalokabhartur javān madāndho jaghaṭe gajendraḥ // PNc_17.53 //
analyzed: madhya īraṇam madhyama loka bhartuḥ javāt mada andhaḥ jaghaṭe gaja indraḥ

original: mahebhayos tatra śikhāchalena pratiprahāraṃ radajaḥ kṛṣānuḥ /
analyzed: mahā ibhayoḥ tatra śikhā chalena pratiprahāram rada jaḥ kṛṣānuḥ

original: kośeṣu vidutkapiśā muhūrtaṃ vyadhād ivāṣṭāpadapatravallīḥ // PNc_17.54 //
analyzed: kośeṣu muhūrtam vyadhāt iva aṣṭāpada patra vallīḥ

original: muhuḥ prajānām adhipena gāḍham ākṛṣyamāṇasya śarāsanasya /
analyzed: muhur prajānām adhipena gāḍham ākṛṣyamāṇasya śarāsanasya

original: dviṣadvadhārambhavidhau gabhīraḥ kreṅkārahuṅkāra ivoccacāra // PNc_17.55 //
analyzed: dviṣat vadha ārambha vidhau gabhīraḥ kreṅkāra huṅkāraḥ iva uccacāra

original: parisphuratkuṇḍalaghṛṣṭapuṅkhās tena prayuktās pṛthuvikrameṇa /
analyzed: parisphurat kuṇḍala ghṛṣṭa puṅkhāḥ tena prayuktāḥ pṛthu vikrameṇa

original: pramṛṣṭakāntākucapatralekhe lekhārivakṣasy apatan pṛṣatkāḥ // PNc_17.56 //
analyzed: pramṛṣṭa kāntā kuca patra lekhe lekhāri vakṣasi apatan pṛṣatkāḥ

original: arātimukteṣu tatas tanutrād vahnisphuliṅgeṣu samullasatsu /
analyzed: arāti mukteṣu tatas tanutrāt vahni sphuliṅgeṣu samullasatsu

original: mūrtir babhāse vasudhādhipasya niryatpratāpāgnikaṇachaṭeva // PNc_17.57 //
analyzed: mūrtiḥ babhāse vasudhādhipasya niryat pratāpa agni kaṇa chaṭā iva

original: hiraṇmayī pārthivabāṇapaṅktir atyunnate mūrdhni mahāsurasya /
analyzed: hiraṇmayī pārthiva bāṇa paṅktiḥ ati unnate mūrdhni mahā asurasya

original: reje tarām añjanaparvatasya lagneva tigmāṃśumayūkhamālā // PNc_17.58 //
analyzed: reje tarām añjana parvatasya lagnā iva tigmāṃśu mayūkha mālā

original: abhyudgatā bhartur arātibāṇa- kṣuṇṇendranīlāṅgadareṇurājiḥ /
analyzed: abhyudgatā bhartuḥ arāti bāṇa kṣuṇṇa indranīla aṅgada reṇu rājiḥ

original: adṛśyatoddāmabhujāspadasya parākramāgner iva dhūmalekhā // PNc_17.59 //
analyzed: adṛśyata uddāma bhuja āspadasya parākrama agneḥ iva dhūma lekhā

original: ramāṅgado 'py udbhrukuṭiḥ kṛtāstraṃ vīraṃ dviṣaḥ pārśvagataṃ nihatya /
analyzed: ramāṅgadaḥ pi udbhrukuṭiḥ kṛta astram vīram dviṣaḥ pārśva gatam nihatya

original: śarair alāvīj jayavaijayantīṃ jyotsnāsitaṃ kīrtim ivāsurasya // PNc_17.60 //
analyzed: śaraiḥ alāvīt jaya vaijayantīm jyotsnā sitam kīrtim iva asurasya

original: adhaḥsthitoḍḍāmaravairipatti- mukteṣu nirlūnaśarāsanajyaḥ /
analyzed: mukteṣu nirlūna śarāsana jyaḥ

original: cikṣepa cakrāṇy atidīrghabāhuḥ saḥ kālarātrer iva kaṅkaṇāni // PNc_17.61 //
analyzed: cikṣepa cakrāṇi ati dīrgha bāhuḥ saḥ kālarātreḥ iva kaṅkaṇāni

original: utplutya helāhatasaṃmukhārir vidyādharendro 'py asinā cakarta /
analyzed: utplutya helā āhata saṃmukha ariḥ vidyādhara indraḥ pi asinā cakarta

original: jagajjayastambham ivoddhurasya suradviṣaḥ kāñcanaketudaṇḍam // PNc_17.62 //
analyzed: jagat jaya stambham iva uddhurasya suradviṣaḥ kāñcana ketu daṇḍam

original: so ratnacūḍo 'pi tathā bhuśuṇḍyā pipeṣa vairidviṣakumbhapīṭham /
analyzed: saḥ ratnacūḍaḥ tathā bhuśuṇḍyā pipeṣa vairi dviṣa kumbha pīṭham

original: sitātapatratvam udañcad āpa yathāsya muktāphaladhūlijālam // PNc_17.63 //
analyzed: sita ātapatra tvam udañcat āpa yathā asya muktāphala dhūli jālam

original: tuṅgaṃ dadhatkarkaśatām abhīkaḥ śrīsindhurājadvipakumbhayugmam /
analyzed: tuṅgam dadhat karkaśa tām abhīkaḥ śrī sindhurāja dvipa kumbha yugmam

original: payodharadvandvam ivājilakṣmyāś cakre 'rdhacandrāṅkitam indraśatruḥ // PNc_17.64 //
analyzed: payodhara dvandvam iva āji lakṣmyāḥ cakre ṛdhacandra aṅkitam indraśatruḥ

original: parasparāghaṭṭitadantakoṭi- bhraṣṭāgniveśabhramam ādadhanti /
analyzed: paraspara āghaṭṭita danta koṭi bhraṣṭa agniveśa bhramam ādadhanti

original: raṇājire lohitarañjitāni virejire kuñjaramauktikāni // PNc_17.65 //
analyzed: raṇa ajire lohita rañjitāni virejire kuñjara mauktikāni

original: cikṣepa pṛthītilake surārir yāṃ yām iṣuṃ kopakaṣāyitākṣaḥ /
analyzed: cikṣepa pṛthī tilake surāriḥ yām yām iṣum kopa kaṣāyita akṣaḥ

original: tāṃ tāṃ jayāśām iva bāhuśālī śaraiḥ sas tasyārdhapathe lulova // PNc_17.66 //
analyzed: tām tām jaya āśām iva bāhuśālī śaraiḥ saḥ tasya ardha pathe lulova

original: tayos tatheṣvāsaprakarṣa- pratyuktakarṇārjunayor jayaśrīḥ /
analyzed: tayoḥ tathā iṣvāsa prakarṣa pratyukta karṇa arjunayoḥ jaya śrīḥ

original: suvelaratnākarayor udagrā cakāra veleva gatāgatāni // PNc_17.67 //
analyzed: suvela ratnākarayoḥ udagrā cakāra velā iva gatāgatāni

original: patyuḥ prajānām asureśvaro 'tha kirīṭamāṇikyacayaṃ jahāra /
analyzed: patyuḥ prajānām kirīṭa māṇikya cayam jahāra

original: maṇiprasūnastabakapratānaṃ kalpadrumasyeva yugāntavātaḥ // PNc_17.68 //
analyzed: maṇi prasūna stabaka pratānam kalpadrumasya iva yugānta vātaḥ

original: krodhād athārdhaśaśalāñchanasodareṇa bāṇena vāsavaripor navasāhasāṅkaḥ /
analyzed: krodhāt atha ardha śaśalāñchana sodareṇa bāṇena vāsava ripoḥ nava sāhasa aṅkaḥ

original: ciccheda rāma iva viśravasaḥ sutasya pīnāṃsalolamaṇikuṇḍalam uttamāṅgam // PNc_17.69 //
analyzed: ciccheda rāmaḥ iva viśravasaḥ sutasya pīna aṃsa lola maṇi kuṇḍalam uttamāṅgam

original: āsan mukhāni kakubhām abhito 'tha citra- vāditranādalaharīmukharodarāṇi /
analyzed: āsan mukhāni kakubhām abhitas vāditra nāda laharī mukhara udarāṇi

original: devasya ca tridivapuṣpamayaṃ papāta mālyaṃ śirasy asuravairipurandhrimuktam // PNc_17.70 //
analyzed: devasya ca tridiva puṣpa mayam papāta mālyam śirasi asura vairi purandhri muktam

original: lakṣmīpateḥ pṛthubhujadvayam ārdrasāndra- jyāghātalāñchitam alāñchitavikramasya /
analyzed: lakṣmīpateḥ pṛthu bhuja dvayam ārdra sāndra jyā ghāta lāñchitam a lāñchita vikramasya

original: atyādarāgatajitorjitavairilakṣmī- pādābjayāvakaniṣaktam ivācakāśe // PNc_17.71 //
analyzed: ati ādara āgata jita ūrjita vairi lakṣmī pāda abja yāvaka niṣaktam iva ācakāśe

original: tasyāgrataḥ kanakakuṇḍalatāḍyamāna- gaṇḍasthalīlulitakuṅkumapatralekhāḥ /
analyzed: tasya agratas gaṇḍa sthalī lulita kuṅkuma patra lekhāḥ

original: vidyādharoragakuraṅgadṛśaḥ pramoda- sāndrocchaladhvani jagur jayamaṅgalāni // PNc_17.72 //

antarjatāpihitasomasurāpagāya pracchannaśaraśāsanalocanāya /

analyzed: ekānta kāntam asita agaru patra bhaṅgam ābibhratī lavali pāṇḍu tale kapole

original: āttaprasādhanam anaṅgavilāsaveśma līlāvidhānam avadhir nayanotsavasya /
analyzed: ātta prasādhanam anaṅga vilāsa veśma līlā vidhānam avadhiḥ nayana utsavasya

original: lāvaṇyasaṃvalitam aṅgakam udvahantī śṛṅgāradugdhajaladher adhidevateva // PNc_18.36 //
analyzed: lāvaṇya saṃvalitam aṅgakam udvahantī śṛṅgāra dugdha jaladheḥ adhidevatā iva

original: sā pāṭalāvidhutacāmaramāruteṣat- vyānartitālakalatā sahitā sakhībhiḥ /
analyzed: sā pāṭalā vidhuta cāmara māruta īṣat vyānartita alaka latā sahitā sakhībhiḥ

original: nātisphuṭakvaṇitanūpuram ākulāni kiṃcid vilambya dadhatī trapayā padāni // PNc_18.37 //
analyzed: na ati sphuṭa kvaṇita nūpuram ākulāni kiṃcid vilambya dadhatī trapayā padāni

original: nāyikayā nāyakadarśanam
analyzed: nāyikayā nāyaka darśanam

original: utpakṣmaṇā nirupamollasitapramoda- vistāralaṅghitavilāsasaroruheṇa /
analyzed: utpakṣmaṇā nirupama ullasita pramoda vistāra laṅghita vilāsa saroruheṇa

original: sāndrasmarajvarapipāsitayā tayāpi dūrād apāyi nayanāñjalinā narendraḥ // PNc_18.38 //
analyzed: sāndra smara jvara pipāsi tayā tayā api dūrāt apāyi nayana añjalinā narendraḥ

original: mālyavatīvākyam
analyzed: mālyavatī vākyam

original: vrīḍāvanamramukhapadmam upāgatāyāṃ tasyāṃ pituḥ kanakaviṣṭarabhāgabhāji /
analyzed: vrīḍā avanamra mukha padmam upāgatāyām tasyām pituḥ kanaka viṣṭara bhāga bhāji

original: mālyādikalpitayathocitasatkriyānte taṃ mālavendram iti mālyavatī jagāda // PNc_18.39 //
analyzed: mālya ādi kalpita yathocita satkriyā ante tam mālava indram iti mālyavatī jagāda

original: rājan/ mahītalamṛgāṅga/
analyzed: rājan mahī tala mṛga aṅga

original: vilambase kim?
analyzed: vilambase kim

original: adyāpi tūrṇam amunā svabhujārjitena /
analyzed: adyā api tūrṇam amunā sva bhuja arjitena

original: hemāmbujena viracayya vataṃsam asyāḥ pūrṇapratijñam uragādhipatiṃ vidhehi // PNc_18.40 //
analyzed: hema ambujena viracayya vataṃsam asyāḥ pūrṇa pratijñam uraga adhipatim vidhehi

original: kamalāvataṃsaḥ
analyzed: kamala avataṃsaḥ

original: ukte tayety akṛta kāñcanapuṣkaraṃ tad yāvat saḥ karṇaśikhare phaṇirājaputryāḥ /
analyzed: ukte tayā iti akṛta kāñcana puṣkaram tat yāvat saḥ karṇa śikhare phaṇirāja putryāḥ

original: tāvad vihāya mṛgarūpam udāramūrtir agre babhūva puruṣo 'sya sahemavetraḥ // PNc_18.41 //
analyzed: tāvat vihāya mṛga rūpam udāra mūrtiḥ agre babhūva sa hema vetraḥ

original: puruṣaṃ prati praśnaḥ
analyzed: puruṣam prati praśnaḥ

original: kas tvaṃ mṛgaḥ katham abhūr iti pārthivena pṛṣṭaḥ sa vismayasamutsukamānasena /
analyzed: kaḥ tvam mṛgaḥ katham abhūḥ iti pārthivena pṛṣṭaḥ sa vismaya samutsuka mānasena

original: ity abravīd uraganetraparamparābhir āpīyamānavapur uktim avantinātham // PNc_18.42 //
analyzed: iti abravīt uraga netra paramparābhiḥ āpīyamāna vapuḥ uktim avanti nātham

original: pratīhārasya vṛttāntaḥ
analyzed: pratīhārasya vṛttāntaḥ

original: kailāsaśailavasater giriśoparodhād dvārapraveśaviniṣedhakaṣāyitena /
analyzed: kailāsa śaila vasateḥ giriśa uparodhāt dvāra praveśa viniṣedha kaṣāyitena

original: śapto 'smi kaṇvamunināyam ahaṃ pitus te śrīharṣadevanṛpateḥ pratihārapālas // PNc_18.43 //
analyzed: śaptaḥ smi kaṇva muninā ayam aham pituḥ te śrī harṣa deva nṛpateḥ pratihāra pālaḥ

original: rājā phaṇīndraduhituḥ kanakāravindaṃ karṇe kariṣyati yadā navasāhasāṅkaḥ /
analyzed: rājā phaṇīndra duhituḥ kanaka aravindam karṇe kariṣyati yadā nava sāhasa aṅkaḥ

original: svaṃ rūpam āpsyasi tadeti samādideśa śāpāntam eṣa vihitānunayo maharṣiḥ // PNc_18.44 //
analyzed: svam rūpam āpsyasi tadā iti samādideśa śāpa antam eṣa vihita anunayaḥ mahā ṛṣiḥ

original: tad vāsavārivijayottham idaṃ yaśas te gatvaikapiṅgalagirer avataṃsayāmi /
analyzed: tat vāsava ari vijaya uttham idam yaśaḥ te gatvā ekapiṅgala gireḥ avataṃsayāmi

original: uktveti divyakusumair avakīrya maulau pātālamallam anilasya pathā jagāma // PNc_18.45 //
analyzed: uktvā iti divya kusumaiḥ avakīrya maulau pātāla mallam anilasya pathā jagāma

original: vivāhavidhiḥ
analyzed: vivāha vidhiḥ

original: tūryasvaneṣu vilasatsu paṭhatsv amandaṃ bandiṣv anīyata phaṇīndrapurodhasā ca /
analyzed: tūrya svaneṣu vilasatsu paṭhatsu amandam bandiṣu anīyata phaṇi indra purodhasā ca

original: koṇāvasaktajalapūritaratnakumbhāṃ vediṃ tayā saha sa madhyamalokapālaḥ // PNc_18.46 //
analyzed: koṇa avasakta jala pūrita ratna kumbhām vedim tayā saha sa madhyama lokapālaḥ

original: abhyudgatārcir analojjhitadhūmarāji- śyāmībhavat kanakatāmarasāvataṃsām /
analyzed: abhyudgata arciḥ anala ujjhita dhūmarāji śyāmībhavat kanaka tāmarasa avataṃsām

original: tasyāṃ yathāvidhi sa mālavapuṣpaketuḥ kanyām aheḥ kuvalayāśva iva upayeme // PNc_18.47 //
analyzed: tasyām yathāvidhi sa mālava puṣpaketuḥ kanyām aheḥ kuvalayāśvaḥ iva upayeme

original: ānītayā jhaṭiti rūpam adṛṣṭapūrvam aṅgena puṣpaśarabhaṅgitaraṅgitena /
analyzed: ānītayā jhaṭiti rūpam a dṛṣṭa pūrvam aṅgena puṣpa śara bhaṅgi taraṅgitena

original: bhāti sma śantanur iva tridivasravantyā pātālacandrakalayā sas tayā sametya // PNc_18.48 //
analyzed: bhāti sma śantanuḥ iva tridiva sravantyā pātāla candra kalayā saḥ tayā sametya

original: phaṇipativākyam
analyzed: phaṇi pati vākyam

original: nirgacchadaccharucinirbharam aṃśukena saṃchāditaṃ kim api pāṇitale dadhānaḥ /
analyzed: nirgacchat accha ruci nirbharam aṃśukena saṃchāditam kim api pāṇi tale dadhānaḥ

original: ūce tam ity adhipatiḥ phaṇinām udañcat- dantāṃśuśāritaradachadaratnakāntiḥ // PNc_18.49 //
analyzed: ūce tam iti adhipatiḥ phaṇinām udañcat danta aṃśu śārita rada chada ratna kāntiḥ

original: yad dīyate tava na tādṛśam asti kiṃcid gehe mamātra nṛpate navasāhasāṅka / /
analyzed: yat dīyate tava na tādṛśam asti kiṃcid gehe mama atra nṛpate nava sāhasa aṅka

original: kośapratiṣṭhitanidhānaśataṃ yatas tvām aiśvaryanirjitapurandaram āmananti // PNc_18.50 //
analyzed: kośa pratiṣṭhita nidhāna śatam yatas tvām aiśvarya nirjita purandaram āmananti

original: tat sphāṭikaṃ svam iva śuddham idaṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṣṭṛprayatnaghaṭitaṃ śivaliṅgam ekam /
analyzed: tat sphāṭikam svam iva śuddham idam gṛhāṇa tvaṣṭṛ prayatna ghaṭitam śiva liṅgam ekam

original: ākāram ardhavanitāvapuṣaḥ purārer yasyāntare sukṛtino hi vilokayanti // PNc_18.51 //
analyzed: ākāram ardha vanitā vapuṣaḥ purāreḥ yasya antare su kṛtinaḥ hi vilokayanti

original: vyāsaḥ purā kila purāṇamuneḥ prapede tasmāt kilādikavipāṇitalaṃ jagāma /
analyzed: vyāsaḥ purā kila purāṇa muneḥ prapede tasmāt kila ādi kavi pāṇi talam jagāma

analyzed: lebhe bhagavān kapilaḥ mahā ṛṣiḥ sa anugraheṇa mama ca idam adāyi tena

original: śivaliṅgārpaṇam
uktvety anargham atipāvanam arpitaṃ tad antaḥsphuṭaikaśivarūpam ahīśvareṇa /
analyzed: uktvā iti anargham ati pāvanam arpitam tat antar sphuṭa eka śiva rūpam ahīśvareṇa

original: pūrṇendukānti sahasā nigṛhītaśatrur jagrāha piṇḍitam iva svayaśo narendraḥ // PNc_18.53 //
analyzed: pūrṇa indu kānti sahasā nigṛhīta śatruḥ jagrāha piṇḍitam iva sva yaśaḥ narendraḥ

original: tatrātha diktaṭapariskhalitapravṛtta- sīmantinīcaṭulanūpurakāñcinādaḥ /
analyzed: tatra atha diś taṭa pariskhalita pravṛtta sīmantinī caṭula nūpura kāñci nādaḥ

original: ko 'py ucchalatpaṭahavaṃśahuḍḍukkaśaṅkha- vīṇāmṛdaṅgamurajadhvanir utsavo 'bhūt // PNc_18.54 //
analyzed: kaḥ pi ucchalat paṭaha vaṃśa huḍḍukka śaṅkha vīṇā mṛdaṅga muraja dhvaniḥ utsavaḥ bhūt

original: svanagarīṃ prati prasthāpanam
analyzed: sva nagarīm prati prasthāpanam

original: vṛtte vadhūm atha vivāhamahotsave tām ādāya niṣpratimapauruṣavaijayantīm /
analyzed: vṛtte vadhūm atha vivāha mahā utsave tām ādāya niṣpratima pauruṣa vaijayantīm

analyzed: anvāgata ādara nivartita pannaga indraḥ paryutsukaḥ sva nagarīm sa nṛpaḥ pratasthe

original: gatvātha dūram ahiviṣṭapataḥ sahelam aṃśaḥ purāṇapuruṣasya sa nirjagāma /
analyzed: gatvā atha dūram sa helam aṃśaḥ purāṇapuruṣasya sa nirjagāma

analyzed: śiprā arpitena sahasā puratas prabhāva sīmantita ambu paṭalena pathā sa sainyaḥ

analyzed: tasyāḥ sva hasta muni saṃhati kalpita arghaḥ sindhoḥ taṭe saḥ padam eka pade cakāra

analyzed: śṛṅge tadā ca bhagavān aravinda bandhuḥ bandhūka pāṭala ruciḥ kanakācalasya

original: ujjayinīpraveśaḥ
analyzed: ujjayinī praveśaḥ

analyzed: bāla ātapa churita harmya viṭaṅka varti pārāvata ati madhura dhvanita chalena

analyzed: sambhāṣaṇam vidadhatīm iva paura mukta puṣpa añjaliḥ saḥ puram ujjayinīm viveśa

analyzed: kāntā yaśaḥ bhaṭa yutam kṛśa tām avāptāḥ tad cintayā eva sacivāḥ tam atha praṇemuḥ

analyzed: kākutstham āhata surārim iva anuyāntam saumitriṇā janaka rāja tanūjayā ca

original: mahākāleśvaradarśanam
ānandabāṣpasalilārdradṛśo 'rdhamārge sambhāṣya tān smitamukhaḥ saha tair jagāma /
analyzed: ānanda bāṣpa salila ārdra dṛśaḥ rdha mārge sambhāṣya tān smita mukhaḥ saha taiḥ jagāma

original: vidyādharoragakarāhatahemaghaṇṭā- ṭāṅkārahāri bhavanaṃ tripurāntakasya // PNc_18.60 //
analyzed: vidyādhara uraga kara āhata hema ghaṇṭā ṭāṅkāra hāri bhavanam tripurāntakasya

original: tasmiṃś carācaraguror hariṇāvacūla- cūḍāmaṇer apacitiṃ vidhivad vidhāya /
analyzed: tasmin carācara guroḥ cūḍāmaṇeḥ apacitim vidhivat vidhāya

original: sākaṃ phaṇīndrasutayāmbararodhikambu- tūryasvanormi saś ca rājakulaṃ viveśa // PNc_18.61 //
analyzed: sākam phaṇi indra sutayā ambara rodhi kambu tūrya svana ūrmi saḥ ca rāja kulam viveśa

original: dhārāgamanam
analyzed: dhārā gamanam

original: tatrārṇavadhvanighanotsavatūryaghoṣe sthitvā dināni katicit sa narendracandraḥ /
analyzed: tatra arṇava dhvani ghana utsava tūrya ghoṣe sthitvā dināni katicid sa narendra candraḥ

original: yāti sma bhūṣitakulaḥ kularājadhānīṃ dhārām amātyakathitāmṛgayetivṛttaḥ // PNc_18.62 //
analyzed: yāti sma bhūṣita kulaḥ kula rājadhānīm dhārām amātya kathita a mṛgayā iti vṛttaḥ

original: udghāṭiteṣv atha vilokanakautukena vātāyaneṣu paritaḥ purasundarībhiḥ /
analyzed: udghāṭiteṣu atha vilokana kautukena vātāyaneṣu paritas pura sundarībhiḥ

original: tasmiṃś cirād viśati jīva iveśvare sā pronmīlitorunayaneva purī babhūva // PNc_18.63 //
analyzed: tasmin cirāt viśati jīvaḥ iva īśvare sā pronmīlita uru nayanā iva purī babhūva

original: śivaliṅgapratiṣṭhā
analyzed: śiva liṅga pratiṣṭhā

original: tat sādhv akārayad athādhigatapratiṣṭhaṃ tatrāccharatnaśivaliṅgam anarghaśīlaḥ /
analyzed: tat sādhu akārayat atha adhigata pratiṣṭham tatra accha ratna śiva liṅgam anargha śīlaḥ

original: tasya prabhāvaghaṭitair vyadhur arhaṇāṃ ca vidyādharā vikacakalpataruprasūnaiḥ // PNc_18.64 //
analyzed: tasya prabhāva ghaṭitaiḥ vyadhuḥ arhaṇām ca vidyādharāḥ vikaca kalpataru prasūnaiḥ

original: anuyāyiprasthānam
analyzed: anuyāyiprasthānam

original: kṛtvā yathocitam akṛtrimam utsavānte satkāram āyatananiślathamauliratnau /
analyzed: kṛtvā yathocitam akṛtrimam utsava ante satkāram āyatana niślatha mauli ratnau

original: dattāṅkapāṇir ubhayoḥ prajighāya sa atha vidyādharādhipaphaṇīndrasūtau svadeśam // PNc_18.65 //
analyzed: datta aṅka pāṇiḥ ubhayoḥ prajighāya sa atha vidyādhara adhipa phaṇi indra sūtau sva deśam

original: ekas tayor agamad ambaragāmisainya- sīmantitābhrapaṭalaḥ śaśikāntaśailam /
analyzed: ekaḥ tayoḥ agamat ambara gāmi sainya sīmantita abhra paṭalaḥ śaśi kānta śailam

original: anyo 'py agādhajalamālavajahnukanyā- viśrāṇitorusaraṇir nijarājadhānīm // PNc_18.66 //
analyzed: anyaḥ pi agādha jala mālava jahnukanyāḥ viśrāṇita uru saraṇiḥ nija rājadhānīm

original: śaśiprabhāsakhīgamanam
analyzed: śaśi prabhā sakhī gamanam

original: mābhūḥ kadāpi vimukhī rameṇa yad asya chandānuvṛttiratisaṃvananaṃ madasya /
analyzed: mā abhūḥ kadāpi vimukhī rameṇa yat asya chanda anuvṛtti rati saṃvananam madasya

original: uktveti tām ahisutām agaman gṛhāṇi gandharvakinnaramahoragasiddhakanyāḥ // PNc_18.67 //
analyzed: uktvā iti tām ahi sutām agaman gṛhāṇi gandharva kinnara mahoraga siddha kanyāḥ

original: sāmrājyalakṣmīsvīkāraḥ
nīlachatrāvataṃsā bhujagapatisutāpāṇḍugaṇḍasthalāntaḥ- kastūrīpaṅkapatravyatikaraśabalavyāyatāṃse salīlam /
analyzed: nīla chatra avataṃsā bhujaga pati sutā pāṇḍu gaṇḍa sthala antar kastūrī paṅka patra vyatikara śabala vyāyata aṃse sa līlam

original: devenātha svamantripravaraciradhṛtā sāhasāṅkena dīrghe rohajjyāghātarekhe puno 'pi nidadhe doṣṇi sāmrājyalakṣmīḥ // PNc_18.68 //
analyzed: devena atha sva mantri pravara cira dhṛtā sāhasa aṅkena dīrghe rohat jyā ghāta rekhe nidadhe doṣṇi sāmrājya lakṣmīḥ

original: atha granthapraśastiḥ
analyzed: atha grantha praśastiḥ

original: śrīmatkavipriyasuhṛcchaladaṅkarāma- rājendubhaktyadhigatapratibhāviśeṣaḥ /
etad vinidrakusumadadyuti padmaguptaḥ śrīsindhurājanṛpateś caritaṃ babandha // PNc_Gp.1 //
analyzed: etat vinidra kusuma da dyuti padmaguptaḥ śrī sindhurāja nṛpateḥ caritam babandha

original: lakṣmīlatānavavasanta mahītalendra vidyāvilāsamaṇidarpaṇa sindhurāja /
analyzed: lakṣmī latā anavavasanta mahī tala indra vidyā vilāsa maṇi darpaṇa sindhurāja

original: etan mayā ghaṭitam ujjvalakānti kāvya- māṇikyakuṇḍalam iha śravaṇe videhi // PNc_Gp.2 //
analyzed: etat mayā ghaṭitam ujjvala kānti kāvya māṇikya kuṇḍalam iha śravaṇe videhi

original: nyastāni yāni mayi sūktisudhāpṛṣanti devena tena kati cit kavibāndhavena /
analyzed: nyastāni yāni mayi su ukti sudhā pṛṣanti devena tena kati cit kavi bāndhavena

original: candrātapasnapitamauktikasodarāṇāṃ teṣām idaṃ vilasitaṃ navasāhasāṅka // PNc_Gp.3 //
analyzed: candra ātapa snapita mauktika sodarāṇām teṣām idam vilasitam nava sāhasa aṅka

original: yac cāpalaṃ kim api mandhadhiyā mayaivam āsūtritaṃ narapate navasāhasāṅka /
analyzed: yat cāpalam kim api mandha dhiyā mayā evam āsūtritam narapate nava sāhasa aṅka

original: ājñaiva hetur iha te śayanīkṛtogra- rājanyamaulikusumā na kavitvadarpaḥ // PNc_Gp.4 //
analyzed: ājñā eva hetuḥ iha te śayanīkṛta ugra rājanya mauli kusumā na kavi tva darpaḥ

original: iti navasāhasāṅkacaritaṃ saṃpūrṇam
analyzed: iti navasāhasāṅkacaritam saṃpūrṇam
